鍵がかかっている――
開くには<COL ffdc78>《竜力の鍵》</COL>が必要だ
Translation:
It's locked--
To open it, you need<COL ffdc78>《Key of Dragon Force》</COL>

Source string:
鍵がかかっている――
開くには<COL ffdc78>《昌石の鍵》</COL>が必要だ
Translation:
It's locked--
You need<COL ffdc78>《Key of Gemstones》</COL>to open it.

Source string:
鍵がかかっている――
開くには<COL ffdc78>《財宝の鍵》</COL>が必要だ
Translation:
It's locked--
You need<COL ffdc78>《Key of Treasures》</COL>to open it.

Source string:
鍵がかかっている――
開くには<COL ffdc78>《宝飾の鍵》</COL>が必要だ
Translation:
It's locked--
You need<COL ffdc78>《Key of Jewelry》</COL>to open it.

Source string: 白竜杯に参加可能になりました
Translation: You can now participate in the White Dragon Cup

Source string:
鍵がかかっている――
解放には<COL ffdc78>《宝飾の鍵》</COL>が必要だ
Translation:
It's locked--
You need<COL ffdc78>《Key of Jewelry》</COL>to open it.

Source string:
<COL ffdc78>敵との戦闘で一度も死亡状態になりませんでした
クリア時のボーナス報酬が多くなります</COL>
Translation:
<COL ffdc78>Never went into a state of death in combat
More bonus rewards for clearing</COL>

Source string:
<COL ffdc78>パーティーメンバーが死亡状態になりました
クリア時のボーナス報酬が下がります</COL>
Translation:
<COL ffdc78>Party members are now in a dead state
Bonus rewards for clearing are lowered</COL>

Source string:
<COL ffdc78>胞子の広がりを阻止――！
クリア時のボーナス報酬が追加されます</COL>
Translation:
<COL ffdc78>Stop the spread of spores--!
Bonus rewards for clearing will be added!</COL>

Source string: 敵はあわてて逃げ出した！
Translation: The enemy panicked and ran away!

Source string: 胞子が集まり始めている――
Translation: Spores are starting to gather

Source string: 汚染植物が出現――！
Translation: Infected plants have appeared!

Source string:
胞子の広がりを阻止――
クリア時のボーナス報酬が追加！
Translation:
Prevent the spread of spores!
Bonus reward is added!

Source string: 隠れていた魔物が姿を現した――！
Translation: The hidden monster has appeared!

Source string:
傷ついた魔物の痕跡は、
住処へと続いているようだ――
Translation:
There are traces from the wounded monster
It seems to lead towards its den.

Source string: 救助対象が疲れてきたようだ――
Translation: Your rescue target seems to be getting tired...

Source string: 救助対象はかなり辛そうだ――
Translation: Your rescue target seems to be struggling...

Source string: 救助対象が戦線離脱した――
Translation: Your rescue target has left the battlefield...

Source string:
<COL ffdc78>迅速な救助に成功しました
クリア時のボーナス報酬が追加されます</COL>
Translation:
<COL ffdc78>Quick Rescue successful!
Bonus Rewards gained!</COL>

Source string:
<COL ffdc78>迅速な救助に失敗しました
クリア時のボーナス報酬は追加されません</COL>
Translation:
<COL ffdc78>Quick Rescue has failed!
Bonus Rewards are lost.</COL>

Source string:
鍵がかかっている――
開くには<COL ffdc78>《<NAME ITEM>》</COL>が必要だ
Translation:
It's locked--
You need<COL ffdc78>《<NAME ITEM>》</COL>to open it.

Source string: 今は転移の力を失っているようだ――
Translation: It seems to have lost the power to teleport...

Source string:
イベントを進行しますか？
※パーティー要請中の場合はキャンセルされます
Translation:
Are you sure you want to proceed with
the event?
※ If there is a party request, it will be
canceled.

Source string: 準備開始
Translation: Start Preparation

Source string: キャンセル
Translation: Cancel

Source string: イベント進行確認
Translation: Confirm Event Progress

Source string: 進行する
Translation: Proceed

Source string: 準備解除
Translation: Cancel Preparation

Source string: キャンセル
Translation: Cancel

Source string: 新たな証拠品を手に入れた！
Translation: Got a new piece of evidence!

Source string: 誰かの話し声が聞こえる――
Translation: Someone's voice can be heard――

Source string: 憲兵が見張っている――この先には行けなさそうだ
Translation: The guards are watching--I don't think we can go any further.

Source string: 誰かが襲われている！　助けなければ――
Translation: Someone is being attacked!　We have to help--

Source string: 遠くから悲鳴が聞こえた――
Translation: I heard a scream in the distance--

Source string: どこからか剣戟の音が聞こえる――
Translation: I can hear the sound of sword fighting coming from somewhere.

Source string: レジスタンスに新たな仲間が加わった！
Translation: A new friend joins the resistance!

Source string: 諜報活動領域外へ移動したため、クエストを終了しました
Translation: Quest ended due to moving out of the espionage activity area

Source string: 諜報任務が進行した――
Translation: The espionage mission progressed――

Source string: ハントターゲットを討伐した！
Translation: Hunt target subjugated!

Source string: ボーナスターゲットを討伐した！
Translation: Bonus target subjugated!

Source string: 闇の力によって封じられている
Translation: Sealed by the power of darkness

Source string: ハントターゲットを発見した！
Translation: Hunt target found!

Source string: ボーナスターゲットを発見した！
Translation: Bonus target found!

Source string: 封鎖されたエリアが解放された――
Translation: The cordoned off area was liberated--

Source string:
メインクエストが進行可能になりました
一度パーティーを解散してからトラバースに話しかけて下さい
Translation:
The main quest is now ready to proceed.
Once you break up the party, please talk to Travers.

Source string: レスタニア
Translation: Lestania

Source string: メルゴダ下層
Translation: Mergoda Lower Level

Source string: メルゴダ王宮層
Translation: Mergoda Royal Palace Level

Source string: 魔赤島
Translation: Bloodbane Isle

Source string: フィンダム
Translation: Phindym

Source string: アッカーシェラン
Translation: Acre Selund

Source string: アッカーシェラン[過去]
Translation: Acre Selund (Past)

Source string: 黒呪の迷宮
Translation: Bitterblack Maze

Source string: <LQEM>を討伐：<VAL> / <VAL>
Translation: Defeat <LQEM>: <VAL> / <VAL>

Source string: <LQIM>を入手：<VAL> / <VAL>
Translation: Obtain <LQIM>: <VAL> / <VAL>

Source string: <LQIM>を納品
Translation: <LQIM> is ready to be delivered.

Source string: （%s%d:%02d時点集計）
Translation: (Tallied at %s %d:%02d)

Source string: イベント合計
Translation: Event Total

Source string: PM
Translation: PM

Source string: AM
Translation: AM

Source string: 現在の自分のあげたチョコの数
Translation: Number of chocolate given

Source string: 合計
Translation: Total

Source string:
『大いなる理（ことわり）は我々が信じているよりも
ずっと脆かったと考えるより他はありません』
Translation:
'We have no choice but to believe that the Great Order is far
more fragile than we have been led to believe.'

Source string:
『たったひとりの人間の野心が世界のありようを
変えてしまったのですから』
Translation:
'Because one man's ambition has changed the way the world
is.'

Source string: エルテ・ディナンで見つかった古文書より
Translation: From the ancient document found at Erte Deenan

Source string: その豊穣なる大地の名はレスタニア――
Translation:
The ancient manuscripts discovered in Erte Deenan
told of the great kingdom of Lestania,

Source string: 白竜の翼の下――
Translation: where beneath the wings of the White Dragon

Source string: 人々は生まれ
Translation: its people were born,

Source string: 働き
Translation: labored,

Source string: 笑った
Translation: and laughed.

Source string: 竜への崇敬と感謝が文明を育み――
Translation:
The civilization grew prosperous, with great
reverence and gratitude to the White Dragon;

Source string:
人の叡智は生と死の理すら
乗り越えようとしていた
Translation:
its people grew in wisdom enough to try
and seek overcoming death itself.

Source string: しかし
Translation: However,
323 years ago,

Source string:
どこからともなく現れた黄金色の竜が
大いなる白竜に戦いを挑んだ
Translation:
a Golden Dragon emerged to challenge
the White Dragon in battle.

Source string: 戦いは三日三晩続き
Translation:
The battle between the two raged for
over three days and three nights,

Source string: 誰もがその様子に固唾を呑んだ
Translation:
while the people awaited the
outcome with bated breath.

Source string: 四日目の日の出前だった
Translation: And on the sunrise of the fourth day,

Source string: 祈りが通じたのだろうか――
Translation: Perhaps their prayers were answered.

Source string: 白竜の痛撃が黄金の胸を貫き――
Translation:
the White Dragon triumphed and
struck the Golden Dragon down,

Source string: まばゆい翼は光を失い
Translation:
but the White Dragon's bright
resplendent wings lost their light,

Source string: 堕ちた
Translation: and the dragon fell.

Source string: 人々は胸を撫で下ろしたが――
Translation:
Though the people breathed
sighs of relief at its triumph,

Source string: 白竜も深手を負い――
Translation:
the White Dragon had suffered
a grievous wound in the battle.

Source string: そして
Translation: And thus

Source string: 堕ちた
Translation: fallen

Source string: 頭を上げ、再び天空に昇ろうとしたが
Translation: He raised his head and tried to ascend into the sky again, but

Source string: かなわず――
Translation: I couldn't--

Source string: 人々は傷ついた白竜の周囲に集い
Translation: People gathered around the wounded white dragon.

Source string: 祈った
Translation: I prayed.

Source string: やがて白竜は弱々しい声で言った
Translation: Eventually the white dragon said in a weak voice

Source string: 『おまえたちを覚者にしてやろう』
Translation: "I will make you enlightened."

Source string: 『その代わりに――』
Translation: Instead--"

Source string: 『わたしを守ってくれ』
Translation: "Protect me.

Source string: 『まだ消えるわけにはいかない』
Translation: We can't disappear just yet."

Source string: 『レスタニアを愛する者たちよ――』
Translation: "To those who love Lestania--"

Source string: 『堅き砦となり、わたしを守ってくれ』
Translation: 'Be a strong fortress and protect me.

Source string: 『秩序をなくしたこの地を――』
Translation: "This land that has lost its order..."

Source string: 『理の内に押し戻さねば――』
Translation: We have to push them back within reason."

Source string: そののちの３００有余年――
Translation: For the next 300-plus years--

Source string: 白竜はひとり、またひとりと覚者を増やした
Translation: One by one, the white dragon added to the number of enlightened people.

Source string: そしてまた
Translation: And again.

Source string: 新たな覚者が
Translation: A new awakening.

Source string: レスタニアの大地に立とうとしていた
Translation: I was about to stand on the land of Lestania.

Next, feel free to select an item for "fertilizer"

you may see a change in the growth of mandragora!

Source string:

ゲームを開始するためには
<VAL 0> 以上の空き容量が必要です
ゲームを終了して空き容量を確保してください

Insufficient free space on the HDD.
In order to start the game,
more than <VAL 0> is required.
Please exit the game and free the space necessary.

Source string:
新規にセーブデータを作成しています
PCの電源を切らないでください
Translation:
Creating new save data.
Do not turn off the PC.

Source string:
セーブデータが破損しています
セーブデータを破棄して
新規に作成しますか？
Translation:
Save data is corrupted
and will be discarded.
Do you want to create a new save?

Source string:
セーブデータをロードできませんでした
セーブデータを破棄して
新規に作成しますか？
Translation:
Save data could not be loaded,
and will be discarded.
Do you want to create a new save?

Source string:
他のユーザーのセーブデータを
使用することはできません
セーブデータを破棄して
新規に作成します
Translation:
Other user's save data
cannot be used and will be discarded.
Please create a new save.

Source string:
セーブデータを準備できませんでした
ランチャーへ戻ります
Translation:
Could not create save data.
Exiting to the launcher.

Source string: セーブデータの保存に失敗しました
Translation: Failed to save.

Source string:
セーブデータをチェックしています
PCの電源を切らないでください
Translation:
Checking save data.
Please do not turn off your PC.

Source string:
ハードディスクドライブ容量の

ランチャーへ戻ります
Translation:
Checking HDD capacity failed.
Exiting to the launcher.

Source string:
トロフィーデータの準備に失敗しました

Translation:
Failed to create trophy data.
Exiting to the launcher.

Translation: Portent of Destruction

Source string: 絶望の大陸 第五節　到達
Translation: The Land of Despair: Section V

Source string:
覚者よ――
新たなるポーンとの《戦徒の契り》を望むか
ならばその資格たる証――
<COL b92828><SPAI NAME> <SPAI NUM> 個</COL>を我に示せ
Translation:
Arisen――
Do you desire a new "Myrmidon's Pledge" with a pawn?
If so, prove to me your qualification by presenting <COL b92828> <SPAI NUM> pieces of <SPAI NAME></COL>.

Source string:
――ううむ、覚者よ
そなたはまだ新たな契約を交わす段階にあらず
すでに己が器に応じた数の戦徒を統べているようだ
Translation:
--Ummm, Arisen,
you are not yet ready to sign a new contract,
it seems that you already control a number of Myrmidions in accordance with your capacity.

Source string:
――覚者よ
どうやらまだ、戦徒との新たな契約に
必要な数の<COL b92828><SPAI NAME></COL>を
持ってはおらぬようだな
Translation:
--Arisen,
apparently you don't yet have the required
number of<COL b92828><SPAI NAME></COL>
for a new contract with the Myrmidions!

Source string:
契約に必要な数、<COL b92828><SPAI NUM> 個</COL>を手に入れてのち
再び我にその証を示すがよい――
Translation:
After you have the <COL b92828><SPAI NUM>pieces</COL> required for the covenant
Show me the proof again...

Source string:
――よかろう
力を授かるべき者よ、我が前に――
Translation:
--I am ready.
You who are to be given power, before me--

Source string: 沈黙こそ我が意力の糧――
Translation: Silence is the food of my willpower.

Source string: 語るべき言葉――今はない
Translation: The words to speak――Now there are none

Source string:
波を感じる――
はるか遠く、地平の彼方――
Translation:
Feel the waves--
far, far beyond the horizon--

Source string: 真に強き魂あらば、闇は消え去る――
Translation: When the soul is truly strong, the darkness will disappear.

Source string: 覚者の使命、ゆめゆめ忘れるな
Translation: The mission of the Arisen, don't ever forget it.

Source string: 惑いし者よ、畏れずに眼（まなこ）を開け
Translation: Oh, bewildered one, open your eyes without fear

Source string: 義なき怒りは、身を滅ぼす――
Translation: Anger without righteousness destroys--

Source string:
鍛錬せよ
おまえたちは抜き身の刃――研がねば、朽ちる
Translation:
Train yourself
You are the unsheathed blade――Sharpen or decay

Source string: ――いましばし――休息を許せ――
Translation: --For now... allow me to rest.

Source string: 全てを見通すことはまだ――できぬか――
Translation: I don't know if you've seen it all yet... or if you haven't.

Source string:
広く伝えよ――
覚者にならんと思う者――我は拒まぬ
Translation:
Spread the word--
Whoever wants to become an Arisen--I will not reject them.

Source string: 覚者よ――人の時代を記憶し――愛でるがいい
Translation: Arisen, remember the era of humans and cherish it with love.

Source string: 覚者よ、風となり大地を駆けよ――我が魂を運べ
Translation: Arisen, become the wind and race across the earth - carry my soul

Source string:
覚者よ――
自らの出自を忘れるな
Translation:
O Arisen one--
Remember where you come from.

Source string: あれから３００年以上の時が過ぎている――
Translation: More than 300 years have passed since then.

Source string:
我にとっても短くはない時間だ
いわんや、人間にとっては――
Translation:
It's not a short time for me either.
For a man, no less...

Source string: 竜なき世界――
Translation: A world without dragons —

Source string:
このレスタニアを竜なき世界にすることだけは
避けねばならぬ――
Translation:
We must not let Lestania become a land without dragons.
We must avoid--

Source string: ――どうした
Translation: --What's the matter?

Source string:
――いや、眠っていたわけではない
ただ、時折――意識が失せるのだ
Translation:
-- no, I wasn't asleep
just occasionally -- I'd lose consciousness.

Source string: 覚者よ――何用だ
Translation: Arisen, what do you want?

Source string:
我が加護を、おまえたちの言葉に乗せて
民たちに運ぶのだ
Translation:
My blessings in your words.
Carry my favor to your people.

Source string: わたしには休息が必要だ
Translation: I need rest.

Source string:
覚者よ
我が目となり、耳となり――頼むぞ
Translation:
O Arisen One,
Be my eyes and ears - I beseech you.

Source string:
常ならぬ気配は弱まるどころかさらに強くなる
あの娘が強い気を発してるが
それだけではない――
Translation:
The unusual presence doesn't weaken, it grows stronger.
The girl emits a strong spirit, but that's not the only thing--

Source string:
漂う穢れた気は――
魔物どもが発するもののようだ
Translation:
The impure aura emanating from them seems similar to what
monsters emit

Source string:
異国の娘から目を離すな――
罪はなくとも、災いを呼び寄せるのはあの娘だ
Translation:
Do not take your eyes off the foreign girl――
Even though she is innocent, it is that girl who brings disaster upon us

Source string: 黒き鎧の災いは――厄介だぞ
Translation: The curse of the black armor is troublesome, indeed

Source string:
覚者よ
若い人間の不安定な心――
Translation:
Arisen.
The unstable mind of a young human--

Source string:
その掌握は我が手に余る
目を離すなよ
Translation:
It's out of my control.
Keep an eye on it.

Source string:
ふむ――
我が力、自覚以上に失われているようだ
Translation:
Hmm.
I seem to have lost more of my power than I realized.

Source string:
しばし眠るが――
まどろみの中でも、気の変化はわかる
――案ずることはない
Translation:
I sleep for a while, but--
even in slumber, I know when your spirit has changed.
--don't worry...

Source string:
去った者のことは忘れることだ
頼りたいと思った時――
おまえの負けが決まるだろう
Translation:
Forget about those who have departed. 
The moment you think of depending on them...
is the moment you seal your defeat

Source string:
目下の敵の向こうに真の敵がいるはずだ
その姿を見逃すでないぞ
Translation:
Beyond the enemy at hand, there must be a true enemy.
Don't lose sight of that.

Source string:
覚者よ――
レスタニアを巡り、民の力となれ
我が加護を、あまねく伝えるのだ
Translation:
Arisen.
I call upon you to travel throughout the land of Lestania and help your people.
Spread my blessing far and wide.

Source string:
悪意は消えぬ――
そこかしこの闇に潜む黒き悪意――
Translation:
The malice will not disappear —
The black malice that lurks in every corner of the darkness.

Source string:
覚者よ――
自らの闇を凝視せよ――
Translation:
Arisen, 
Gaze upon your own darkness――

Source string:
覚者よ――
事を急げ――
邪気は日ごと強くなる――
Translation:
Arisen ones――
Hasten your actions――
The malevolent energy grows stronger every day――

Source string:
邪気が少しばかり薄らいだようだ
おかしい――
いや、息を潜めているつもりだろうか――
Translation:
It seems that the evil aura has slightly subsided.
Strange...
No, perhaps it's just hiding its presence...

Source string:
邪悪な気の流れ――
おまえたちも感ずることが
できればいいのだが――
Translation:
The flow of evil energy--
If you could feel it...
If only you could sense it, too.

Source string:
後悔の渦に足を取られるな
前を見た者だけが川を渡ることができるのだ
Translation:
Do not let yourself be dragged down by the whirlpool of regret.
Only those who look ahead can cross the river.

Source string:
ふん――
レオめ――
Translation:
Oh...
Leo...

Source string: ふむ――いいだろう――
Translation: Hmm... I see. Alright then...

Source string:
セシリーは覚者ではあるが
未だ途上の覚者――
我が覚者よ――その原因を探すのだ
Translation:
Cecily is an Arisen,
but still an aspiring one――
Oh, my Arisen―― search for the cause of it.

Source string:
覚者よ――
我が力、レスタニアの外へは届かぬ
大地と人を味方にして力とするがいい
Translation:
Arisen――
My power cannot reach beyond the borders of Lestania.
Let earth and man be your allies and your strength!

Source string:
フィンダムの竜への敬意――
けして忘れてはならぬ
Translation:
In reverence to the dragons of Phindym,
never to be forgotten.

Source string:
敵意――悪意――我ら竜が最も鋭敏に
感じる意識だ
Translation:
Arisen...
 Hostility - Malice - It is the sensation that we, the dragons, most keenly sense.

Source string: ふむ――異郷の匂いがするぞ
Translation: Hm... I sense the scent of a foreign land.

Source string:
竜を救え――
竜だけが我々に真実を語ることができるだろう
Translation:
Save the dragon--
Only the dragon will be able to tell us the truth.

Source string:
異変の原因は大地の病か――
ふむ――
覚者たちよ――これは根深いぞ――
Translation:
Is the cause of the anomaly the illness of the land--?
Hmm-- 
Oh, Arisen-- this is deeply rooted--

Source string: 《原始の雫》――はて、知らぬわ
Translation: 《Primeval Drops》 - Hm, I do not know.

Source string:
竜と大地と民――
崩れた均衡を調和の中に戻すのは
難しい――心して、事に当たれ
Translation:
Dragons, the earth, and the people--
To restore the collapsed balance harmoniously is difficult
--approach with care and sincerity.

Source string: 人は竜と大地の下僕のように思えるかもしれない
Translation: One may appear to be a servant of the dragon and the earth

Source string:
しかし、覚者よ――学ぶがよい
人の思いは、時に、竜をも狂わせるのだ
Translation:
However, Arisen, it is good to learn. 
The thoughts of man can sometimes drive even dragons mad.

Source string: （目を閉じ、何かを考えているようだ）
Translation: (With their eyes closed, they seem to be deep in thought)

Source string:
フィンダムの竜を見よ
意識が途切れ――乱れているようだ
Translation:
Behold the dragon of Phindym:
His consciousness is faltering - it appears to be in turmoil..

Source string:
竜に意識を向けろ
一時たりとも忘れるな
Translation: Direct your attention towards the dragon. Never forget, even for a moment.

Source string:
精霊竜は己を知っている
それ故、セシリーをここへ送り込んだのだ
――判断の正しさを見せてやれ
Translation:
The spirit dragon knows itself.
That's why they sent Cecily here.
--Show them the truth of their decision.

Source string:
道理を外れた世界も、これで理の中に
戻るだろう
Translation: Worlds that stray from order, will return to order with this.

Source string:
過去に類無き空の火球――
理の盤石が揺らいでいるというのか――
Translation:
A fireball in the sky like never before...
The very foundation of order is being shaken...

Source string:
理の揺らぎを感じる――
何が起こるというのか――
Translation:
I feel a shifting of order--
What is going to happen--?

Source string:
ふむ――匂いが変わったな
彼の地の竜力は焼けた匂いがする
Translation:
Hmm... The smell has changed. 
The dragon force of this land smells burnt.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の気配はないか――
気の乱れを見逃すなよ
Translation: No sign of the evil dragon...

Source string:
王子は、黒い竜に倒されたとする火竜と
如何ほどの時を過ごしたのだろうか――
Translation: How much time did the prince spend with the fire dragon, who was supposedly slain by the black dragon?

Source string: “悪しき竜”からの接触はないのか？
Translation: No contact from the "evil dragon"?

Source string:
アッカーシェランの習わしでは
王子が竜を継ぐはずだ
Translation:
According to Acre Selund custom,
the prince is supposed to inherit the dragon.

Source string:
おまえが“悪しき竜”ならどうする
野放しにしておくだろうか――
Translation:
What if you were an "evil dragon"?
I wouldn't let it run wild.

Source string:
アッカーシェランの幼き覚者を守り
覚者の道を教えられるのは
おまえたちの他にはいない
Translation:
To protect the young Arisen of Acre Selund,
and teach them the path of the Arisen,
there is no one else but you.

Source string: “悪しき竜”の目的が見えぬ
Translation: The purpose of the "evil dragon" is unclear

Source string:
よもやとは思うが――
ネド王子の言動に気をつけるがよい
Translation: While it may seem unlikely, it is advisable to be wary of Prince Nedo's demeanor and actions.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”が竜力を手放すとは思えん
となれば力尽くで奪うことになるのだろうか
果たして可能だろうか――
Translation:
I find it hard to believe that the "evil dragon" would willingly relinquish its power.
If that is the case, would it be possible to forcefully take it with all our strength?
Is it truly feasible...?

Source string:
“悪しき竜”が持つ竜力の行方が
アッカーシェランの未来を決めることに
なるだろう
Translation: The whereabouts of the "Evil Dragon" and its Dragon Force will determine the future of Acre Selund.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の思惑がどうであれ
その竜力はネド王子が継承可能となれば
目指す道はひとつだな

“悪しき竜”にはおごりがあるようだ
まるで人間のようだな
それがあやつの弱点かもしれない
Translation:
It seems that the "Evil Dragon" is conceited,
just like a human
That could be its weakness

Source string:
“悪しき竜”にはおごりがあるようだ
まるで人間のようだな
それがあやつの弱点かもしれない
Translation:
It seems that the "Evil Dragon" is conceited,
just like a human
That could be its weakness

Source string:
大きな戦いの時は“悪しき竜”の動向に
気を配るのだ
Translation: In the great battle, you must watch out for the "evil dragon."

Source string:
おまえたちの勝利は“悪しき竜”の思惑に
どう影響するのか――
Translation: How will your victory affect the evil dragon's agenda...

Source string: そろそろ姿を現すかもしれないぞ
Translation: Maybe they'll show themselves soon.

Source string:
いよいよ“悪しき竜”の本拠を目指すと聞く
気の変化を見逃すなよ
Translation:
I hear you're finally heading to the home of the "evil dragons"
Keep an eye out for disturbances in nature.

Source string:
黒い鎧の騎士――
正体の見極めを急いでくれ
Translation:
The knight in black armor--
I need you to hurry up and find out who he is.

Source string:
そうか――黒い鎧の騎士は
姿を見せぬか
Translation:
Well--the knight in black armor is
nowhere to be seen.

Source string: 竜力を――取り返さねば――
Translation: We must take back the dragon's force.

Source string: 声が――聞こえる――
Translation: I hear... voices...

Source string: ミシアル――
Translation: Mysial--

Source string:
あと少し――生かしてくれ――
やり残した――ことが――
Translation:
I need you to let me live a little longer.
I've got... some unfinished business....

Source string: 我が奪われし竜力はまだか――
Translation: My stolen dragon force is not yet--

Source string: 幸い竜力はすべて戻ったようだ
Translation: Fortunately, all dragon force seems to have returned.

Source string:
我が肉体が潤えばじきに大地も
元に戻るだろう
Translation:
If my body is nourished, 
soon the earth will also return to its original state.

Source string:
さあ、行くがよい
ここは――わたしはもう大丈夫だ
Translation:
Go on, go on, go.
Here, I'm all right now.

Source string:
王子の行動は自信と確信に満ちている
そうは思わないか？
Translation:
The prince's actions are filled with confidence and conviction.
Don't you think so?

Source string: “悪しき竜”はまだ動かぬか――
Translation: The "Evil Dragon" has not yet moved.

Source string:
王子の持つ笛とはいかなる理が
はたらくものなのだろうか――
Translation:
What logic is there in knowing that the prince has a flute...
I wonder if it works

Source string:
笛があれば竜に勝てると
王子は信じているようだが――
Translation: The prince seems to believe that with a flute, he can beat the dragon--

Source string:
敵の狙いが見えぬ――
理に傷を付け何を求めるのか――
Translation:
The enemy's aim is unclear--
What do they seek by undermining order?--

Source string:
“悪しき竜”をよく見ておいてくれ
同じことがこの地に起こらないとは
言えないからな
Translation: Be sure to take a good look at the 'Evil Dragon,' as we cannot say for certain that the same thing will not happen in this land.

Source string:
大切な話がある
心身ともに健やかな時に――頼む
Translation:
I have something important to tell you.
When you're healthy, both mentally and physically-- please.

Source string:
顔色が、すぐれぬようですね
どうかご自愛を
Translation:
You don't look well.
Please take care of yourself.

Source string: 白竜様の言葉こそ、導（しるべ）の光――
Translation: The words of the White Dragon are indeed the guiding light.

Source string:
迷った時は、耳をすませてください
白竜様の教えがあなたを導くでしょう
Translation: When in doubt, listen, and let the teachings of The White Dragon guide you!

Source string:
心の水面が平らかならば
本来、誰にでも竜の心は伝わるのです
Translation: If the surface of the heart is calm, then the true essence of the dragon's heart can be understood by anyone.

Source string:
いまは少し――心持ちが乱れています
お待ちを――
Translation:
I'm a little... distracted at the moment.
Please be patient.

Source string:
あなたは覚者です
苦難の道は――避けられません
Translation: You are an Arisen. The path of hardship cannot be avoided.

Source string:
人は弱きもの――それゆえ
その力を紡ぎ、束ねんとするのです
Translation: Humans are weak ―― that is why we weave together and gather our strength.

Source string:
信じましょう
白竜様の大いなる加護を
Translation:
Let us believe in 
the great blessings of the White Dragon.

Source string:
争いのない世を望みながらも、我らの手は
戦の血で汚れていく――虚しきことです
Translation:
We hope for a world without strife, but our hands are stained with the blood of
war - a vain thing!

Source string:
語るべき何か――伝えるべき何か――
大切な言葉はいつも白竜様が教えてくれます
そう――わたし自身の言葉ではないのです
Translation:
Something to tell — something to convey...
The important words are always taught by The White Dragon.
Yes — it is not my own words.

Source string: こんにちは、覚者さん
Translation: Hello, Arisen

Source string:
おかえりなさい
時に、皆さんとのご挨拶がまだでは？
Translation: Welcome back. By the way, have I greeted everyone yet?

Source string: 白竜様が回復される日までともに頑張りましょう
Translation: Until the day The White Dragon is restored, let's do our best together

Source string:
自由に振る舞う覚者が増えていますが
白竜様あっての覚者であることだけは
心に留めておいてください
Translation: There are more Arisen behaving freely, but please always keep in mind that it is thanks to The White Dragon that they exist.

Source string:
騎士団と覚者の揉め事に
巻き込まれてしまったと聞きました
大丈夫でしたか？
Translation: I heard that you got involved in a dispute between the Knights order and the Arisen. Are you okay?

Source string:
いがみ合いが元気の源だという人もいるようですが
わたしにはまったく理解できません――
Translation:
Some people seem to think that bickering is the source of energy.
I don't understand it at all--I've never understood it.

Source string:
アルヴァーには会えましたか？
早く契約までいけると良いですね
Translation:
Did you get to meet Alvar?
I hope you can get to the contract soon.

Source string:
わたしは契約のお手伝いをすることに
なっていますので、その時を楽しみにして
待っていますね
Translation:
I'm supposed to help with the contract
, so I'm looking forward to that time

Source string:
お手伝いできてうれしく思っています
これで押しも押されもせぬ立派な覚者ですね
Translation:
I'm happy to help
Now you're a well-known Arisen!

Source string:
覚者になってまだ日が浅いのに
《ブラッドオーブ》を持ち帰るなんて――
Translation: Even though it has only been a short time since becoming an Arisen, I can't believe you brought back a "Blood Orb"

Source string:
白竜様がこっそりご加護をくださったのかも
しれませんね
Translation: Maybe the White Dragon has secretly given us a blessing

Source string:
オークの臭いがするなどと騒いだりして
ごめんなさい
あの臭いが恐ろしくてならないのです
Translation:
I'm sorry I made such a fuss about the smell of orcs.
I'm sorry...
I'm afraid of that smell.

Source string:
メイリーフの素性を知ったのですか？
あの一族は、今や、このレスタニアの宝石です
Translation:
Have you learned of Mayleaf's true identity?
That family is now the jewel of this Lestania.

Source string:
魔物たちの標的になっても不思議では
ありません
どうか、気にしてあげてくださいね
Translation:
No wonder they were the target of demons.
Please, please, please take care of them!

Source string:
白竜様の回復は一進一退――
特に石化の症状は油断がなりません
Translation:
The White Dragon's recovery has been a step in the right direction--
The petrification symptoms can be especially tricky!

Source string: 《ブラッドオーブ》がもっと手に入れば――
Translation: If only I could get more Blood Orbs.

Source string:
イリスの様子はやはり変ですね
わたしが話したがっていると伝えてくれますか？
Translation:
Iris is still acting weird.
Can you tell her I want to talk to her?

Source string:
レオが白竜様を見つめていました
思い詰めているようでしたが――
Translation:
Leo was staring at The White Dragon
He seemed to be pondering--

Source string:
大変な戦いだったと聞いています
断ち切られた人生も多かったと――
Translation:
I hear it was a tough fight,
and a lot of lives were cut short--

Source string:
でも、白竜様に捧げられた命は
けして無駄にはなりません
Translation: But the lives dedicated to the White Dragon will not be in vain.

Source string:
白竜様が空を飛ぶお姿――
いつか見たいものですね
Translation:
I hope to see the White Dragon flying in the sky--
one day!

Source string:
エルフの仲間が面倒を見るということであれば
その方がメイリーフにとっては良いことなのかも
しれませんね――
Translation:
If it means that the elf's friends will be taken care of,
it might be better for Mayleaf.
Maybe--

Source string: イリスは――心配ですね
Translation: Iris--I'm worried.

Source string: 今後もこのようなことが起こるのでしょうか――
Translation: Will this continue to happen in the future--?

Source string:
下の街の皆さんが安心して暮らせるように
どうかよろしくお願いしますね
Translation:
I hope everyone in the city below can live in peace.
Please do help us to do so.

Source string:
持ち去ったエルフの命――
敵はいったいどうするつもりでしょう
Translation:
The life of an elf taken away...
What will the enemy do?

Source string:
強く、澄み切った命でした
彼の命のあり方は素晴らしい
Translation:
It was a strong, clear life.
The way he lived his life was amazing.

Source string: ――感謝しなくてはなりませんね
Translation: I have to say--thank you for that.

Source string:
白竜様の回復にはまだ時間がかかるようです
これからもわたしたちでお守りしなくては――
Translation:
It will take some time for The White Dragon to recover.
We must continue to protect him--

Source string: 無理をきいてくれてありがとうございました
Translation: Thank you for taking on the impossible.

Source string:
少し、甘えてしまったかもしれません
これからは気をつけますね
Translation:
I may have spoiled it a little
I'll be careful from now on.

Source string: イリスのことを聞きましたが――
Translation: I heard about Iris--

Source string:
もう、昔のようには戻れないのですか？
あなたはどんな印象を受けましたか？
Translation:
Can we go back to the way things used to be?
What impression did you get?

Source string: 敵はディアマンテス――
Translation: The enemy is Diamantes--

Source string:
オークの時のようにうまく想像できませんが
でも、白竜様が強い憎しみの気を放っている――
それだけはわかるのです
Translation:
I can't envision it as well as I did with the orcs.
But The White Dragon is radiating a strong aura of hatred--
that much I know!

Source string:
ああ、ごめん
今は特に話すことはないよ
Translation:
Oh, sorry
I don't really have anything to tell you right now.

Source string:
君と雑談？
いいね！　よし、共通の話題を探そうよ
Translation:
Having a little chat with you?
Great!　Okay, let's find something we have in common.

Source string:
すまないけど、少し考えたいことがあるんだ
後で話そうよ
Translation:
Sorry, I just have a few things to think about.
We can talk later.

Source string:
おや、疲れたのかい？
覚者も無敵ってわけじゃないんだな
Translation:
Oh, you're tired, aren't you?
I guess even the Arisen aren't invincible.

Source string:
適材適所って言うだろ？
そう、僕は武ではなく、知で攻めるのさ
Translation:
You know what they say about the right person for the right job?
Yes, I attack with wisdom, not military prowess.

Source string:
常識にとらわれないこと
それが、平凡を非凡に変えるんだ
Translation:
Thinking outside the box 
That's what transforms ordinary into extraordinary

Source string:
不安と期待が入り交じるこの気持ち――
説明が難しいね
Translation:
This feeling of mixed anxiety and anticipation--
It's hard to explain.

Source string:
まだ読んでいない書物、まだ試していない実験――
心残りがあるうちは、死ねないよ
Translation:
Books you haven't read yet, experiments you haven't tried yet--
You can't die while you have regrets.

Source string:
この世界は好きかい？
僕は好きだよ
知れば知るほど――もっと知りたくなる
Translation:
Do you like this world?
I do.
The more you know-- the more you want to know.

Source string:
思い立ったら、すぐに行動！
待っていても発見は無いからね
Translation:
When you have an idea, act on it immediately!
You won't find anything if you wait.

Source string: ん？　どうしたんだい？
Translation: Hmm?　What's wrong?

Source string:
やあ、新人さん
最初は誰彼かまわず顔を売っておくといいよ
Translation: Hello, new person. It's good to make yourself known to everyone at first, regardless of who they are.

Source string:
《ブラッドオーブ》のことは
常に気にしておくといいよ
見つけると確実に一目置かれるからね
Translation:
It's good to always keep in mind about the 《Blood Orb》,
 because when you find it, you're sure to be admired.

Source string:
覚者と騎士団の反目に巻き込まれて
僕は処世術を学んだんだ
Translation:
I learned the art of worldly wisdom
being caught up in the conflict between the Arisen and the knights.

Source string:
――と前向きに考えることにするよ
これも処世術と言えないこともないね
Translation:
--I'm going to try to think positively
and this is another way to get by, I guess.

Source string:
――！？　ああ、ごめんごめん
ちょっと考え事をね
Translation:
――!? Ah, sorry, sorry
I was just thinking about something

Source string:
ジョゼフ様の助手になって以来初めての
大仕事を仰せつかって、その計画をね――
ふふふ――
Translation: Since becoming Joseph's assistant, this is the first big job I've been entrusted with, and I am now tasked with the planning... hehehe...

Source string: 空から降ってきた巨大な石碑――
Translation: A gigantic stone monument fell from the sky...

Source string:
まだ正体はわからないんだけど
どこかに落ちたらしいんだ
うわさか何か聞いてないかい？
Translation:
I still do not know what it truly is, but
it seems to have fallen somewhere
Have you heard any rumors or something?

Source string:
反省しています――はい
ああ、君か――また叱られるのかと思ったよ
Translation:
I'm reflecting on it--yes.
Oh, it's you--I thought I was going to be scolded again.

Source string:
いや、君にも心配かけたよね
迎えに来てくれてありがとう
本当に感謝しているよ
Translation:
No, I caused you to worry too, didn't I?
Thank you for coming to pick me up.
I really appreciate it.

Source string:
ごめん！
アークの調査報告が最優先でね
あちこち気が回らないんだよ
Translation:
Sorry!
The Ark's investigation report is the top priority.
I can't focus on other things.

Source string:
アーク調査の報告書がまだだというのに
古文書の解読まで――
Translation: Despite the fact that the report on the Ark investigation is not yet complete, up until the deciphering of the ancient documents--

Source string:
でも、君が持ち帰った古文書は面白そうで――
まずいな――ジョゼフ様に叱られるよ
Translation:
But, the old document you took home seems interesting...
Uh-oh... I'm going to get scolded by Joseph, aren't I?

Source string:
イリスとは話したかい？
なんだか避けられているような気が
しないでもないんだけど――
Translation:
Did you talk to Iris?
I can't help but feel like she's avoiding me.

Source string:
もしかしたら、僕が覚者の力に
なれるのかもしれないな――
Translation: Perhaps, I may be able to become a powerful Arisen..

Source string:
いささか――怖いね
でも、ほら、白竜様がお待ちだよ
Translation: It's a little scary―― but look, The White Dragon is waiting for you.

Source string:
どうだい？
覚者の生活には慣れたかな？
Translation:
How about it?
Are you used to the life of an Arisen?

Source string:
ちょうど君が覚者になった頃からこれまでとは
少し違う事件が起こるようになってきた
オークの活動が活発になったり――
ほら、アークの出現もそうだね
Translation:
Since you became an Arisen, there have been different incidents occurring from before until now. 
The Orcs have become more active, and, well, the appearance of the Ark, too.

Source string:
そして、白竜様の回復を促す新しい方法も
見つかったみたいだ
これからも、もっと色々なことが
起こりそうな気がするよ
Translation:
And it seems that a new method to encourage the recovery of The White Dragon has been found.
I feel like more things are going to happen from now on.

Source string:
メイリーフを連れ出したフードの女って
やっぱり彼女だよな――
Translation:
The woman in the hood who took Mayleaf out...
I knew it was her.

Source string:
ディアマンテス――
イリスは確かにそう言ってたよね？
Translation:
Diamantes - 
Iris did say that, right?

Source string:
あははは――
こんなに神殿の近くが戦場になるなんて――
ああ、怖かった
Translation:
Ahahaha――
Who would have thought that the area near the temple would turn into a battlefield――
Oh, how scary.

Source string:
さびしいね――
仲良くなれそうな気がしたんだけど――
いや、仲良かったよね――
Translation:
It's lonely, isn't it...
I felt like we could become close...
No, we were close, right...

Source string:
命は白竜様の役に立ったとしても
キースヒルトが知っていた知識、知恵――
全部消えてしまった
Translation:
Even if the life was useful to Master White Dragon,
the knowledge, the wisdom that Keith Hilt knew--
it's all gone.

Source string:
やっぱり僕は生きているキースヒルトと
もっと話したかったよ――
Translation:
I knew I wanted to talk more with Keith Hilt.
I just wish I could have told you more--

Source string:
会議だなんて――
これは時間がかかるよ
Translation: A meeting? Oh, this is going to take some time.

Source string:
そんなことしている場合じゃないと思うけど
時間をもらえるのはありがたいことだから
僕は僕で独自に調べようと思っている
Translation: I don't think this is the time for that, but it's nice to have some time. I am thinking of researching on my own.

Source string:
まだ読み切れていない古文書もあるし
ここまで実際に体験したことを
評価し直す必要があるかもしれない
Translation: There are some ancient documents that have not yet been fully read, and I may need to reevaluate what I've actually done so far.

Source string:
僕も調査に行きたいんだよね――
でもここで騒ぐと余計に面倒な立場に
なってしまいそうだから我慢しているんだ
Translation:
I want to go investigate too--
but I'm holding back because making a fuss here might put me in an even more troublesome position

Source string:
おかしいよ――
第一のアークの調査は僕が担当したんだ
Translation:
That's strange--
I was in charge of investigating the first Ark.

Source string:
今度の調査だって僕が行けば前回との
比較ができたのに――
意見も全然聞いてもらえないし――はぁ
Translation:
If I were to go on this investigation, I would have been able to compare it to the last time -- 
But I don't get listened to at all -- sigh.

Source string:
僕は確かに錬金術師の末裔さ
でも、だからなんだと言うんだろうね
Translation:
I am indeed a descendant of an alchemist,
but so what?

Source string:
僕のことはジョゼフ様が一番よく知っている
はずなのに――
Translation:
You know me better than anyone, Joseph.
I should have known...

Source string:
気づいていたのに――
イリスは少し変わったなって
気づいていたんだ
Translation:
I had noticed--
that Iris had changed a little

Source string:
それなのに僕は――
悔やんでも悔やみきれないよ
Translation: And yet, I can't help but regret and regret.

Source string:
僕はね――もう後悔はしたくない
予兆には気づいていたのに――
遠慮する必要は何もなかったのに――
Translation:
I don't--I don't want any more regrets.
I knew the signs were there.
There was no need to hesitate...

Source string:
もう友達をなくすのは絶対に嫌だから
思ったことは口にするつもりだよ
Translation: I absolutely don't want to lose any more friends, so I intend to speak my mind.

Source string:
ここでジッとしてはいられない
僕もメルゴダへ行く！　絶対行く！
Translation: I can't stay still here. I'm going to Mergoda! I'm definitely going!

Source string:
ディアマンテスに対抗する錬金術師が
ちゃんといたことがうれしくてね
Translation: I am happy that there was an alchemist who could oppose Diamantes.

Source string:
だから僕は、こっち側の人たちと神殿の
架け橋になろうと思うんだ
Translation: That's why I want to become a bridge between the people on this side and the temple.

Source string:
君も協力してくれるよね？
もう結構長い付き合いだもの――
僕に野心がないことなんてわかってるだろ？
Translation:
You'll also help me, right?
We've been together for quite a long time, after all...
You know that I don't have any ambitions, don't you?

Source string: 時は来た――だね
Translation: The time has come--right?

Source string:
ずっと考えているんだけど――
ディアマンテスは僕が跡を継ぎたがるって
本気で考えたのかな――
Translation:
I keep thinking--
that Diamantes wants me to follow in his footsteps.
Did he really think--?

Source string:
だとしたら、哀れだね
出会ったばかりの僕しか後継者候補は
いないのか――ってさ
Translation:
If that's the case, it's pitiful, isn't it?
Are there really no other candidates for the successor besides me, someone you just met?

Source string:
嵐の中を出かけていった騎士たちには
頭が下がるよ
Translation:
To the knights who went out into the storm,
I salute you

Source string:
次は覚者の番だね
くれぐれも、気をつけて
Translation:
Next is the turn of the Arisen,
Please be careful.

Source string:
悪いね
ついついレオのことを考えてしまうんだ
こんな時にどうして留守なんだってね
Translation:
It's bad, isn't it?
I can't help but think about Leo.
Why is he absent at a time like this?

Source string:
他の人も思いは同じだと思うよ
つまり――
僕が言いたいのは、レオの後任は大変だけど
頑張ってくれってことさ
Translation:
I think other people feel the same way.
In other words--
What I want to say is, it's tough to be Leo's successor,
but I hope you will do your best.

Source string:
問題は、君とガルドリンが行ったという
島の場所だね
Translation:
The problem is the location of the
island you and Gurdolin say you went to.

Source string:
レスタニア中の海図がこの神殿に
集まることになっているんだ
船乗りたちと一緒に、その海図とにらめっこさ
Translation:
The charts of all of Lestania are to be gathered here in this temple.
I'll be poring over them with the sailors.

Source string:
大海原に浮かぶ島を見つけるなんて
そう簡単じゃない
Translation: It's not easy to find an island floating in the open sea.

Source string:
覚悟はしていたけどね――
いやいや、挫けてなるものか！
Translation:
I was prepared, you know――
No, no, I will not be deterred!

Source string:
島が見つかってホッとしているよ
肩の荷が下りたというかね
ここだけの話――
ジョゼフ様は僕を試しているね
Translation:
I feel relieved that the island has been found.
It's like a burden has been lifted off my shoulders.
Just between you and me--
Master Joseph is testing me.

Source string:
将来の神官にふさわしいかどうか――
ノドから手が出るほど欲しい地位だったけど
今はどうかな――
Translation:
Whether I am suitable to be a future priest--
Although I desired the position so much that I would give my right arm for it,
I wonder now, how about it--

Source string:
逐次攻略というか各個撃破というか
物事はひとつずつ解決するのが良策だと
主張する人もいるけどね――
Translation: Rather than calling it a step-by-step strategy, it's more like defeating each individual. Some people argue that it's best to solve things one by one, but I'm not sure that it's a good idea.

Source string:
僕は混乱の中で解決を模索するのが好きなんだ
つまり、この慌ただしさも僕の味方さ
Translation:
I enjoy seeking solutions in the midst of confusion.
In other words, this busyness is also on my side.

Source string:
島の調査は引き続きやっているよ
いい報告ができればいいんだけど
少々魔物が多くてね
Translation:
We are still conducting investigations on the island.
I hope we can make a good report,
but there are quite a few monsters.

Source string:
騎士団が時々掃討作戦を展開しているから
まあ、気長にね――
ああ気長！　僕たちの苦手なやつだよね
くう――
Translation:
Because the Knights sometimes conduct sweeps
Well, be patient--
Oh, patience!　We're not very good at that.
(sigh)

Source string:
レオが匿っているという人と話せれば
もっと色々と分かるのだろうけど
今はそれよりも侵食魔退治だね
まったく、次から次へと――
Translation: If I could talk to the person Leo is hiding with, I would probably understand more. But right now, it's more about defeating the Corruption. Seriously, it's one thing after another--

Source string:
例の島をね、もっとよく調べようと思うんだ
戦いは一段落ついたのかもしれないけど
調査は何も終わってないからね
Translation: I think I'll continue to investigate that island more thoroughly. Although the fighting may have come to a halt, the investigation is far from over.

Source string:
僕も島に乗り込みたいと思っていたけど
まだ時期尚早のようだね
もう少し状況が落ち着くのを待つよ
Translation:
I also wanted to join you on the island, but it seems it's still too early.
I'll wait a little longer for the situation to settle down.

Source string:
島に現れた魔物はこれまでの侵食魔とは
かなり様子が違うとか？
Translation: I hear the monsters that appeared on the island are considerably different from the previous Corruption?

Source string:
黒騎士と魔物の関係という観点から見ると
新手の方が、より黒騎士に近い存在という
ことかなあ
Translation: From the perspective of the relationship between the Black Knight and monsters, it could be said that the newcomer is a presence closer to the Black Knight.

Source string:
ロイグが早くよくなることを祈るよ
まあ、ロイグのためというよりは
かなり利己的な理由だけどね
Translation:
I hope Loeg gets better soon.
Well, it's not so much for Loeg's sake
but rather for quite selfish reasons.

Source string:
あやふやとはいえ、ロイグの方が色々と
覚えているからね
その情報だけでも、ありがたいと思わなくちゃ
Translation: Even if uncertain, Loeg remembers various things, so I must be grateful for that information alone.

Source string:
セシリーは深手を負っている
致命傷がなければ命は助かるだろうけど
回復には長い時間がかかるよ
Translation: Cecily has suffered a serious injury. If there is no fatal wound, she should survive, but recovery will take a long time.

Source string: まあ、今は生きのびてくれることを祈ろう
Translation: Well, let's pray that they'll survive.

Source string:
悔しいなあ
僕には知らないことがいっぱいある
それを思い知らされて――
ああ、悔しいよ
Translation:
It's frustrating.
There are so many things I don't know.
Being reminded of that...
Ah, it's frustrating.

Source string:
僕は君たちの一歩先のことを考えるとしよう
それが僕の仕事だよね？
Translation:
Let's say I'm one step ahead of you guys
That's my job, right?

Source string:
あのゲートはフィンダムの竜の力が
生み出したものだ
僕らの心意気だけじゃどうにもならないよ
Translation:
That gate is the result of the power of Phindym's dragon.
It can't be done with just our determination alone.

Source string:
ゲートの継続性について
もう少し確信が得られないと
僕は向こうへは行けないな
Translation:
Regarding the sustainability of the gate,
I cannot go over there without a little more certainty.

Source string: 覚者じゃないこの身が恨めしいよ
Translation: This body that is not an Arisen is filled with resentment.

Source string:
ジョゼフ様の話を聞いていると
まるで僕たちがフィンダムへの侵略者のように
思えてくるよ
Translation:
When listening to Joseph's story,
it feels as if we are invaders to Phindym.

Source string:
向こうとこっち――
立場は五分と五分――この考え方が
平和共存への道に繋がると思うんだ
Translation:
Over there and here, 
The positions are evenly split—I believe that this way of thinking 
Leads to peaceful coexistence.

Source string:
よく考えると、このレスタニアでも
竜の不調は続いているわけだよね
Translation: When I think about it, even in this Lestania, the dragon's condition continues to worsen, doesn't it?

Source string:
となると、レスタニアの混乱がこの程度で
済んでいるのは、とてつもなく運が
いいのかもしれないね
Translation: If that's the case, it might be incredibly lucky that the chaos in Lestania has been settled to this extent.

Source string:
フィンダムを竜力が巡る仕組みは
こっちとは少し違うようだね
Translation: The mechanism of Dragon Force circulating around Phindym seems to be a little different from here.

Source string:
竜と樹が循環と浄化を分け合っているというか――
竜への異存が少ないということなのかなあ
Translation: I wonder if it means that the dragon and the tree are sharing circulation and purification - or maybe it means that there is little objection towards the dragon.

Source string:
聞くところによると、セシリーのお父さんは
戦士でもなんでもない、普通の人らしいね
Translation: According to what I've heard, Cecily's father is not a warrior or anything, he seems to be an ordinary person.

Source string:
君だって、不安だろう？
早いところ、行った方がいいよ
Translation:
You're worried, too, aren't you?
You'd better get there as soon as possible.

Source string:
さあ、みんなが待ってるよ？
君がなんとかしてくれる――
そう思っている連中も多いはずさ
Translation:
Come on, the guys are waiting for you, okay?
You'll handle it--
I'm sure a lot of them think so.

Source string:
ロイグはガラダ族長たちのことを
快く思っていなかった
いや、逆恨みしていたという感じかな？
Translation:
Loeg did not have a favorable opinion of the Gearóid tribal leaders.
No, it's more like he held a grudge against them, I guess?

Source string:
その心の暗い部分に黒騎士が
入り込んだ――か
Translation: Did the Black Knight enter the dark depths of your heart?

Source string:
それにしてもあのロイグがね――
心根のいい奴に思えたけどなあ
僕の人を見る目もまだまだだね
Translation:
That Loeg, though...
He seemed like a good-hearted guy.
I still have a long way to go in judging people.

Source string:
回り道はあったけど、いよいよだね
良い報告を待っているよ
Translation:
There was a detour, but now it's time.
I'll be waiting for good news!

Source string:
浄化は始まっているんだろう？
進捗状況が気になるところだね
Translation:
I assume the purification has begun?
I'm curious to see the progress.

Source string:
くれぐれも気をつけてくれよ
無事にここへ戻って来ると約束してほしい
君たちは歴史の証言者なんだからね
Translation: Please be careful and make sure to return here safely. I want you to promise me that. You are witnesses to history, after all.

Source string:
これからフィンダムへの渡航者が増えるだろうね
もちろん僕も準備を進めているんだ
Translation: The number of travelers to Phindym is likely to increase from now on, and of course, I am also preparing for it.

Source string:
覚者が一緒じゃないと戻ってこられないから
君たち、その時はよろしくたのむよ
Translation: I cannot return without the Arisen being present, so I ask you all to take care of me at that time.

Source string:
フィンダムで起こったことを記録して
後世に残そうと思っているんだけど――
Translation: I want to record what happened in Phindym and leave it for future generations to see--

Source string: また何か起こりそうな気配だね
Translation: It feels like something is about to happen again.

Source string:
アッカーシェランか
自然環境はこっちとほぼ同じなんだね
つまり、理と竜の世界ということか
Translation:
Is this Acre Selund?
The natural environment here is almost the same, right?
In other words, it's a world of order and dragons.

Source string:
アッカーシェランの状況は良くないみたいだけど
それでも君たちはレスタニアの代表なんだ
Translation: The situation in Acre Selund doesn't seem to be good, but even so, you are representatives of Lestania.

Source string: 可能な限り、いい顔でたのむよ
Translation: Please do it with a smile, if possible

Source string: とにもかくにも今はネド王子だね
Translation: In any case, you are Prince Nedo now.

Source string:
解放軍はここに来てずいぶん敵を
刺激したからね
反撃は覚悟しないと
Translation: The Liberation Army has certainly stimulated the enemy since they have arrived here. We must be prepared for counterattacks.

Source string:
盗賊と言えば荒くれ者と相場が決まっている
本拠地に乗り込むんだから
言動には気をつけて
Translation:
When it comes to thieves, they are often considered rough individuals.
Since we are infiltrating their headquarters,
be careful with your words and actions.

Source string: ガルドリンには特に強く言っておかないと
Translation: I need to make sure to tell Gurdolin firmly.

Source string:
盗賊の次はオークの本拠地だって？
君たちはそっちの方が慣れているかな
Translation: Next is the orc's stronghold, huh? I wonder if you guys are more familiar with that.

Source string:
ネド王子と解放軍が合流したんだ
敵の警戒も厳しくなるだろうね
Translation:
Prince Nedo and the liberation army have joined forces
Enemy vigilance will also intensify, I suppose.

Source string:
アッカーシェランで“悪しき竜”との
全面戦争が始まるのかな
Translation: Is a full-scale war against the "Evil Dragon" about to begin in Acre Selund?

Source string:
アッカーシェランとも、フィンダムのような
友好的な関係になれるといいね
Translation: I hope we can establish a friendly relationship with Acre Selund, just like with Phindym.

Source string:
アッカーシェランに灯った希望の火を
消してはいけないよ
Translation: Do not extinguish the flame of hope that has been lit in Acre Selund!

Source string:
君たち自身も希望なんだ
それを忘れないでくれ
Translation:
You yourselves also have hope,
Please do not forget that.

Source string:
ひとつだけわかったのは――
“悪しき竜”はすぐに君たちを亡き者に
するつもりはないということ
Translation: The only thing I understood is that the "Evil Dragon" has no intention of taking you out immediately.

Source string: これは悪くない事だと思うよ
Translation: I think this is not a bad thing.

Source string:
今のジョゼフ様は猜疑心の塊だよ
何を言い出しても驚かないことだね
Translation: Joseph is currently a bundle of suspicion. It's not surprising no matter what he says.

Source string:
今のジョゼフ様は猜疑心の塊だよ
何を言い出しても驚かないことだね
Translation: Joseph is currently a bundle of suspicion. It's not surprising no matter what he says.

Source string: 本格的な城攻めを前にしての休暇かな？
Translation: Is it a vacation before a serious castle attack?

Source string:
レスタニアは平和なものさ
気分転換に散歩でもどうだい？
Translation:
Lestania is a peaceful place.
How about taking a walk for a change of mood?

Source string:
奪回した城を拠点に力を蓄えて
“悪しき竜”の討伐を目指すのだよね？
Translation:
To gather strength at the recaptured castle
and aim to defeat the "Evil Dragon," right?

Source string:
道のりはまだまだありそうだから
じっくり行かないとね
Translation:
The journey seems to still have a long way to go,
so we must proceed carefully.

Source string:
今朝、ぶつけて爪が欠けてしまってね
嫌な予感がするんだ
Translation:
I bumped it this morning and chipped a nail.
I have a bad feeling about this.

Source string:
謎の騎士の話題で持ちきりだね
正体はどうあれ、強敵に違いないから
万事準備怠りなく、だよ？
Translation: The topic of the mysterious knight is all the buzz, right? Regardless of their identity, they are definitely a formidable opponent. So, let's prepare ourselves for anything, okay?

Source string:
王都の戦いが終わらないと
落ち着かないよね
Translation: I can't calm down until the battle in the Royal Capital is over.

Source string:
今は解放軍と一緒に王都奪回の戦いに
専念するのがいいと思うよ
Translation: I think it's best to focus on the battle to recapture the Royal Capital with the Liberation Army.

Source string:
考え得る対策を書きだして
とにかく吟味する
Translation: Write down all possible measures and thoroughly scrutinize them.

Source string:
そして、良さそうなのがあれば
君たちにも伝えるからね
Translation:
And if there is something good,
I will also let you guys know.

Source string:
あれこれ書物に当たっているけど
こんな危機はかつてなくて
白竜様と僕たちが初めてのようだ
Translation: I'm hitting various books and such, but this crisis is unprecedented. It feels like The White Dragon and we are experiencing something for the first time.

Source string:
頼むよ――
黒騎士の剣を取り戻して
Translation:
Please, I beg you-
Retrieve the sword of The Black Knight.

Source string: さあ、急いで
Translation: Come on, hurry up.

Source string:
君たちを助けるセシリーの竜力は
あくまでも仮初めの力
そう長くは続かないと思うよ
Translation: Cecily's Dragon Force, which helps you, is merely a temporary power. I don't think it will last long.

Source string:
レスタニアの命運は尽きる寸前だった――
あはは――今になって脚が震えるよ
Translation:
Lestania's fate was on the brink of exhaustion ――
Ahaha―― My legs are trembling now.

Source string:
ネド王子はたしかにまだ子供だけど
聞く限り、無茶はしない印象だよ
Translation: Prince Nedo is certainly still a child, but from what I hear, he gives the impression of not doing anything reckless.

Source string:
姿を消したとなると、何か深い事情が
あるんだろうね
解決可能なことだといいけど――
Translation: If he disappeared, there must have been some deep reason behind it. I hope it's something that can be resolved.

Source string:
ジョゼフ様がまたなんか言ってるだろ？
人を疑うのが性分なんだね
Translation:
Joseph is saying something again, right?
It's in his nature to suspect others.

Source string:
これは王子なりによく考えた末の
行動だと思うよ
そうじゃないと、君たちから聞いていた
王子の印象と合わないからね
Translation: I think this is an action that the prince has carefully considered. Otherwise, it wouldn't match the impression of the prince that I have heard from you.

Source string: 王子には何か目的があるのだろうけど――
Translation: I'm sure the prince has a purpose, but--

Source string:
その目的を果たしたあとは
どんな顔をして仲間のところへ戻る気で
いるんだろうね
あまり考えていないのかな
Translation:
After achieving that goal,
I wonder what expression they will have
when they return to their comrades.
I wonder if they haven't thought about it much.

Source string: 火垂れ山は“悪しき竜”の住み処だよね
Translation: Firefall Mountain is the dwelling place of the "Evil Dragon," right?

Source string:
いつ襲撃されてもおかしくないから
四方八方、気を抜かないようにね
Translation: Since we could be attacked at any time, let's stay on high alert in all directions

Source string: 行ったり来たり、ご苦労だね
Translation: Going back and forth, you've had it tough.

Source string:
以前はうらやましいと思ったけど
最近は――ああ、僕も歳を取ったのかな
Translation:
I used to think it was enviable
But lately ―― ah, I guess I've also gotten older

Source string:
早くアッカーシェランへ向かった方がいいよ
状況は王子の動き次第で変わるんだから
Translation: It would be better to quickly head towards Acre Selund; the situation can change depending on the prince's movements.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”は力だけを与えられた子供――
そんなふうに考えられないかな？
Translation: Can't we consider the "Evil Dragon" as a child who has been bestowed with power alone?

Source string:
力だけで知識も経験も与えられなかったから
釣り合いが取れなくて――
いやいや、問題はそこじゃないか！
Translation:
They gave no knowledge, no experience, just power.
There was no balance...
No, no, no, that's not the point!

Source string:
誰が与えたか――与えなかったのか――
考えるべきなのは背後にいたのは
誰かって話だよね
Translation:
Who gave -- or didn't give --
What we should be thinking about is who was behind it

Source string: 何か心配事でも？
Translation: What's worrying you?

Source string:
気になることがあるのなら
さっさと解決しておくことを薦めるよ
Translation:
If there is something on your mind,
I recommend resolving it promptly.

Source string:
おまえたち覚者の力こそ
我々に残された希望だ
Translation:
The power of you Arisen is
the hope that remains for us.

Source string:
ふむ、年かな――
話したいことがあったはずだが、忘れてしまったよ
Translation:
Hmm, I wonder... Must be getting old――
I had something I wanted to talk about, but I forgot.

Source string:
白竜の意思を完全に理解することは難しい
たとえ巫女でもな
Translation:
It is difficult to fully understand the intentions of the White Dragon,
even if one is a priestess.

Source string:
我々は常に己を律し、不測の事態に備えねばならん
わかってはいるが――なかなか、なぁ
Translation: We must always discipline ourselves and be prepared for unforeseen circumstances. I understand this, but... it's quite difficult.

Source string:
覚者よ、頼んだぞ
おまえたちの働きが大勢を決める
Translation:
Arisen, I'm counting on you.
Your work will determine the outcome for many.

Source string:
竜の意志を紡ぐこと
それが我らを災いから救うのだ
Translation:
To weave the will of the dragon
That is what will save us from disaster

Source string:
どうした、不安なことがあるのか？
まず、おまえたちが落ち着かなくては
Translation:
What's wrong? Is there something that's making you anxious?
First, you guys need to calm down.

Source string:
悠々と、ただそこにある世界を前に――
我々はなんと小さく、稚拙な存在なのだろうな
Translation:
In front of the serene and simply existing world--
We are so small and immature, aren't we?

Source string:
わしほどの激動を生きた神官はいないだろうが
はて、喜ぶべきか嘆くべきか――
Translation: There could be no priest who has experienced such turmoil as I have. Well, should I rejoice or should I lament?

Source string:
日がな一日ここに立ち、竜を思い、政を思う
おまえたちを思う時間はほとんどないが、まあ許せ
Translation:
I stand here all day long, thinking about dragons and thinking about politics.
I don't have much time to think about you all, but well, it's forgivable.

Source string: 理の外の世界――
Translation: The world outside of Order--

Source string:
そんな世界があるとして、そこでは
どんな道理がはたらくのか――想像もつかんわ
Translation:
If there is such a world,
I can't imagine what kind of reasoning would work there--I can't imagine it!

Source string:
ああ、すまない
考えごとをしていてな
Translation: Ah, sorry. I was lost in thought.

Source string:
オーク臭いようだな
神殿では気をつけた方がいい
Translation:
I smell orcs in the air.
You better be careful in the temple.

Source string: 時間を見つけて外へ出てみるんだな
Translation: Find some time and go outside and see for yourself.

Source string:
覚者を育てるのは、結局のところ経験だ
いや、これは覚者に限らないがな
Translation: The cultivation of an Arisen ultimately comes down to experience. No, this applies not only to Arisens.

Source string:
近々、ある調査団を派遣することになってな
その人選で、いささか多忙だ
Translation:
I'm sending a survey team soon
and I'm somewhat busy with the selection process.

Source string:
ポーンとの契約は進んでいるか？
終わればいよいよ一人前の覚者だな
Translation: Is the contract with the Pawn progressing? Once it's finished, you'll finally become a full-fledged Arisen.

Source string:
ふむ――
順調に覚者としての階段を登っているようだな
頼もしいことだ
Translation:
Hmm―
It seems like you're steadily climbing the steps as an Arisen.
That's reliable.

Source string: 砦との往復は何度目だ？
Translation: How many times have you been to the fort and back?

Source string:
砦に限らず、あちこち自分の足で
行ってみることが大切だ
地図を眺めていても頭に入らんだろうからな
Translation:
It is important to go and see for yourself, not just in the fortress but also in various places.
Even if you look at the map, it won't make sense in your head.

Source string:
次から次へと――どうしてくれようか
オークどもの対処だけでも大変なのに
今度はアークだと？
Translation:
From one thing to another―― how are we supposed to handle this?
Just dealing with the orcs themselves is already tough enough,
and now it's the Ark?

Source string:
おまえも忙しくなるだろうから休める時には
休んでおくことだ
Translation:
You'll be busy too, so when you can take a break,
take it.

Source string:
メイリーフの正体は他言無用
約束だからな
Translation:
Mayleaf's true identity is a secret
it's a promise

Source string:
どこかへ行っていたのか？
ふむ――これは隠し事の臭いだな
Translation:
Did you go somewhere?
Hmmm... This has the smell of a secret.

Source string: イリスは本当に大丈夫なのか？
Translation: Is Iris really okay?

Source string:
覚者のことは覚者に任せるしかない
よく見ていてやるんだぞ
Translation:
We have to let the Arisen take care of the Arisen.
You're going to have to watch them very closely.

Source string: レオが悩んでいるようだが――
Translation: Leo seems to be having trouble--

Source string:
弱っているところをああも露骨に見せるのは
いかがなものかな――
Translation: Is it really necessary to make one's weaknesses so obvious...

Source string:
賛成しかねるが――
無為なことと断じるつもりもない
Translation: I cannot agree, but I have no intention of calling it meaningless.

Source string:
覚者に力を与えたぶんだけ
白竜自身の回復が遅れる――
そう考えることもできる
Translation:
For the Arisen, the more power they are given,
the slower The White Dragon's recovery becomes—
It can be thought of that way.

Source string:
覚者の本分は白竜の回復を助けることだ
――ゆめゆめ忘れるなよ
Translation:
The Arisen's true duty is to aid in the recovery of The White Dragon.
- Never, ever forget that.

Source string:
キースヒルトか――
ここで暮らしてくれれば安心なのだが
あの種族は偏屈だからな――
Translation:
Kieshildt――
If they live here, we can feel at ease
But that species is obstinate――

Source string: イリスを通じて敵を知る――ひとつの方策だ
Translation: Using Iris to understand the enemy――a single strategy.

Source string:
いや、わたしだって、驚いているし
胸も痛む――
Translation:
No, even I am surprised
and my heart hurts --

Source string:
しかし、敵に心奪われた者をこれまでどおり
信頼するわけにもいくまい
Translation: However, I cannot continue to trust someone who has been swayed by the enemy as before.

Source string:
アークを送り込みんできた者の名は――
いや、やめておこう
Translation:
The name of the person who sent the Ark is - 
No, let's stop here.

Source string:
おかしなものだ――
エルフはメイリーフだけではないと知ってから
心の隅で安心していた部分がある――
Translation:
It's strange--
Ever since I discovered that there are other elves besides Mayleaf,
there has been a sense of relief in the back of my mind.

Source string:
狙われるのはメイリーフだけではない、とな
自分の身勝手さに驚くしかなかったよ
Translation:
It was not only Mayleaf who was targeted.
I could only be surprised by my own selfishness.

Source string: 誇り高き孤独な魂――
Translation: Proud, lonely souls--

Source string:
我々で迎えることができてうれしいよ
ああ、これは本心だ
Translation:
I'm glad we can welcome you here.
Ah, this is sincere.

Source string:
会議に参加したい？
それよりも戦いの準備を進めてくれ
Translation:
Do you want to attend the meeting?
Please focus on preparing for the battle instead.

Source string:
どこへ行ってどう戦うべきか――
我々が考えるから、おまえは何も考えずに
戦ってくれればいい
Translation:
Where to go and how to fight――
Just fight without thinking, as we will do the thinking for you.

Source string:
会議の長さに不満が出ていることは知っている
しかし、事はレスタニアの未来に
大きく影響するだろう
Translation: I am aware that there is dissatisfaction with the length of the meeting. However, this matter will greatly impact the future of Lestania.

Source string: 慌てて結論に飛びついてはいかんのだ
Translation: We shouldn't jump to conclusions in a hurry.

Source string:
レオはまだか？
今後のこととイリスの処遇を相談せねばならん
見かけたら、すぐここへ来るように言ってくれ
Translation:
Is Leo here yet?
We need to discuss future plans and how to handle Iris.
If you see him, tell him to come here immediately.

Source string:
アークの攻略方法はわたしにまかせて――
ほら、今のうちに休んでおけ
Translation: Leave the strategy for the Ark to me - Now, go and rest while you can.

Source string:
ミシアルは最近のイリスにまつわる
うわさを知っていた
Translation: Mysial knew the recent rumors about Iris.

Source string:
つまり、警戒していたはずだ
それなのに何故――
Translation:
I mean, they should have been warned.
So why--

Source string:
まさかレオまで――
いや、それはあるまい――なあ？
Translation:
No way, not even Leo--
No, that's not-- hey?

Source string:
さあ、メルゴダへ行くんだ
向こうで誰と話――誰と戦うか
それは自分で決めればいい
Translation:
Now, you're going to Mergoda.
Who to talk to over there - who to fight.
You should decide that for yourself.

Source string:
おまえはけして間違えない
ああ、信じているとも
Translation:
You will never make a mistake
Ah, I believe in you

Source string:
レオとは会えたか？
わたしが心配していたと伝えてくれ
Translation:
Did you see Leo?
Tell him I was worried.

Source string:
さあ、今のうちに休んだり装備を見直したり――
いよいよ決戦だぞ
Translation:
Now, while you're at it, get some rest and review your equipment--
It's time for the showdown!

Source string: レオの姿が見えないがじきに戻るだろう
Translation: No sign of Leo, but he'll be back soon.

Source string:
白竜様へはおまえから報告するといい
つもる話はそれからでも遅くはない
Translation:
It is best to report to The White Dragon personally.
There is no harm in talking about it later.

Source string:
これほどの嵐――
史書の編纂が始まって以来なかったことだ
後世のために、詳細な記録を
残しておかねば
Translation:
Such a storm――
It has never happened since the beginning of the compilation of historical records.
For future generations, detailed records must be kept.

Source string: また落ち着かない日々が始まるようだな
Translation: Looks like another restless day ahead.

Source string:
ガルドリン、リズ、エリオットをうまく使って
この困難を乗り切ってくれ
むろん、わたしにできることはなんでもする
Translation:
Use Gurdolin, Lise, and Elliot effectively
to help us overcome this difficulty
Of course, I will do anything I can.

Source string:
何が起こっていようとも
我々が当事者でなければ良いと思っていたが
案の定、焼け石を拾ってしまったようだ
Translation:
Regardless of what may happen,
we had hoped that we wouldn't be involved,
but sure enough, it seems like we've picked up a burnt stone.

Source string:
見たところセシリーは、無垢な心を持った
乙女という風情だが――
Translation:
From the looks of it, Cecily has the air of a
maiden with an innocent heart...

Source string:
いったい何故セシリーが狙われねば
ならんのだ
Translation: Why on earth is Cecily being targeted?

Source string:
騎士団と覚者が力を合わせて戦えば
勝てぬ相手などおらん――
Translation:
When the knight order and the Arisen join forces and fight together,
There is no opponent we cannot defeat.

Source string:
そう信じているのだが、戦ってばかりでは
事態の把握は不可能
やはり戦力の分割は避けられぬわ
Translation: I believe that if we keep fighting all the time, it will be impossible to grasp the situation. I still cannot avoid the division of forces.

Source string:
問題は幾つもあるが
せめて侵食魔だけでも排除できないものだろうか
そうなれば人員配置が楽になるのだが
Translation: There are a number of problems, but can we at least eliminate the Corruption demon? That would make manpower allocation a lot easier.

Source string: レオは何か言ってこないのか？
Translation: Leo didn't say anything?

Source string:
状況が変われば考え方を変える
その柔軟さが美点だったが――
それすらも変わってしまったのだろうか
Translation:
If the situation changes, change your way of thinking
That flexibility was a virtue, but-
Has that even changed too?

Source string:
侵食魔どもめ――
奴らのせいでじっくり考える事もできん
Translation:
Those invaders--
they're the reason I can't even think straight.

Source string:
機先を制するには腰を据えた思索が
不可欠だというのに――
Translation: In order to take the lead, it is crucial to engage in in-depth contemplation and reflection.

Source string:
そろそろ明るい兆しが見えても良いはずだが――
セシリーには焦るなと言ったものの
一番落ち着くべきなのはわたしかもしれんな
Translation:
There should be a silver lining by now--
Although I told Cecily not to rush
I'm probably the one who needs to calm down the most.

Source string:
首尾はどうだ？
朗報を待っているぞ
Translation:
How'd it go?
I'm waiting for good news.

Source string:
精神的な強い衝撃が人の記憶を奪うという
話は昔から知られている
Translation: The story of a strong psychological impact that robs people of their memory has been known since ancient times.

Source string: セシリーの場合はどのような事情なのだろうな
Translation: I wonder what the circumstances are in Cecily's case.

Source string:
ロイグの病気がわたしの知るものであれば
相当苦しいはずだ
早く助けてやりたいものだな
Translation:
If Loeg's illness is what I think it is
he must be in a lot of pain
I hope I can help him soon.

Source string:
いやはや――
まったく――
Translation:
Oh my goodness - 
Absolutely -

Source string:
ロイグとセシリーの記憶合わせが
不調に終わってから
嫌な予感しかしないのだ
Translation: After trying to jog Loeg's and Cecily's memories and failing, I can't help but feel a sense of unease.

Source string:
今は――
セシリーを疎ましく思ったことを恥じて
回復を祈るばかりだ
Translation: Now... I only feel ashamed for thinking of Cecily with such animosity, and I can only pray for her recovery.

Source string:
頼むぞ
レオとおまえの間にどんな絆が――
あるいは確執があるのかは知らんが
今はセシリーを助けることを最優先してくれ
Translation:
Please,
whatever bond you have with Leo--
or whatever feud you have with him--
your priority right now is to help Cecily.

Source string:
セシリーが一命を取り留めた
憂いがひとつ消えたというわけだ
再び、前へ進もうではないか
Translation:
Cecily survived
So that's one sorrow gone.
Let's move forward again!

Source string:
もし時間があるのなら
たまにでいいから、島の様子を見てくれよ
Translation:
If you have the time,
just check in with me once in a while to see what's going on on the island.

Source string: 異郷の姿、その目でしかと見届けよ
Translation: See with your own eyes what it is like to be in another land.

Source string:
こちらのことは何も心配するな
それから――
フィンダムの住民と接触する時は
威厳を忘れずにな
Translation: Don't worry about anything here. And then, when interacting with residents of Phindym, don't forget your dignity.

Source string:
さあ、早くフィンダムに行ってやれ
無事を信じているとはいえ、ガルドリンの安否も
気になるところだ
Translation:
Come on, hurry up and go to Phindym
While I believe in his safety, I'm also concerned about Gurdolin's well-being.

Source string:
フィンダムのことはフィンダムの民たちが
よく知っているだろう
Translation: Phindym's people must know about Phindym.

Source string:
解決の方法も、何かあるのかもしれない
うまく聞きだして、手助けしてやりなさい
Translation:
There might be a solution, or something that can be done
Listen carefully and provide assistance

Source string:
《原始の雫》の到着を座して待つのも
手持ちぶさただろう
さあ、フィンダムへ行って、手伝ってやりなさい
Translation:
It would be boring to just sit and wait for the arrival of 《Primeval Drops》.
Now, go to Phindym and lend a hand.

Source string:
奪われた《原始の雫》――
多少出過ぎた真似をしてもかまわんから
必ず取り戻すのだぞ
Translation:
The stolen 《Primeval Drops》--
I don't care if you go a little overboard,
you must get them back!

Source string:
セシリーにはよくしてやるのだぞ？
ぜひ、強い友情の絆を結んでくれ
少々の利害の対立などに負けぬ、強い絆を
Translation:
I will treat Cecily well, okay?
Please, form a strong bond of friendship
Do not lose to small conflicts or disputes, maintain a strong bond.

Source string:
セシリーは重い責任に押し潰されそうに
なってはいないか？
側にいて、支えてやるといい
Translation:
Cecily, do you feel like you're being crushed under the weight of heavy responsibilities?
Stay by her side and support her.

Source string:
白竜はフィンダムの精霊竜ウィルミアに
語りかけようとしているがうまくいかないようだ
Translation: The White Dragon is trying to communicate with the spirit dragon Willmia of Phindym, but it doesn't seem to be going well.

Source string:
おまえたちも忙しいだろうが
気にしてみてくれ
Translation: You guys must be busy too, but please try to care.

Source string:
時に、ロイグの行方はまだわからんのか
もしや救いを求めているということはないか？
Translation:
Sometimes, is it still unknown where Loeg is.
Is it possible that he is seeking salvation?

Source string: 今一度会い、真意を聞いてみたいものだ
Translation: I would like to see him again and hear his true intentions.

Source string:
ロイグのことは聞いた
なんとも無念ではあるが――
Translation:
I heard about Loeg
It is truly regrettable but - -

Source string:
フィンダムの汚れとともに
あの男の闇も浄化されるだろうよ
Translation:
Together with the earth of Phindym,
his darkness will also be purified.

Source string:
フィンダムの完全な復興には
まだまだ時間がかかるだろう
時々訪ねて、経過を報告しておくれ
Translation: The complete recovery of Phindym will still take a long time. Please check in occasionally and report on the progress.

Source string: これは吉兆だ――良きことが始まる――
Translation: This is a good omen - good things are beginning.

Source string:
自分に言い聞かせようとしているが
なかなか――な
Translation:
I'm trying to tell myself that
but it's not easy to--

Source string:
異郷の地にひとり残るとは
エリオットの評価を改めねばならんな
Translation:
To remain alone in a foreign land,
I'll have to revise my assessment of Elliott.

Source string: 指示や助言をしようにも情報が足りんわ
Translation: Even if I try to give instructions or advice, there is not enough information.

Source string:
しばらくは、おまえたちの判断で
臨機応変に対応してくれ
Translation: For a while, please handle things flexibly and adapt as you see fit.

Source string: メイロワ将軍とはうまくやれそうか？
Translation: Do you think you and General Meirova will get along well?

Source string:
まずは王子が戻らないことには
どうにも動きようがないな
Translation:
First of all, if the prince doesn't come back,
there's no way to make a move.

Source string:
聞こえてくる話から想像するに
ネド王子の性根は悪くなさそうだ
友好的な関係を築いてくれよ
Translation: From the stories I hear, it seems that Prince Nedo is not a bad person at heart. He has built friendly relationships.

Source string:
敵の砦に乗り込むと聞いている
くれぐれも気をつけてな
Translation:
I hear you're going to ride into an enemy stronghold.
Take care.

Source string:
当面の目的であったネド王子の救出は
思惑通りに終わったわけだが――
Translation: The rescue mission of Prince Nedo, which was the immediate objective, has ended as planned.

Source string: 次の動きが気になるところだな
Translation: I'm curious about the next move.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の討伐が解放軍の目的とすれば
次はいかなる道を進むのか――
Translation:
If the goal of the Liberation Army is to defeat the "evil dragon,"
what path will it take next?

Source string:
協力を惜しむ必要はないが
レスタニアの利を忘れるなよ
Translation:
There is no need to be stingy with collaboration,
but don't forget about the benefit of Lestania.

Source string:
解放軍が勢い付いたことで
アッカーシェランの混乱はますます
拡大するだろう
Translation: With the recent momentum gained by the People's Liberation Army, the chaos in Acre Selund is expected to further escalate.

Source string: 短期決戦と相成ればよいが
Translation: I hope it's a short war.

Source string: 敵の攻勢は予想通りだ
Translation: The enemy's offensive is predictable.

Source string:
メイロワ将軍も策を講じていることだろう
しのぎきれば未来は明るいぞ
Translation:
General Meirova is also likely taking measures
If we endure, the future will be bright

Source string:
“悪しき竜”め！
アッカーシェランの次はこのレスタニア――
Translation:
"Evil Dragon," beware!
After Acre Selund, is Lestania--

Source string:
それが狙いだというのなら
思い上がりも甚だしいわい
Translation:
If that's your intention,
it's extremely presumptuous.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の言葉を文字通りに信じても
良いのだろうか
Translation:
Can we take the words of the "Evil Dragon" literally?
I don't know if I believe it.

Source string: あぁ――疑念の沼は底なしだな
Translation: Ah--the swamp of doubt is bottomless.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の言葉を文字通りに信じても
良いのだろうか
Translation:
Can we take the words of the "Evil Dragon" literally?
I don't know if I believe it.

Source string: あぁ――疑念の沼は底なしだな
Translation: Ah--the swamp of doubt is bottomless.

Source string:
言うまでもないことだろうが――
城の奪回はそう簡単なことではないだろう
Translation:
I guess it goes without saying--
Taking back the castle won't be so easy.

Source string:
危険は避けられないとしても
無謀な行動は慎むのだぞ
Translation:
Even though danger is inevitable,
you must refrain from reckless behavior.

Source string:
奪われた城を取り戻すという悲願の成就
解放軍の面々はさぞ喜んでいるだろう
Translation:
The fulfillment of the long-held dream of regaining the castle that was taken from us
I'm sure the liberation army is very happy to see you.

Source string: 想像するとわたしまで頬が緩むわ
Translation: I can't help but smile when I think about it.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”が絶望の大陸と呼んだ
アッカーシェランの状況は大いに変わった
Translation:
The "Evil Dragon" referred to as the Land of Despair.
The situation of Acre Selund has greatly changed.

Source string: こうなると奴の沈黙が不気味だな
Translation: When it comes to this, his silence is eerie.

Source string:
おまえたちも同じだろうが、わたしの頭の中は
黒い鎧の騎士でいっぱいだ
Translation:
You guys are the same, right? But inside my head,
it's filled with black-clad knights.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”といい黒い騎士といい
姿を見せずに我々を翻弄するとは――
なんと卑劣な者たちだ
Translation:
"Evil Dragon" and the black knight, for that matter,
To manipulate us without showing their true forms—
How despicable these individuals are.

Source string: 落ち着け――落ち着くのだ
Translation: Calm down――You need to calm down.

Source string:
ブラッドオーブは続々と集まっているが
効果は薄いと言わざるをえないのだ
Translation: Blood orbs are gathering one after another, but it must be said that their effectiveness is weak.

Source string:
レスタニアの未来は文字どおり
おまえたちの活躍にかかっている
Translation: The future of Lestania depends on your actions

Source string:
思えば、わたしの記憶の中の白竜は
いつも病み、苦しんでいた
しかし、これほど痛ましい状況は初めてだ
Translation:
Looking back, the White Dragon in my memories
was always sick and suffering
However, this is the first time I have witnessed such a painful situation.

Source string:
もう一刻の猶予も許されないのだろう
さあ、行ってくれ
Translation:
I guess there is no time left for another moment of delay.
Now, please go.

Source string:
ごくろうだったな
ゆっくりと休んでくれ
Translation:
You've worked hard.
Please take a rest.

Source string:
いや、もちろん、歌い、食べ、大いに語るのもよい
好きにしなさい
多少のことは多めに見よう
Translation:
No, of course, it's good to sing, eat, and talk a lot. 
Do as you like.
Let's consider even the small things a little more.

Source string:
リズから聞いたところによると
ネド王子が行方不明なのだとか
しかも自分の意志で城を出たらしい
Translation:
According to what Lise told me,
it seems that Prince Nedo is missing,
and furthermore, he seems to have left the castle on his own accord.

Source string: この期に及んでいったい何事だろうな
Translation: What on earth is going on at this point?

Source string:
こんなことを言うとまた嫌われるのだろうが
アッカーシェラン側が口裏を合わせて
我々を騙そうとしている可能性も
皆無ではない
Translation: I may be disliked again for saying this, but there is a possibility that Acre Selund is conspiring and trying to deceive us.

Source string:
ほら、そんな顔をするな
あくまでも可能性の話だ
Translation:
Don't make that face.
It's just a discussion of possibilities.

Source string:
この状況――
これまでの経緯を思えば王子に悪意が
あるとは思えない
Translation: Given the situation ―― considering the previous circumstances, it is hard to believe that the prince has any ill intentions.

Source string:
しかし――
もう少し仕える者たちを大切にせねば
国を治めるのは難しいだろうな
Translation:
However...
If we do not value and appreciate those who serve us a little more,
it will be difficult to govern the country.

Source string:
もちろん王子の安全をいち早く確保して
気持ちを尊重すべく話し合うことも重要だ
Translation: Of course, it is important to promptly ensure the prince's safety and have respectful discussions.

Source string:
しかしそろそろおまえたちだけでも
気持ちを竜退治に切り替えた方が
良いのかもしれんぞ
Translation: However, perhaps it would be better for just you guys to start shifting your feelings towards defeating the dragon.

Source string:
ふん――
重大な事はいくらでもあるというのに
エリオットのことばかり考えてしまう
Translation:
Hmm――
Even though there are countless important things to consider,
I can't help but think only about Elliot.

Source string:
竜と竜力、そして大地の恵みが不可分で
ある以上、竜のいない大陸は
考えられない
Translation: Dragon and Dragon Force, along with the blessings of the earth, are inseparable. Therefore, a continent without dragons is unimaginable.

Source string:
とすれば竜力の継承抜きに竜の討伐は
考えられないとは思わんか？
Translation: Don't you think it's impossible to defeat a dragon without inheriting the power of Dragon Force Augmentation?

Source string:
いやはや――
この事件を記録に残さねばならないが
Translation:
Well, well...
I must record this incident.

Source string:
やはりわたしも一度はアッカーシェランを
訪ねる必要があるようだ
Translation: It seems that I also need to visit Acre Selund at least once.

Source string:
ほう、《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を持ってきたのか
これはまた貴重な物を手に入れたものだ
Translation:
Oh, you brought the 《LV.80 Orb of Growth》
This is quite a valuable item that you've obtained.

Source string:
これを使えば、今のジョブをLV.80に上げ
スキルやアビリティに関しても、特殊なもの以外
上限まで引き上げることができる
――もちろん、ジョブポイントも上限まで貯まる
Translation:
With this, you can raise your current job to level 80.
You can also raise the limit for skills and abilities, except for special ones.
And of course, job points can be accumulated up to the new limit.

Source string:
これを持ってきたということは、今のジョブで
《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を使うのか？
Translation:
If you brought this, does that mean you will use
《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 with your current job?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No

Source string:
そうか
貴重な物だからな
じっくり考えて使うといい
Translation:
I see.
It's valuable, so be sure to think carefully and use it.

Source string:
――これはすまぬ
そのジョブには《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》は
効果が無いのだ
別のジョブで考え直してみてくれ
Translation:
--Sorry about this
The 《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 has no
effect on that job.
Think again with a different job.

Source string:
それでは宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
Translation:
Now let us release the power of the Orb
--Quiet your mind and close your eyes.

Source string:
無事LV.80になったようだぞ
さて、次はスキルだな
――もう一度目を閉じるがよい
Translation:
It seems like I've safely reached level 80.
Now, it's time for skills.
―― Close your eyes once again.

Source string:
スキルの確認は落ち着いてからにしなさい
よし、最後はアビリティか
――目を閉じて集中するのだ
Translation:
Check your skills only after you've calmed down.
Okay, the last thing you need is abilities.
--Close your eyes and concentrate.

Source string:
これでこのジョブのアビリティも
特殊なもの以外は全ておまえのものとなったぞ
Translation:
Now all the abilities of this job
are yours, except for the special ones!

Source string:
どのように成長したかは
見た目ではわからないからな
アーチボルトのところへ行って
確認してみることをすすめるよ
Translation: How you have grown is not apparent from your appearance, so I recommend going to Archibald's place and checking to confirm.

Source string:
宝珠の力を解放するには少し時間がかかる
パーティーは一度解散してきた方がよかろう
パーティーメンバーを無暗に
待たせてしまうかもしれん
Translation:
It may take a little time to unleash the power of the treasure.
It would be better for the party to disband once and come back.
You may end up keeping the party members waiting unnecessarily.

Source string:
――気付いているだろうが
このジョブはすでにLV.80に達しているな
レベルアップの効果が無駄になってしまうが
それでも宝珠を使うのか？
Translation:
I guess you've noticed,
but this job has already reached level 80.
The effects of leveling up would be wasted,
but are you still going to use the treasure?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No

Source string:
ふむ――このジョブで《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を
使っても、上げられるスキルが無いようだ
スキルに関する効果が無駄になってしまうが
宝珠を使ってもよいのか？
Translation:
Hmm―― It seems that there are no skills that can be raised even if you use the 《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 on this job.
Although the effects related to skills will be wasted, is it okay to use the orb?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No

Source string:
これは――このまま《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を
使っても、効果のあるアビリティは無いようだぞ
今のジョブで宝珠を使うのか？
Translation:
This... even if you use the 《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 at this level, it seems there are no abilities to be raised.
Are you going to use the orb with your current job?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No

Source string:
そうか
おまえが納得しているのなら
わたしからこれ以上言うことはない
Translation:
I see.
If you're satisfied,
I have nothing more to say.

Source string:
それでは、宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
Translation: Now, let us release the power of the Orb. Quiet your mind and close your eyes.

Source string:
これは強い竜力が篭められた宝珠だな
この宝珠の力を解放して白竜に捧げれば
おまえの《竜力の継承》は完全なものとなるだろう
Translation:
This is a jewel imbued with strong Dragon Force.
If you offer it to the White Dragon, your 《Dragon Force Augmentation》 will become complete.

Source string:
ここに持ってきたということは
今、この宝珠の竜力を解放してもよいのか？
Translation: Does bringing it here mean that I am now allowed to unleash the Dragon Force contained within this jewel?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No

Source string:
ほう――
すでにすべての《竜力の継承》を
終えているのだな
Translation:
Hmm...
You have already completed the "Dragon Force Augmentation" inheritance, haven't you?

Source string:
この宝珠は自らの力で腕を磨いたおまえには
不要なものだったようだ
まさに覚者の鑑よ
Translation: It seems that this orb was unnecessary for you, who has polished your skills on your own. Truly, you are an Arisen.

Source string:
《竜力の継承》には何の影響もないが
前途を祝して、宝珠の力を解放しておくか
力は大地を巡り、またいつの日か
おまえの元へ戻ろう
Translation:
While there is no effect on 《Dragon Force Augmentation》,
In celebration of the future, should we release the power of the jewel?
The power will revolve around the land and one day,
it will return to you.

Source string:
すべての《竜力の継承》が終わったぞ
どのような力を得たのか、確認してみなさい
Translation: All the 《Dragon Force Augmentation》 have been completed. Confirm what kind of power you have obtained!

Source string:
おまえが持ってきたこの宝珠
篭められた力を解放することで
より冒険がしやすくなるというものだ
Translation: The Orb that you brought with you is said to make it easier to embark on adventures by unleashing its hidden power.

Source string:
