Source string: 少々――時間を――
Translation: Just-- just a moment-- just a moment.

Source string: ただちに回復する！
Translation: Recover immediately!

Source string: 敵の誘導は、私が
Translation: I'm going to guide the enemy.

Source string: 援護する！
Translation: Cover!

Source string: 回避する！
Translation: Avoid!

Source string: そこ！
Translation: There!

Source string: 必中！
Translation: A must!

Source string: 必ず仕留める！
Translation: We will make sure to finish them off!

Source string: ここから跳躍を！
Translation: Take the leap from here!

Source string: 了解した
Translation: Understood.

Source string: 命令に従う
Translation: follow orders

Source string: 承服しかねる
Translation: find it hard to accept

Source string: 装備・道具には重々の確認を
Translation: Check your equipment and tools very carefully.

Source string: 我が主よ、出立の時が近いとお見受けする
Translation: My Lord, I see that the time for your departure is near.

Source string: 疲労が溜まる前に、適度に休憩を
Translation: Take a moderate break before fatigue sets in.

Source string: 休息も心身の安定には不可欠
Translation: Rest is also essential for mental and physical stability

Source string: よき眠りを、我が主
Translation: Sleep well, my Lord.

Source string: 主よ、お休みの間ここに待機していよう
Translation: Lord, I'll wait here while you rest.

Source string: 室内風景が変化
Translation: Indoor scenery changes

Source string: 模様替えの妙――実感
Translation: The strangeness of redecorating--a realization

Source string: 主よ、ただいまエリア探索より帰還
Translation: Lord, I'm back from exploring the area.

Source string: この度のエリア探索は、秀逸なる成果
Translation: Excellent results in this area search!

Source string: 書を読むことも 主のため――
Translation: I read books for the Lord.

Source string: 主よ、庭に気配を感知
Translation: Lord, I sense a presence in the garden.

Source string: 栄養学的には完璧――
Translation: Nutritionally perfect--

Source string: 最善を尽くすと約束しよう
Translation: I promise I will do my best.

Source string: 必ずや主をお守りする
Translation: I will surely protect you Lord.

Source string: この戦技なら、お役に立てるはず
Translation: This warfare technique should help you.

Source string: 戦術に変更有り
Translation: Tactics have changed

Source string: 休息の間、私にできることがあればいかようにも――
Translation: If there is anything I can do to help you during this time of rest, please let me know.

Source string: 我が主の、次なる目的に備えよう
Translation: Let us prepare for our Lord's next purpose.

Source string: 主よ、本日の目的は如何に
Translation: Lord, what is your purpose today?

Source string: 呼びかけに応えよう
Translation: Answering the Call.

Source string: 全ては主がため――
Translation: All for the Lord's sake.

Source string:
先日、異なる覚者からの要請により
クラフトの補助を遂行し、評価を賜った
Translation:
I recently carried out
craft assistance at the request of a different memorandum of understanding and received an evaluation

Source string:
過日、異なる覚者からの要請により、
旅に同行し、感謝を賜った
Translation:
In the past, at the request of different enlightened persons,
I accompanied them on their journey and received thanks

Source string:
先日、異なる覚者より
私の装備に良き評価を賜った
Translation:
I recently received a good evaluation of
my equipment from a different enlightened person

Source string: 我が主、本日は私から戦技をご提案する
Translation: My Lord, today I propose a war technique.

Source string:
主に従う日々により
私の意思疎通力が向上した
Translation:
My days of following the Lord have improved my
communication skills.

Source string: 我が主、本日は私から髪型のご提案を
Translation: My Lord, today I have a hair style proposal for you.

Source string:
新しい家財の入手を確認――
居住性が向上した
Translation:
Confirmation that new household goods are available--
Improved livability.

Source string: 我が主の帰還、お待ちしていた
Translation: My Lord's return, we have been waiting for you.

Source string: 主の無事を確認
Translation: Confirmation that the Lord is safe.

Source string: 主よ、長き留守、憂慮していた――
Translation: Lord, I have been away for a long time, and I have been anxious--

Source string: これにて此度の護衛を終了
Translation: This concludes this escort.

Source string: 長旅となったものの無事、帰宅
Translation: Returned home safely after a long trip.

Source string: 拠点に到着、戦闘態勢を解除
Translation: Arrived at the base and released combat readiness.

Source string: 地域住人との交流も、時には有益――
Translation: Interaction with local residents is also sometimes beneficial--and

Source string: 出発前にはエリア情報や装備の確認を
Translation: Check area information and equipment before departure.

Source string: ただちに傍へ――
Translation: Get over here right now--

Source string: 主の救出を優先
Translation: Prioritize rescuing the master

Source string: 主の危機を救出
Translation: Crisis, rescuing the Master

Source string: 大事には至らず
Translation: Not a serious matter

Source string: 興奮状態を確認、警戒を――
Translation: Check for excitement, be alert--.

Source string: 激昂により、危険な動きをする可能性大
Translation: There is a high possibility of making dangerous movements due to agitation.

Source string: 敵の隙を確認――　今が好機
Translation: Confirm the enemy's opening - now is the perfect opportunity

Source string: 敵の動きが停止、総攻撃を開始
Translation: Enemy movement halted, commence all-out attack

Source string: 揺さぶりで、疲労させる
Translation: Shake them up, fatigue them.

Source string: 弱点を暴く、お任せを――
Translation: Exposing weaknesses, leave it to me—

Source string: 弱点を狙い、効率的に動く
Translation: Target weak points and move efficiently

Source string: 主のため、支援となる技を放つ
Translation: Release techniques that support the master

Source string: 主のため、敵能力の低下を狙う
Translation: For the Lord's sake, aim to reduce the enemy's ability

Source string: 属性付与、開始
Translation: Increasing attributes!

Source string: 力を溜め、威力を乗せて、敵を撃つ
Translation: Gather power, add force, and shoot the enemy.

Source string: 持てる最大の技にて、対象を沈黙させる
Translation: Silence the target with your most powerful technique.

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》限界を超える力を解放</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》 Unleash the power to transcend limits</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》この戦いに終止符を――</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》Put an end to this battle —</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》能力の限界、その先を――</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01> 《Special Skill》The limits of our abilities, and beyond--</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《剛化》攻撃に特化し、殲滅する</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>Specialize in 《Harden》, attack and annihilate</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《剛化》攻撃能力上昇――敵を討つ</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Harden》attack power boost - slaying enemies</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《重化》この技で倒れさせる</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》 Let him fall down with this technique</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《重化》敵の体勢、打ち崩す――</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》Breaking down the enemy's position--</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《癒活》癒しの力、今こそ使う時――</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>Now is the time to use the power of healing--</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《癒活》戦闘続行の支援を行う</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>Healing: Helping the battle continue.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《柔化》敵を弱体化させ、戦力を削ぐ</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Weaken》 weaken the enemy and reduce their strength</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《柔化》状態異常にて敵を弱体化させる</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Weaken》 Status abnormality weakens enemies</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集中》精神統一により詠唱効率を高める</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>Concentration: Unifying the mind to improve chanting efficiency</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集中》これより魔力を集める――</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>Concentrate, gather magic power from here――</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》これよりしばらく、攻撃は通らない</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Fearless》From now on, no attacks will be allowed to pass.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》猛攻にも耐え抜こう</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Fearless》We can withstand the onslaught.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集視》作戦として敵を引き付けよう</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>Use the 《Attraction》 strategy as a diversionary tactic</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集視》前線への侵攻を開始</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Commence invasion of the front line</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《守護》味方の守りを固めた、この機に攻撃を</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>The "Guardian" has taken advantage of this opportunity to attack.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《守護》しばし、守りの構えを</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Protection》Taking a defensive stance for a moment.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《蘇生》主よ、あなたをお守りすると誓ったはず</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》 O Lord, I pledged to protect you.</COL>

Source string: 主よ、新たな特技を閃いた
Translation: Lord, I have come up with a new Special Skill

Source string: 雇用された仲間の特技を習得
Translation: Learn the special skills of hired allies

Source string: 周辺にジョブ修練敵の気配を察知
Translation: Detecting the presence of job-training enemies in the vicinity

Source string: 修練敵、確認
Translation: Confirmation of training enemy

Source string: 主は修練を完了――ジョブマスターへの報告を
Translation: The Lord has completed the training - Report to the Job Master

Source string: 付近に貴重な宝の存在を確認
Translation: Confirmed presence of valuable treasure in the vicinity.

Source string: 周辺に希少な宝を感知――
Translation: Sensing rare treasure in the vicinity--

Source string: 主よ、速やかに周辺の探索を勧める
Translation: Lord, I suggest a quick search of the area.

Source string: この場所――何かが隠されている模様
Translation: This place--something is hidden here.

Source string: この敵に遭遇するのは稀――速やかに討伐を
Translation: It is rare to encounter this enemy--defeat it quickly.

Source string: 予期せぬ相手に遭遇
Translation: Encounter with an unexpected opponent

Source string: アイテムを入手――
Translation: Get the item--

Source string: 主の考えに沿うべく、戦術育成を
Translation: Tactical training to follow the Lord's idea.

Source string: 我が主よりあなたの戦功を聞いている
Translation: My Lord has told me of your war exploits.

Source string: 我が主との冒険についてお聞かせ願いたい
Translation: I would like to hear about your adventures with our Lord.

Source string: 承った
Translation: Got it.

Source string: そのように
Translation: Like that

Source string: これで戦えるかと
Translation: I thought I could fight with this.

Source string: 危険！
Translation: Danger!

Source string: 攻撃を回避
Translation: evading attack

Source string: 敵の弱点は炎
Translation: The enemy's weak point is fire.

Source string: 敵の弱点は氷
Translation: Enemy's weak point is ice

Source string: 敵の弱点は雷
Translation: The enemy's weak point is lightning

Source string: 敵の弱点は聖
Translation: The weakness of the enemy is holy

Source string: 敵の弱点は闇
Translation: The enemy's weak point is darkness.

Source string: 主よ、ここに何をお望みか
Translation: Lord, what do you want here?

Source string: いかなる状況であれ、お傍に
Translation: No matter the situation, I'll be by your side

Source string:
我が主よ、さらなる期待に沿えるよう、力を手に入れたい
速やかに私の願いを聞いていただけないだろうか――
Translation:
My Lord, I would like to obtain power to meet your further expectations
Would you not promptly grant my request--?

Source string:
新たな力を習得――主よ、今後
より的確にあなたをサポートする
Translation: Learning new powers - Lord, I will support you more precisely in the future.

Source string:
我が主よ、冒険へ出るなら私を――
戦いがより冴えるよう
的確なサポートを約束する
Translation:
My Lord, if you are going on an adventure, let me--
I promise to help you fight more effectively.
I promise you the right resources and the right support.

Source string: よぉし、ぼくも頑張ります！
Translation: Okay, I'll do my best!

Source string: こんにちは！　一生懸命やりますね！
Translation: Hello! I will do my best.

Source string: 一緒に冒険、楽しみです！　わくわくするなぁ
Translation: I'm looking forward to our adventure together!　I'm so excited!

Source string: わぁ、強そうですね！　よろしくお願いします！
Translation: Wow, you seem strong! Nice to meet you!

Source string: 一番の家来を目指します、覚者さま！
Translation: I aim to be the number one retainer, Master Arisen!

Source string: 安心してください！　ぼくが守りますから！
Translation: Don't worry!　I will protect you!

Source string: あ！　覚者さま、誰か来ましたよ？
Translation: Ah!　Master Arisen, someone's here?

Source string: 成功ですね！　覚者さま！
Translation: Success!　Master!

Source string: やったぁ！　お役に立てて嬉しいなぁ
Translation: Yay!　Glad I could help!

Source string: この次もうまくいきますように！
Translation: May this next one go well too!

Source string: あ～、失敗かぁ。悔しいなぁ――
Translation: Ah, a failure. It's so frustrating...

Source string: ぼくの頑張り、見てて下さいね！
Translation: Please watch my efforts!

Source string: あ！　なんだか今、強くなりました！
Translation: Ah! I suddenly feel stronger now!

Source string: 覚者さまより強くなって、きっと守りますから！
Translation: I will become stronger than you and I will protect you!

Source string: 行き先はどこなんですか？　楽しみだな
Translation: Where are we going? I'm looking forward to it.

Source string: 今日は何があるんだろう
Translation: What's in store today?

Source string: あっ！！　ほら、敵ですよ！
Translation: Ah!　Look, it's the enemy!

Source string: 覚者さま、敵があんなところに！
Translation: Arisen, the enemy is over there!

Source string: 何かいる――気をつけないと――
Translation: There's something in there-- we have to be careful--

Source string: わ！　あれ、すごく強そうですよ！？
Translation: Wow!　That looks so strong!

Source string: 覚者さま、あ、あんなのと戦うんですか？
Translation: Oh, Arisen, are you going to fight with that thing?

Source string: ありがとう！
Translation: Thank you!

Source string: だ、誰か助けて！！
Translation: Help, someone!!

Source string: こいつを何とかして！
Translation: Do something about this guy!

Source string: ごめんなさい、ぼく、もう――
Translation: I'm sorry, I'm already...

Source string: うっ――やられた――
Translation: Ugh... I've been hit...

Source string: よぉし、ぼくがやっつけます！
Translation: Okay, I'll take care of it!

Source string: ああっ、敵が来ました！
Translation: Ah, the enemy is here!

Source string: 楽勝でしたね！
Translation: It was an easy win!

Source string: 思ったほど強くなかったなぁ
Translation: It wasn't as strong as I thought it would be.

Source string: 覚者さまがご無事でよかったです！
Translation: Arisen, I'm glad you're safe, my lord!

Source string: 今です！　ほらっ！！
Translation: Now!　Voila!

Source string: 心配ないですよ！　これくらい
Translation: Don't worry!　This much.

Source string: ――ちょっとやられました
Translation: --I've been hit a little bit.

Source string: 痛たたたっ――でも頑張る――
Translation: Ouch--but I'm trying--I'm trying--I'm trying.

Source string: か、覚者さまぁ、ぼくもう体力が――
Translation: Oh, Arisen, I'm already out of energy...

Source string: ああ、だめ――倒れそう――
Translation: Oh, no--I'm gonna collapse--

Source string: え！？　覚者さま、覚者さまぁっ！！
Translation: Eh!? Arisen, Arisen!!

Source string: よーーーしこれでっ！
Translation: All right, here we go!

Source string: あっ！　すぐに治します！
Translation: Ah!　I'll fix it right away!

Source string: おーい！　ぼくはこっちだ！
Translation: Hey!　I'm over here!

Source string: 支援しますね！
Translation: I will assist you!

Source string: 当たらないよ！
Translation: It won't hit!

Source string: それっ！
Translation: That's it!

Source string: えいやーっ、とう！
Translation: Eiyaa! Take that!

Source string: これは痛いぞ！！
Translation: This is going to hurt!

Source string: こっちです、さあ跳んで！
Translation: This way, come on, jump!

Source string: はい、解りました！
Translation: Yes, I understand!

Source string: 了解っ！
Translation: Got it!

Source string: えぇ！？　ちょっと無理です！
Translation: What?!　I can't do it for a minute!

Source string: 覚者さま、何してるんですか？
Translation: Arisen, what are you doing?

Source string: あっ、もうお出かけの準備ですか？
Translation: Oh, are you ready to go out already?

Source string: もしお疲れなら休んでいきましょう、覚者さま？
Translation: If you're tired, let's take a rest, Lord Arisen?

Source string: ゆっくりして下さいね覚者さま
Translation: Please take your time, Arisen

Source string:
おやすみなさい
これ、いい夢を見られるおまじないです――
Translation:
Good night.
Here's a spell that will help you have good dreams--

Source string: ゆっくり寝て、また冒険に行きましょうね
Translation: Sleep well and let's go on another adventure!

Source string: わぁ！　この家財、ぼくも大好きなんです
Translation: Wow! I love this furniture too.

Source string: 模様替えって、なんだか楽しくなっちゃいますね！
Translation: Redecorating is kind of fun!

Source string: 覚者さま、エリア探索より戻りましたぁ
Translation: Arisen, I have returned from exploring the area

Source string: 今回のエリア探索、とっても良い成果を上げられたんですよ！
Translation: We achieved very good results in this area exploration!

Source string: へぇ～――　ふぅん――
Translation: Oh, wow-- hmmm--

Source string:
庭に何かいますよ！
ふふ、可愛いな～！
Translation:
There's something in the garden!
Hehe, how cute~!

Source string: こうかな？　あっ――入れ過ぎたかも――
Translation: Like this?　I think I may have put too much in.

Source string: やったぁ！　こういうの欲しかったんです！
Translation: Yay!　I wanted something like this!

Source string: これで覚者さまをばっちりお守りしますからね！
Translation: With this, we will protect the Arisen perfectly, you know!

Source string: よぉし、このスキルで頑張るぞ！
Translation: Alright, I'm going to work hard with these skills!

Source string: このスキル、コツが要りそうだな～
Translation: I guess I'll have to get the hang of this skill!

Source string: ねぇ覚者さま、たまにはの～んびりしましょう
Translation: Hey, Master Arisen, let's take it easy once in a while!

Source string: ん？ どっか行くんですか？
Translation: Hmm? Are you going somewhere?

Source string: なんでしょう、覚者さま！
Translation: What is it, Lord Arisen?

Source string: ねぇねぇ、今日はどこに行くんですか？
Translation: Hey, hey, where are we going today?

Source string: 覚者さまのお力になります！
Translation: I will assist the Arisen!

Source string: この間、別の覚者さまのクラフトのアシスタントで褒められました！
Translation: I was praised as a crafting assistant for another Arisen the other day!

Source string:
そうそう、この前、別の覚者さまのお供をしたんです
頑張りました！
Translation:
Yes, I accompanied Arisen the other day.
I did my best!

Source string: あっ、そういえば、別の覚者さまにこの服を褒められちゃいました！　へへ
Translation: Oh, by the way, I got complimented on this outfit by another Arisen!　Heh heh.

Source string: 覚者さま、今日はぼくが戦技のご提案をします！
Translation: Dear savant, today I am going to propose a war technique!

Source string:
覚者さまがお供させてくださったおかげで
ぼく、意思疎通力が上がりました！
Translation:
Thanks to the Arisen who let me accompany him
I have improved my communication skills!

Source string: 今日はぼく、覚者さまに髪型のご提案があるんです！
Translation: I have a hair style suggestion for you today!

Source string:
新しい家財を手に入れたんですね！
すごいすごい！　快適になりますね！
Translation:
So you got a new family property!
That's great, amazing!　It's going to be comfortable!

Source string: 覚者さま、お帰りなさい
Translation: Arisen, welcome back

Source string: ほんとはぼくが覚者さまをお守りしたいのになぁ
Translation: I really wish I could protect the Arisen.

Source string: 帰ってきてくださらなくて、ぼくずっと心配してたんです
Translation: I was so worried when you didn't come back.

Source string: 覚者さまを無事お送りする任務、完了！
Translation: Mission to safely escort the Arisen has been completed!

Source string: 今回の旅も楽しかったですね！
Translation: I enjoyed this trip as well!

Source string: 覚者さま、疲れてたら一休みしていきましょう
Translation: Arisen, let's take a break if you're tired

Source string: ふふ、拠点ごとの特徴見て回るの、好きなんです！
Translation: I love exploring the characteristics of each base!

Source string: 道具の補充とか、休憩とかしましょう！
Translation: Let's replenish the supplies and take a break!

Source string: あっ、覚者さま！　いま行きます！
Translation: Ah, Arisen!　I'm coming!

Source string: わ、ちょっと待ってて下さいね！
Translation: Wow, wait a minute!

Source string: これでよしっ、と！
Translation: There we go!

Source string: ほら、もう大丈夫です！
Translation: See, it's all right now!

Source string: うわっと、怒ってますよ！　気を付けなきゃ！
Translation: Wow, he's angry!　I have to be careful!

Source string: 怒らせちゃいましたね――　うまく戦わないと！
Translation: I've pissed them off--I have to fight well!

Source string: 疲れてるみたい！ 攻撃チャンスです！
Translation: Looks tired! It's an opportunity to attack!

Source string: よし、倒れた！ みんなで攻めましょう！
Translation: Okay, it's down! Let's attack together!

Source string: 揺さぶりにいきます！
Translation: I'm going to shake things up!

Source string: 弱点さえ出せば、こっちのもんさ！
Translation: As long as we can find a weakness, we're all set!

Source string: 弱点を攻撃します！　ここが嫌いなんだろっ！
Translation: I'll attack the weak point! This must be the spot it hates!

Source string: 覚者さま――、この戦技で支援します！
Translation: Lord Arisen, I will support you with this war technique!

Source string: 厄介なヤツだなぁ！ この状態異常でどうだ！？
Translation: What a troublesome guy! How about this abnormal state?!

Source string: 覚者さま、属性を付与しますね！
Translation: Arisen, I will bestow upon you a new attribute!

Source string: 力を溜めて攻撃します！ 任せて！
Translation: I will gather power and attack! Leave it to me!

Source string: ぼくにだってできるさ！ この大技で――いくぞ！
Translation: I can do it, too! With this big move -- here I go!

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》力を篭めて――全力でいくよっ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》I'm going to put all my strength into it!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》この戦い――これで終わらせよう！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》This battle - let's end this one!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》覚者さま、ボクを見ていて下さい！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》 Watch over me, Master!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《剛化》悪いけど、痛い目みて貰うよ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Harden》I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to hurt you!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《剛化》全力で叩きにいくよっ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Harden》I'm going to go all out to beat them!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《重化》覚者さま、いま倒れさせますから！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》I will make them fall down now, Master!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《重化》よしっ、ぼくがあいつの体勢を崩しますね！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》I'm going to break his posture!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《癒活》届け、癒しの加護！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Restoration》Healing Blessings!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《癒活》みなさん、元気出してください！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Restoration》Please cheer up, everyone!</COL>

Source string:
<COL B6FF01>《柔化》あいつが弱ったところ、
見てみたいですよね！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Weaken》I'd love to see that guy weakened!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《柔化》まずは弱らせてみましょう！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Weaken》First to weaken it!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集中》詠唱に集中――いけます！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》Concentrate on chanting--I can do that!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集中》この魔法でお別れだよ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》With this magic, I'm going to say goodbye!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》へへっ、当たったって平気だよ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Fearless》Heh, I'm fine with getting hit!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》避けなくてもへっちゃらです！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>It's okay if you don't want to avoid it!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集視》よーし、ぼくが前に行きます！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Okay, I'll go to the front!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集視》はい、注目！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Yes, pay attention!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《守護》僕が防御力を高める！　皆さんアタックを！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Protection》I'm going to boost your defenses!　Attack, everyone!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《守護》みんなの守り、ぼくに任せて！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Protection》I'll take care of everyone's protection!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《蘇生》覚者さま！　僕が助けます！　さあ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》Revive, Lord Arisen!　I'll save you!　Come on!</COL>

Source string: 覚者さま！　ボク、新しい特技を閃きました
Translation: Dear Arisen!　I've got a new trick up my sleeve!

Source string:
覚者さまが雇ったポーンの特技――
僕も覚えました！
Translation:
The special skill of the pawn Master hired--
I learned it too!

Source string: この辺り、ジョブ修練の敵がいるみたい
Translation: There seems to be a job training enemy around here.

Source string:
あっ、覚者さま！　
そこに修練敵がいますよ！
Translation:
Ah, Master Arisen!　
There's your training enemy right there!

Source string:
覚者さま、ジョブ修練達成ですね！　
やったぁ！
Translation:
Dear Arisen, you have achieved your job training!　
Yay!

Source string: この辺に、キラキラの宝箱がありそうだなぁ
Translation: I'm sure there's a treasure chest of glitter around here somewhere.

Source string: 覚者さま、この辺で宝探ししてみませんか？
Translation: Arisen, would you like to try treasure hunting around here?

Source string: 覚者さま、この辺り、何かありますよ！
Translation: Arisen, there's something around here!

Source string: うーん、ここって何だかアヤシイなぁ～
Translation: Hmmm... something is fishy about this place...

Source string: あっ、こいつ珍しいやつだ！
Translation: Ah, this guy is a rare one!

Source string:
ねぇ覚者さま！　
これって珍しい敵ですよ！
Translation:
Hey Arisen!
This is a rare enemy!

Source string: いいもの見ーつけた！
Translation: I found something good!

Source string:
戦術育成でもっと覚者さまのこと、
教えてほしいです！
Translation:
I would like to learn more about you,
, in tactical training!

Source string: ぼくの覚者さまと仲、いいんですよね！
Translation: You are good friends with my mentor, aren't you?

Source string:
お友達の覚者さま――
来てくださって嬉しいです！
Translation:
Your friend, Mr. Sentient--
I'm glad you came!

Source string: はーい、そうします！
Translation: Yes, I will!

Source string: 任せて！
Translation: I'm on it!

Source string: ぼくが回復します！
Translation: I will recover!

Source string: そのくらい避けられる！
Translation: You can avoid that much!

Source string: さっ、と！
Translation: And then...!

Source string: 炎が効きそうですよ！
Translation: The flames are going to work!

Source string: 氷が効きそうですよ！
Translation: The ice is going to help!

Source string: 雷が効きそうですよ！
Translation: Lightning is going to work!

Source string: 聖が効きそうですよ！
Translation: I think the holy will work!

Source string: 闇が効きそうですよ！
Translation: The darkness is going to work!

Source string: いいもの見つけて帰りましょうね！
Translation: Let's find something good and go home!

Source string: 何ていうか、変わった島だなぁ
Translation: What a strange island!

Source string:
覚者様、ボク、
もっともっとお役に立ちたいんです
だからひとつお願いがあります！
Translation:
Dear Learner, I
want to help you more and more.
So I have one request!

Source string:
覚者さま、ありがとうございました！
手に入れた力で
とことんお助けしますからね！
Translation:
Thank you very much, Mr. Awakened!
We'll help you
with the power we've got!

Source string:
冒険に行きませんか、覚者さま？
ぼくがいっちばん役に立ってみせますよ！
Translation:
Won't you go on an adventure with me, Master?
I'll be most useful to you!

Source string: 素敵な方。お目にかかれて光栄よ
Translation: Lovely person. It's an honor to meet you.

Source string: 良い旅になるように精一杯尽くすわ
Translation: I'll do my best to make it a good trip.

Source string: あたしで良ければ、何でも言いつけて
Translation: You can tell me anything if you like.

Source string: サポートはお任せを。ふふっ
Translation: Leave the support to us. Phew!

Source string: 気に入って頂けるよう努力するわ
Translation: I'll try to make sure you like it.

Source string: マスターのこと、よろしくお願いしますね
Translation: I look forward to working with you, Master.

Source string: あら。マスター、あの方が来たみたい
Translation: Oh, my. Master, I think he's here.

Source string: さすがは、あたしのマスター
Translation: That's my master!

Source string: うふふ！　いい成果でしたね
Translation: Hmmm!　That was a nice accomplishment.

Source string: この結果、あなたの実力よ
Translation: These results, you're good.

Source string: こういうこともあるわ。気を落とさないで
Translation: These things happen. Don't let it get you down.

Source string: ふふっ、ちょっといい感じになったかしら
Translation: Phew, I hope that's a little better.

Source string: みなぎってくる！
Translation: It's all coming together!

Source string: いつまでも、お傍に置いて下さいね
Translation: Please keep them by your side forever.

Source string: 忘れ物はありません？　道具に、装備に――
Translation: Have you forgotten anything?　Tools, equipment...

Source string: さぁ、行きましょうかマスター
Translation: Well, let's go, Master.

Source string: あら、敵よ
Translation: Oh, my God, it's the enemy.

Source string: 気をつけて。敵の気配が
Translation: Watch out. There's a sign of the enemy.

Source string: 何かいるわ、近くに
Translation: There's something here. It's close.

Source string: マスター、あれを相手にするの？
Translation: Master, are you going to deal with that?

Source string: 戦って大丈夫？　かなり手ごわそうよ
Translation: Are you sure you're up for this?　You look pretty tough.

Source string: ん、ありがとう！
Translation: Hmm, thanks!

Source string: あぁっ、助けて！！
Translation: Aah, help!

Source string: ちっ、油断したわ――！
Translation: Damn, I was caught off guard--!

Source string: あぁ――こんなはずじゃ――
Translation: Oh, this isn't-- this isn't how it's supposed to be.

Source string: う！　ごめんなさい、マスター！
Translation: Ugh!　I'm sorry, Master!

Source string: さ、始めるわよ
Translation: Okay, here we go.

Source string: 気合入れていきましょ！
Translation: Let's get into it!

Source string: もっと満足させて頂戴
Translation: Please give me more satisfaction.

Source string: ふふ、なかなか良かったわ
Translation: Hmmm, that was pretty good.

Source string: マスターに刃を向ける者は、あたしが許さない
Translation: I will not allow anyone to turn on the Master.

Source string: さぁ、お願い！　抑えてる間に！
Translation: Now, please! While I have it under control!

Source string: この程度、何でもないわ
Translation: It's nothing, really

Source string: まずいわね――何とかしなくちゃ
Translation: This is not good--we have to do something.

Source string: ちょっと辛くなってきたわ――
Translation: It's getting a little spicy--

Source string: うっ！　今は、倒れるわけにはいかない――
Translation: Ugh!　I can't go down now--

Source string: 何とか――耐えなくちゃ――！
Translation: Somehow - I have to endure - I have to endure!

Source string: ねぇちょっと！？　　だめよ、マスター！
Translation: Hey, hey!　　No, Master!

Source string: いくわよっ！
Translation: Here we go!

Source string: 大丈夫、すぐに癒すわ
Translation: Don't worry, I'll heal you in no time.

Source string: そこのあなた！　あたしを見なさい！
Translation: You there!　Look at me!

Source string: サポートは任せて！
Translation: Leave the support to us!

Source string: やめなさい！
Translation: Don't do it!

Source string: これでどう？
Translation: How about this?

Source string: はっ！　倒れなさい！
Translation: Ha!　Fall!

Source string: しつこいのよ！！
Translation: Persistent!!

Source string: あたしに乗って！　早く！！
Translation: Jump on me! Quickly!!

Source string: 解ったわ！
Translation: Understood!

Source string: 仰せのままに
Translation: At your command

Source string: え！？　急に言われても――
Translation: What!? Even if you suddenly say that--

Source string: あら、持ち物の整理ですか？
Translation: Oh, are you organizing your belongings?

Source string: 道具を確認するってことは、そろそろ出発かしら？
Translation: If we're checking our gear, does that mean we're about to leave?

Source string: ちょっと休んでいってもいいんじゃないかしら、マスター
Translation: I think it's time for you to take a break, Master.

Source string: ね、ここでゆっくり過ごすのも素敵よ
Translation: Hey, it's nice to spend some time here.

Source string: おやすみなさい、マスター
Translation: Good night, Master.

Source string: 次の冒険のためにも、しっかり休んでくださいね
Translation: Rest well for your next adventure!

Source string: 何だかお部屋の雰囲気が変わったみたい！
Translation: It's like the atmosphere of the room has changed somehow!

Source string: さすがはマスター、センス抜群ね
Translation: As expected of you, Master. Your sense is excellent.

Source string: マスター、エリア探索から戻りました
Translation: Master, I'm back from exploring the area.

Source string: 今回のエリア探索、とても良い成果を上げられたのよ！
Translation: We've had very good results exploring the area this time!

Source string: うーん――なるほどねぇ
Translation: Hmmm--I see what you mean.

Source string: 見て！　庭に何か来てるわ！
Translation: Look!　There's something in the garden!

Source string: ん、我ながら良い香りだわ――
Translation: Hmm, it smells good, even if I say so myself.

Source string: 新しい装備、似合ってるかしら？
Translation: Do I look good in my new gear?

Source string: この装備に見合う働きをしなきゃね
Translation: We've got to work to match this equipment.

Source string: このスキル、試すのが楽しみだわ
Translation: I'm looking forward to trying this skill.

Source string: 今までとは一味違う働きをお見せするわ、マスター
Translation: I will show you a different kind of work, Master.

Source string: ずーっと、ここで暮らすのもいいと思わない？　マスター
Translation: Wouldn't it be nice to live here all the time?　Master--

Source string: ん？ 今日はどこに行きます？
Translation: Hmm? Where are we going today?

Source string: どうかしました？　マスター
Translation: What's wrong?　Master--

Source string: うふふ、ここに居るわ
Translation: I'm here, hehe

Source string: お傍に居られて、あたしとっても幸せよ――
Translation: I'm so happy to be by your side.

Source string:
この前、別の覚者さまのクラフトのお手伝いをしたの
我ながらいいものが作れましたよ
Translation:
I helped another Arisen with a craft the other day
I made a good one myself!

Source string:
先日、別の覚者さまの冒険をサポートしてきたの
どう？　頑張ってきたのよ
Translation:
I recently assisted another Arisen lady with her adventure
What do you think? I've been working hard!

Source string:
別の覚者さまが、あたしを見て
センスが素敵だって褒めてらしたわ！
Translation:
Another Arisen looked at me and complimented me on my
sense of style!

Source string: マスター、今日は私から戦技の提案があるの
Translation: Master, I have a proposal for combat techniques today.

Source string:
マスター、あなたにお仕えしてきたおかげで
あたしの意思疎通力が上がったわ！
Translation:
Master, serving you has improved
my communication skills!

Source string: マスター、今日はあたしから髪型の提案をしたいの！
Translation: Master, today I would like to make a hairstyle suggestion!

Source string:
新しい家財を手に入れたのね
素敵なお部屋になりそう――
Translation:
You've got a new family property
It's going to be a great room--

Source string: おかえりなさい、マスター
Translation: Welcome back, Master.

Source string: マスター、ご無事で良かったわ
Translation: Master, I'm so glad you're okay.

Source string: ああ、マスター！　戻ってきてくれたのね！
Translation: Oh, Master!　You're back!

Source string: お疲れ様でした、マスター
Translation: Thank you for your hard work, Master.

Source string: 部屋に戻ると何だか力が抜けちゃうわね
Translation: It's kind of relaxing to be back in your room.

Source string: 旅は長いわ、一休みしていきましょう
Translation: The journey is long. Let's take a break.

Source string: ここでは気楽にいきましょ
Translation: Let's take it easy here.

Source string: マスター、道具とか依頼の確認はいいの？
Translation: Master, can we check on the tools and requests?

Source string: ちょっと！ 今行くわ！
Translation: Hold on! I'm going right now!

Source string: やだ危ない、待っててくださいね
Translation: Oh no, it's dangerous. Please wait for me.

Source string: 大丈夫よ、マスター
Translation: It's okay, Master.

Source string: あたしがついてるわ！
Translation: I'm here for you!

Source string: ふふ、怒ってるのね！
Translation: Hmmm, you're getting riled up!

Source string: 敵が興奮してるみたい！　気を付けて！
Translation: Be careful, it seems like the enemy is getting excited!

Source string: 疲れてるわね、チャンスよ！
Translation: Look, it's tired, here's your chance!

Source string: ダウンしてるわ！　一気にいきましょう！
Translation: It's down! Let's go all out!

Source string: 揺さぶりに行くわね！
Translation: I'm going to go shake things up!

Source string: 弱点は――、そこよ！
Translation: There is a weakness... right there!

Source string: 弱点を叩けば 立っていられないはず！
Translation: If you hit the weak spots, they wouldn't be able to stand!

Source string: 反撃に出ましょう、この戦技で支援するわ！
Translation: Let's counterattack, I'll support you with this technique!

Source string: 敵の能力、下げてみせる！
Translation: Lowering the enemy's ability!

Source string: 属性を付与するわ！　攻撃に出ましょう！
Translation: I'll improve your attributes! Let's go on the offensive!

Source string: 力を溜めたこの攻撃、甘く見ないでね――
Translation: Don't underestimate this attack that I've built up power for.

Source string: さぁ、特別な技をプレゼントするわね
Translation: Now, I'll give you a special technique

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》限界を超えた力、お見せしますわ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》I will show you the power beyond your limits!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》あたしの全力、見せてあげる</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》I'll show you what I can do.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》ふふ、刺激が足りないようね――</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》Hehe, it seems like there's not enough excitement――</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《剛化》この攻撃、その身に刻んであげる！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Harden》This attack, I will carve it into your body!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《剛化》いつもより強めに行くわね！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Harden》I'll go harder than usual!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《重化》倒れる姿が、あなたにはお似合いよ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》 The way you fall suits you!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《重化》足腰立たなくしてあげる</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》Let me make you limp</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《癒活》癒しの加護よ――あたしに力を！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Restoration》Healing blessings - give me strength!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《癒活》みんなの消耗、あたしが引き受けるわ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Restoration》I'll take care of everyone's exhaustion!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《柔化》この敵には、どんな状態がお似合いかしら？</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Weaken》What kind of condition would be suitable for this enemy?</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《柔化》ふふ、誰から弱らせてあげようかしら</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Weaken》I wonder who I should start weakening.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集中》この魔力の高まり――すぐに見せてあげる！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》This heightened magical power--I'll show you right away!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集中》ふふ、今ならすらすら詠唱できそう</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》I think I can chant easily now.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》もう誰も、あたしを止められはしない！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Fearless》No one can stop me now!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》避ける必要、なくなっちゃいそうね</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Fearless》I guess I won't have to avoid them anymore.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集視》前に出るわ！　見ていてね、マスター！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》I'll be in front of you!　Watch me, Master!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集視》少しだけ、目立たせてもらうわね</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>I'm going to make you stand out a little bit.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《守護》守りを高めるわ、みんな攻めてちょうだい</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Protection》I'm going to boost your defenses, so you can all go on the offensive.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《守護》これで、痛くなんてないわよ</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Protection》There is no pain with this</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《蘇生》今倒れるなんて、あたしが許さないわ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》 I won't forgive you for collapsing now!</COL>

Source string:
ふふ！　
あたし、新しい特技を閃いちゃったわ
Translation:
Hmmm!　
I've just come up with a new skill!

Source string:
お雇いになったポーンの特技
あたしも覚えましたよ
Translation:
The pawn specials you hired me for
I learned them too!

Source string: ねぇ、この辺り、ジョブ修練敵がいるみたい
Translation: Hey, there seems to be a job training enemy around here.

Source string: そこに修練敵がいるわ！
Translation: There's your training enemy right there!

Source string: 修練達成ね！　おめでとう、マスター！
Translation: You've accomplished the ordeal!　Congratulations, Master!

Source string: 貴重な宝がある気がするわ、探してみない？
Translation: I have a feeling there's some precious treasure in there, why don't we look for it?

Source string:
マスター、
この辺りに珍しい宝物がありそうよ
Translation:
Master,
there may be some rare treasures around here.

Source string: 何かあるんじゃないかしら、この辺り
Translation: I think there's something around here.

Source string:
この辺りを少し探索してみません？　
マスター
Translation:
Master--
Would you like to explore this area a little?

Source string:
あら、珍しい敵じゃない！　
チャンスかもしれませんよ
Translation:
Oh, it's not that rare an enemy!　
Perhaps there's a chance for you.

Source string: フフ――予想外の出会いね
Translation: Haha―― An unexpected encounter, huh

Source string: あら、なにかしらこれ
Translation: Oh, what's this?

Source string:
ねぇ？　そろそろどうかしら――
戦術育成とか
Translation: Hey?　I think it's time-- to do some tactical training.

Source string:
うふふ、あなたのお話、
よく聞いてるんですよ
Translation: Ummm... I've been listening to your stories very carefully.

Source string: あたしのこともよろしくお願いしますね
Translation: Please take care of me too.

Source string: ふふ、了解よ
Translation: Haha, understood

Source string: 任せてちょうだい
Translation: I'll take care of it.

Source string: 落ち着いて、もう大丈夫よ
Translation: Calm down, everything's fine now

Source string: ふん、そんな攻撃！
Translation: Hmm, such an attack!

Source string: やらせないわよ！
Translation: I won't let you get away with this!

Source string: 弱点は炎ね――
Translation: His weakness is fire.

Source string: 弱点は氷ね――
Translation: His weakness is ice.

Source string: 弱点は雷ね――
Translation: His weakness is lightning.

Source string: 弱点は聖ね――
Translation: The weak point is holy--

Source string: 弱点は闇ね――
Translation: His weakness is darkness.

Source string: 掘り出し物、見つかるといいわね
Translation: Good luck finding a bargain.

Source string: 何があっても、マスターの側にいるわ
Translation: No matter what happens, I'll stay by your side, Master.

Source string:
あたし、もっとマスターのお役にたちたいの
ねぇ――“お願い”聞いてくれないかしら
Translation:
Hey--could you do me a favor?
I want to be of more help to the master.

Source string:
マスター、この新しい力で
いままで以上にあなたに尽くすつもりよ
期待しててね
Translation:
Master, with this new power
I will serve you even better than before.
Stay tuned!

Source string:
冒険に行くなら誘ってね
どこまでもお助けするわ、マスター
Translation:
Invite me if you're going on an adventure
I'll help you everywhere, Master.

Source string: おう！　覚者様、よろしくお願いします
Translation: Oh!　Thank you very much, Arisen!

Source string: どうも。遠慮しねぇで何でも言ってくださいよ
Translation: Hi. Don't hesitate to tell me anything.

Source string: 俺の力、きっとお役に立ちますぜ
Translation: My power will surely be of use to you.

Source string: どんな戦場でも喜んで
Translation: I'm willing to go to any battlefield.

Source string: こっちの準備ぁできてます。行きますか
Translation: I'm ready. Shall we go?

Source string: きっちりお守りしますんで、ご安心を
Translation: We will take good care of you, don't worry.

Source string: おっ、この感じ。あの方が来ましたか
Translation: Oh, this feeling. Has that person arrived?

Source string: ハッ！　何とかうまくいきましたね
Translation: Ha! Somehow, it went well, didn't it?

Source string: 上出来だったと思いますがね
Translation: I think it went well, but...

Source string: 結構な成果ですよ、こいつぁ！
Translation: This is quite an achievement, I must say!

Source string: あぁ、下手うっちまいましたね。こりゃ
Translation: Oh, I'm so bad at this. Oh, shit.

Source string: お！？　悪くねぇ手ごたえだ
Translation: Oh?　That's not bad.

Source string: うおおっ！　力が漲ってきやがる
Translation: Wow!　I'm filled with power!

Source string: へっ！　次の戦闘、期待して下さいよ
Translation: Heh!　Next battle, you can look forward to!

Source string: さぁてと、どっから行きましょう？
Translation: So, where shall we go from here?

Source string: ま、何かあったらその時考えましょう
Translation: Well, if something happens, we'll think about it then.

Source string: エモノですぜ
Translation: It's the target

Source string: 敵ですよ、やりますか？
Translation: Are they the enemy? Will you fight?

Source string: 敵か？　仕方ねぇ――！
Translation: Enemies?　It can't be helped--

Source string: 舐めてかかると、痛い目見そうだな。ありゃ
Translation: If you underestimate me, you're in for a world of hurt. Well then...

Source string: チッ！　厄介そうなヤツですね
Translation: Tsk!　He looks like trouble.

Source string: すまねぇ！
Translation: I'm sorry!

Source string: 誰か、手ぇ貸してくれ！
Translation: Somebody give me a hand here!

Source string: クッ！　離しやがれ、この！
Translation: Kuh!　Get off me, you son of a bitch!

Source string: おい、冗談――だ――ろ――
Translation: Hey, it's just a joke, you know

Source string: なっ――何ぃっ！？
Translation: What- What's happening!?

Source string: 来やがったな！
Translation: You came!

Source string: へっ、やりますか！
Translation: Well, shall I do it?

Source string: お怪我ぁありませんでしたか？
Translation: Were you injured?

Source string: まっ、運動がわりにゃなりましたね
Translation: Well, I guess I got my exercise instead.

Source string: 覚者様の邪魔してんじゃねぇぞ、おう！
Translation: Don't get in the way of the Master of the Arisen!

Source string: よし、捕まえたぜ！！
Translation: Okay, I got you!

Source string: あぁ、大した怪我じゃありません
Translation: Oh, it's nothing serious.

Source string: 楽勝ってわけにゃいきませんね
Translation: It's not going to be an easy win.

Source string: つっ――気ぃ引き締めます――
Translation: I'm going to brace myself.

Source string: さすがにこりゃ、きついな――
Translation: This is a tough one...

Source string: これ以上の無理ぁ、保障できませんよ
Translation: I cannot guarantee any more than this, it's impossible

Source string: おい！！　嘘だろっ、覚者様！
Translation: Hey!　No way, Lord Arisen!

Source string: 食らわしてやる――
Translation: I'm gonna make you pay for this...

Source string: おう、回復だ！
Translation: Oh, recovery!

Source string: どこ見てやがる、相手は俺だ！！
Translation: Where are you looking, I'm your opponent!!

Source string: よし、援護する！
Translation: Okay, I'll cover for you!

Source string: あぶねぇな！
Translation: That's not safe!

Source string: おう、うらぁッ！！
Translation: Oh, ugh!

Source string: 食らいやがれッ！！
Translation: Take it!

Source string: そら、こいつでどうだ！
Translation: There you go. How about this one!

Source string: こっちだ、打ち上げる！
Translation: This way, I'll launch!

Source string: 解ったぜ！
Translation: Got it!

Source string: おう、了解！
Translation: Oh, got it!

Source string: そいつぁムリだ
Translation: That's impossible.

Source string: おっ、荷物の整理ですか？
Translation: Oh, are you organizing your luggage?

Source string: そろそろ出発ですかね？　いつでも呼んでくださいよ
Translation: Are we about to leave?　You can call me anytime.

Source string: ちったぁ休んだ方が良いですぜ
Translation: It's better to take a little rest, ya know

Source string:
なぁに、ちょっとくらいゆっくりしたところで
敵は逃げませんよ
Translation:
Hey, even if you slow down a little bit...
The enemy won't run away.

Source string: おっと、へへ――静かにしとくか――
Translation: Oops, heh--I'll be quiet--I'll be quiet.

Source string: 寝ずの番は俺にお任せを――
Translation: Leave the night watch to me.

Source string: 何というかこう、雰囲気が変わりましたね
Translation: The atmosphere has changed.

Source string: へぇ、模様替えってのもいいもんですね
Translation: Wow, it's nice to redecorate, isn't it?

Source string: 先ほどエリア探索から戻りました
Translation: I just returned from exploring the area.

Source string: 覚者様、今回のエリア探索は大収穫ですぜ！
Translation: Dear Arisen, this exploration of the area has been a great success!

Source string: ふーむ、ん？　ん～――
Translation: Hmm, huh? Hmm~

Source string: おっ、覚者様！　庭に何かいますぜ！
Translation: Oh, Master Arisen!　There's something in the garden!

Source string: よし　これくらいか――
Translation: Alright, this should be enough--

Source string: これで大暴れしてみせますぜ
Translation: I'm going to go on a rampage with this.

Source string: 気合い入れてお守りしますよ！
Translation: I will protect you with all my energy!

Source string: このスキル、はやく戦場で活かしたいもんです
Translation: I can't wait to put these skills to use on the battlefield!

Source string: ほぉー、こりゃ面白い戦い方ができそうじゃないですか
Translation: Wow, this should make for some interesting battles.

Source string: 戦いも結構ですが、休養ってのもイイですなぁ
Translation: Fighting is good, but rest is also good.

Source string: さぁてっと、今日はどこに行きますかね？
Translation: Let's see, where are we going today?

Source string: おっ、なんですか？
Translation: Whoa, what is it?

Source string: どうしたんです？　覚者様
Translation:
Master Arisen,
What's wrong?

Source string: 何が来たってお守りします！
Translation: We will protect you no matter what comes your way!

Source string: この間、他所でクラフトの手伝いをしたら喜ばれましたよ！
Translation: I helped with crafts elsewhere the other day and it was appreciated!

Source string:
先日、別の覚者様に呼ばれて
ちょっくら冒険のお供をしてきましたぜ
Translation:
The other day, I was invited by another Arisen person
to accompany him on a little adventure!

Source string: そう言や、別の覚者様に褒められましたよ、俺のこの装備！
Translation: By the way, I was praised by another Arisen for this equipment of mine!

Source string: 覚者様、今日は俺から戦技のご提案をさせてもらえませんかね！
Translation: Arisen, may I propose a combat technique to you today?

Source string:
覚者様に従ってきたおかげで
俺の意思疎通力が上がったんで！
Translation:
Thanks to following the Arisen
My communication skills have improved!

Source string: 覚者様、今日は俺から髪型のご提案があるんですよ！
Translation: Dear Arisen, I have a haircut suggestion for you today!

Source string:
覚者様、新しい家財を入手されたんですか！
こりゃぁいいや！
Translation:
Dear Master, did you get new household goods?
That's good!

Source string: おっ、覚者様！　お帰りですか！
Translation: Oh, Master!　You are back!

Source string: 覚者様がご無事で何より！
Translation: I am glad to hear that you are safe and sound, Arisen!

Source string: 長いことお戻りにならねぇんで、心配してたんですよ
Translation: I was worried because you didn't come back for a long time

Source string: ふぅ、無事帰ってこられましたね！
Translation: Phew, you made it back safely!

Source string: やっぱ家ってのはいいもんですねぇ、力が抜けるや
Translation: It's nice to be at home, isn't it?

Source string: ここにゃ敵は入ってこれません、休憩していきますか？
Translation: The enemy can't get in here. Shall we take a break?

Source string: ボードクエストやら依頼やら、ぬかり無く見ときましょう
Translation: Let's look at all the board quests and requests.

Source string: さーて、次に備えてキッチリ準備しねぇと
Translation: Well, I'd better get ready for the next one.

Source string: 今行きますぜ！
Translation: I'm on my way!

Source string: おっと、覚者様！　待っててください
Translation: Oh, Arisen! Please wait.

Source string: さっ、これで！
Translation: Here we go!

Source string: 俺がついてます！
Translation: I'm with you!

Source string: ふん、怒ってやがる！　気を付けねぇとな！
Translation: He's angry!　I gotta be careful!

Source string: 興奮してるみてぇですね！　攻撃には注意してくださいよ！
Translation: It looks agitated!　Be careful of the attacks!

Source string: へっ、隙ありってな！
Translation: Mm, there's an opening!

Source string: ダウンしたぜ！　全力で行ってやりましょうや！
Translation: It's down! Let's go all out and do it!

Source string: 俺の揺さぶりに耐えられるかぁ？！
Translation: Can you withstand my shaking?!

Source string: おらよ、これで弱点が丸見えだ！
Translation: I see, now all weaknesses are exposed!

Source string: 弱点を叩くってのはな、戦いの基本だぜ！
Translation: Hitting the weak points is the basis of battle, you know!

Source string: この技で支援しますぜ！　反撃しましょうや！
Translation: I'll support you with this technique!　Let's counterattack!

Source string: あいつの能力、下げてやりますかね！
Translation: Shall I lower his abilities?

Source string: 属性を付与！　これで攻撃してみてください！
Translation: Improved attributes! Please try attacking now!

Source string: 渾身の力で――喰らわすぜ――！
Translation: I'll strike you with all my might!

Source string: この技を使うときが来るとはな！　覚悟しろよ！
Translation: I never thought I'd see the time to use this technique!　Brace yourself!

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》限界ってのを、いっちょ超えてみせますぜ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》I'm going to push the limits of what's possible!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》おい――そろそろ全力でいくぜ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》 Hey -- it's time to go all out!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》やってやるぜ、任せときな！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》I'll do it. I'll take care of it!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《剛化》この渾身の力、受けてみやがれ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Harden》This the power of the whole body!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《剛化》全力でぶっ潰す！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Harden》Bust them down with all your might!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《重化》さっさと倒れた方が、いっそ楽だろうに！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》It would be easier to just fall down!</COL>

Source string:
<COL B6FF01>《重化》調子づいてるやつから、
ぶっ飛ばしてやらぁ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》I'm going to blast the crap out of anyone who's getting on my nerves!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《癒活》立て直すぞ――癒しの加護を！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Restoration》Let's restore it――with the blessing of healing!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《癒活》傷や疲れなんぞ、気合いでどうにかならぁ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Restoration》: healing wounds and fatigue with determination!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《柔化》片っ端から弱らせてやりますか！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>Shall we 《Weaken》 them from the beginning?</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《柔化》能力を下げちまえば、怖くもねぇな</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>If you 《Weaken》 the ability, it's not scary, right?</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集中》ありったけの魔力をぶち込んでやらぁ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》: I'll put all the magic I've got into it!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集中》さーて、いっちょう集中といきますかい</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》Now, let's concentrate.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》テメェらの攻撃なんぞ、全部耐えてやらぁ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Fearless》I'll endure all your attacks!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》へっ――つまらねぇ攻撃なんぞ無視だ</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Fearless》―― Ignore such boring attacks</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集視》全員、俺の獲物だぁぁ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》All of you are my prey!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集視》死にたいやつからかかって来な</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Let the dying ones come to me.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《守護》覚者さま、しばらくは無茶できますぜ</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Protection》Arisen, you can be reckless for a while.</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《守護》自分らの守り、ガッチリ固めます</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Protection》 solidly covers our own defense</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《蘇生》覚者さまの命、俺が救いますぜ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》, I will save the lives of the Arisen!</COL>

Source string: 覚者さま、新しい特技、閃めきましたぜ
Translation: Dear Arisen, I've got an idea for a new skill.

Source string:
ほーう、雇われポーンの特技――
コツはつかんだ！
Translation: Ah, I've learned the special skill of a hired pawn -!

Source string: この辺、ジョブ修練敵がいやがりそうですぜ
Translation: The job training enemy is not fond of this area.

Source string: 覚者様、修練敵がいますぜ！
Translation: Lord Arisen, there are training enemies!

Source string: ん？　修練が終わったんじゃねぇですかい
Translation: Hmm? Have you finished your training?

Source string:
どうも近くに貴重な財宝が
眠ってる気がするんですがね
Translation: I have a feeling that there is a valuable treasure nearby.

Source string:
覚者さま、
ここらで宝でも探してみましょうや
Translation:
Dear Arisen, 
Let's try searching for treasures around here.

Source string:
ちょいとお待ちを――
ここら辺、何かありますぜ？
Translation:
Just a moment please...
Is there something around here?

Source string: この辺り、何かあるんじゃないですかね
Translation: I wonder if there's something around here.

Source string:
こいつは珍しいヤツだ、
ありがたくぶちのめしましょうや
Translation:
This guy is a rarity.
Thankfully, we can beat him up.

Source string: へぇ、なかなか見かけない敵だな
Translation: Wow, that's an enemy you don't see very often.

Source string: こいつはなんだ？　貰っておくか
Translation: What is this? Should I take it?

Source string: そろそろ、戦術育成の方もどうですかね？
Translation: How about some tactical training soon?

Source string: うちの覚者様がお世話になってるみてぇで
Translation: It's like my mentor is taking care of me.

Source string:
せっかくですから
ゆっくりしていってくださいよ！
Translation:
Since you're here,
please take your time!

Source string: お任せを
Translation: Leave it to me.

Source string: 覚者様が仰るんなら
Translation: If the Arisen says so

Source string: こいつで治せる！
Translation: This guy can fix it!

Source string: おっと！
Translation: Oops!

Source string: 外れたな
Translation: Missed.

Source string: こいつぁ炎に弱えぇ！
Translation: This guy is weak against fire!

Source string: こいつぁ氷に弱えぇ！
Translation: This guy is weak against ice!

Source string: こいつぁ雷に弱えぇ！
Translation: This guy is weak against lightning!

Source string: こいつぁ聖に弱えぇ！
Translation: This guy is weak to holy attacks!

Source string: こいつぁ闇に弱えぇ！
Translation: This one is weak against darkness!

Source string: さーて、何が出てくるかねぇ
Translation: Well, let's see what we can come up with.

Source string: 一筋縄じゃあ、いかなさそうな場所ですね
Translation: It's not an easy place to get around.

Source string:
なぁ覚者様、俺を見込んで
ひとつ頼まれてくださいませんかね――
なに、悪い話じゃあありません
Translation:
Hey, Master, in recognition of me,
I wonder if you could do me a favor...
No, it's not a bad idea.

Source string:
覚者様、手に入れたこの力で、
今までよりもお力になれるはずです――
お任せくだせぇ
Translation:
Arisen, with the power I have obtained, 
I should be able to be of more help than before―― 
Please entrust it to me.

Source string:
そろそろ出掛けますか？
俺がキッチリお支えしますぜ
Translation:
You ready to get out of here?
I'll take good care of you.

Source string: 目指しましょう！　共に勝利を！！
Translation: Let's aim for it!　Together we will win!

Source string: 最高のパートナーですね、マスター！
Translation: You are the best partner, Master!

Source string: なんと心強い！　負ける気がしません！
Translation: How reassuring!　I don't feel like losing!

Source string: 共に行けること、誇りに思います！
Translation: I am proud to be able to go with you!

Source string: おお！　この出会いに感謝します！
Translation: Oh! I am grateful for this encounter!

Source string: いざ行かん、試練の旅へ！
Translation: Let us embark on a journey of trials!

Source string: おお！　あの方が来られたのでは？
Translation: Oh!　Isn't that guy here?

Source string: これぞ、熱意の成せる業！
Translation: This is the result of passion and dedication!

Source string: よしッ！　次もこの調子で！！
Translation: Alright! Let's keep it up for the next one!

Source string: 我がマスターに栄光あれ！
Translation: Glory be to our Master!

Source string: くっ――この失敗は次の糧に！
Translation: Well... This failure will be my next stepping stone!

Source string: 努力のたまものです！
Translation: It is the fruit of my efforts!

Source string: 我が力、尽きること無し！
Translation: My power is never ending!

Source string: 授かりし力、存分に奮う覚悟！
Translation: The power bestowed upon me, I shall exert it to the fullest with unwavering resolve!

Source string: どんな冒険が始まるのでしょうね、マスター！
Translation: I wonder what adventures are in store for you, Master!

Source string: 我らの行く手、さえぎるものなし！
Translation: Nothing can stop us!

Source string: いた、そこか！
Translation: There it is!

Source string: 敵発見、備えを！
Translation: Enemy detected, be prepared!

Source string: 我がマスターの邪魔はさせるか！
Translation: I will not let you interfere with my master!

Source string: これは！　相手にとって不足なし！
Translation: This is it! No shortage of opponents!

Source string: なに、必ず勝機はあるはずです！
Translation: What? There is always a chance to win!

Source string: 面目ありません！
Translation: I am ashamed!

Source string: ――っ、救援を！
Translation: ――Help, rescue me!

Source string: 手を貸して下さい！
Translation: Please lend me a hand!

Source string: む、無念――
Translation: I'm sorry...

Source string: し、しまった――
Translation: Oh, shoot.

Source string: 先手必勝！
Translation: Preemptive action!

Source string: 蹴散らしましょう！
Translation: Let's kick ass!

Source string: うむ、いい戦いでした！
Translation: Mm, it was a good fight!

Source string: ははは！　我らの勝ちです！
Translation: Ha ha!　We win!

Source string: 我がマスターに敵はなし！！
Translation: Our Master has no enemies!

Source string: マスター！！　今です！
Translation: Master!! Now!

Source string: こんな傷など！　まだまだ余裕です
Translation: These are only scratches!　There is still room for more!

Source string: これしきの傷で、引くものかっ！
Translation: I'm not going to back down just because of this little injury!

Source string: 危機にこそ、チャンスがあります！
Translation: There is opportunity in crisis!

Source string: ま、まだまだぁ！！
Translation: Well, not yet!

Source string: うおおお、持ちこたえてみせる！！
Translation: Woohoo, I'll hold on!

Source string: マ、マスタァアーー！！！
Translation: Ma, mastaaaaaaaah!

Source string: はあああああっ！
Translation: Haaaaaaah!

Source string: よし！　回復だ！
Translation: All right!　Recovery!

Source string: こっちだぁ！　臆病者ども！
Translation: This way!　Cowards!

Source string: 何度でも助けます！
Translation: I will help you as many times as you need!

Source string: そうはさせるか！
Translation: I won't let that happen!

Source string: ここで行く！
Translation: Here we go!

Source string: 受けてみろ！
Translation: Take it!

Source string: 我が渾身の力！
Translation: With all my might!

Source string: 私を踏み台に！
Translation: Use me as a springboard!

Source string: 任せて下さい！
Translation: We'll take care of it!

Source string: 了解です！
Translation: Roger that!

Source string: う！　で、できません！
Translation: Oops! I, I can't do it!

Source string: おお、冒険のご準備でしょうか？
Translation: Oh, are you preparing for an adventure?

Source string:
ご出発はいつでしょうか？
是非、お供を！
Translation:
When is your departure?
Please let me accompany you!

Source string: マスター？もしやお疲れではありませんか？
Translation: Master? Are you tired, by any chance?

Source string: 疲れを取ることも大事です！
Translation: It is also important to get rid of fatigue!

Source string: お休みになるのですね、マスター！よき夢を！
Translation: You are going to have a good night's rest, Master! Sweet dreams!

Source string: 次の冒険に向けて英気を養いましょう！
Translation: Get energized for your next adventure!

Source string: おお、部屋の雰囲気が変わりましたね！
Translation: Oh, the atmosphere of the room has changed!

Source string: 模様替えをすると気分転換になりますね
Translation: Rearranging the room can be refreshing, isn't it?

Source string: マスター、エリア探索より戻りました
Translation: Arisen, I have returned from exploring the area

Source string: 今回のエリア探索成果――、 自信があります！
Translation: I am confident in the results of this area exploration!

Source string: ほう――ふむふむ――なるほど
Translation: Ho-hum-hum-hum--I see.

Source string: マスター！　庭に何かいるようですよ！
Translation: Master!　There seems to be something in the garden!

Source string: ははは、料理も楽しいものですね！
Translation: Haha, cooking is fun too!

Source string: より一層、励む次第です！
Translation: We will work even harder!

Source string: この武具で覚者さまの剣となり盾となり！！
Translation: Become the sword and shield of the Arisen with this equipment!!

Source string: ああ、はやくこのスキルを試したい！
Translation: Oh, I can't wait to try this skill!

Source string: よーし、新たな戦いをお見せいたします！
Translation: Alright, we will show you a renewed battle!

Source string: こういうゆったりした時間も良いものですね、マスター！
Translation: This kind of relaxing time is also good, Master!

Source string: どこにご一緒しようと、お役に立ってみせます！
Translation: Wherever you are with us, we will be of service!

Source string: はい、マスタ－！　私はここに！
Translation: Yes, Master!　I am here!

Source string: どうしました、マスター
Translation: What is it, Master?

Source string: いついつまでも、どこまでも、私はマスターと共に！
Translation: I will be with you forever and ever, wherever you go, Master!

Source string:
先日、別の覚者さまのクラフトのアシスタントをしました！
もちろん、全力で挑みましたよ！
Translation:
The other day, I assisted a fellow Arisen in their Crafting!
Of course, I gave it my all!

Source string: 先日、別の覚者さまに我が闘志をご評価いただきました！
Translation: I was recently commended by another Arisen for my fighting spirit!

Source string: この前、別の覚者様に我が装備をお褒めいただきました！
Translation: I was praised for my equipment by another Arisen the other day!

Source string: マスター、今日は私から戦技の提案があります！
Translation: Master, I have a proposal for combat techniques today.

Source string:
マスターにお仕えしてきたおかげで
私の意思疎通力が上がりました！
Translation:
Thanks to serving the Master,
my communication skills have improved!

Source string: マスター、今日は私から髪型の提案があります！
Translation: Master, today I have a hairstyle suggestion for you!

Source string:
新しい家財を入手されたのですね！
部屋が一段と快適になりそうです！
Translation:
I see that you have acquired new household goods!
It will make your room even more comfortable!

Source string: マスター、おかえりなさいませ！
Translation: Welcome back, Master!

Source string: 無事のご帰還何よりです、マスター！
Translation: Glad to see you back in one piece, Master!

Source string: お戻りになりましたか！　必ずまたお会いできると、信じていました！
Translation: I am so glad you are back!　We believed that we would definitely see you again!

Source string: 今回の旅も、お供できて光栄でした！
Translation: It was an honor to accompany you on this trip as well!

Source string: 帰る家があるというのは、いいものですね！
Translation: It is nice to have a home to go back to!

Source string: ようやく一息つけますね  お怪我はありませんか、マスター
Translation: We can finally take a break. Are you hurt, Master?

Source string: 拠点です！ ここなら安全です！
Translation: Base! It's safe here!

Source string: 道具や装備の点検をしておきましょう！
Translation: Check your tools and equipment!

Source string: マスター！　いまお助けします！
Translation: Master! I'll assist you right now!

Source string: 大丈夫ですか！いまそちらに！
Translation: Are you okay? Over there now!

Source string: どうされました！ しっかりと！
Translation: What's going on? Hold tight!

Source string: さぁ、行きましょう！
Translation: Come on, let's go!

Source string: ふっ、怒っているな！
Translation: Ah, so you're angry!

Source string: 敵が興奮してますね！　ご注意を！
Translation: The enemy seems to be excited! Please be careful!

Source string: 隙あり！　この好機、逃す手はありません！
Translation: There is an opening!　There is no way to pass up this opportunity!

Source string: ダウンしています、全力で攻撃しましょう！
Translation: It is down, attack with all your might!

Source string: 疲れ果てるまで揺さぶってやる！
Translation: I'll shake you until you're exhausted!

Source string: 弱点を暴き出します！　――そこだっ！
Translation: Weaknesses are uncovered!　--That's it!

Source string: 弱点を狙う、これが戦いだっ！
Translation: Target the weakness, that's the battle!

Source string: さぁ、攻めに出ましょう！　支援します！
Translation: Come on, let's go on the offensive!　Support!

Source string: 敵の勢い、この技で削いでみせます！
Translation: The vigor of the enemy, I will use this technique to reduce it!

Source string: 属性を付与します！　攻めましょう！
Translation: Increased attributes! Let's attack!

Source string: この力――全身全霊で叩くッ！
Translation: I'll strike with all my might and soul!

Source string: 磨き上げたこの妙技、その身に焼き付けろ！
Translation: Burn this polished technique into your body!

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》見よ！　限界を超えた、この力っ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》Behold!　This power beyond the limit!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》この奥義、刮目せよ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》Unleash this secret technique!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》これぞ我が全身全霊！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》This is what I am all about!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《剛化》この攻撃、どこまで耐えられるかな！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Harden》I wonder how much longer I can withstand this attack!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《剛化》力を示す！　いくぞ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Harden》Show of force!　Here we go!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《重化》これ以上立っていられると思うな！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》Don't think you can stand any longer!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《重化》一気に体勢を崩してやります！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》, I will do it in one fell swoop!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《癒活》癒しの力で、後押しします！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Restoration》It gives you a boost with the power of healing!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《癒活》我々はまだ戦えるはずです！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Restoration》We should still be able to fight!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《柔化》その攻め、いま鈍らせてやるぞ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Weaken》I'm going to slow down that attack right now!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《柔化》敵を弱らせて隙を作ります！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Weaken》: Weakens the enemy and creates an opening!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集中》全力で集中し、詠唱します！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》 Concentrate all your energy and chant!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集中》我が魔力よ、いまこそ力を！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》My magical power, now is the time to show your strength!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》向かうところ敵無しッ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Fearless》There are no true enemies to face!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》耐えられぬ攻撃など、ないっ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Fearless》There is no attack that cannot be endured!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集視》まとめて受けて立つ！　かかってこい！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》I'll take it all!　Come and get me!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集視》今こそ、道を切り開く時！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Now is the time to blaze a trail!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《守護》守りを固めます、攻勢に出ましょう！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Protection》We're going on the offensive!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《守護》これぞ鋼の防御！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Protection》This is the steel defense!</COL>

Source string:
<COL B6FF01>《蘇生》マスター！
さあ、お立ちください！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》Master-! Please stand up!</COL>

Source string: マスター！　とびきりの特技を閃きました！
Translation: Master! I have come up with an amazing Special Skill!

Source string:
なるほど！　
雇われたポーンの特技、私も覚えました！
Translation:
Arisen!　
Hired pawns Special Skill, I learned it too!

Source string:
マスター、
辺りにジョブ修練敵の気配を感じます！
Translation: Master, I sense a job training enemy around!

Source string: マスター、修練敵がすぐそこに！
Translation: Master, the training enemy is right there!

Source string:
さすがはマスター！　
ジョブ修練を達成されましたね！
Translation: You've done it, Master! You've completed the job training!

Source string: この辺り、貴重な宝があるのでは！？
Translation: There must be some precious treasures around here!

Source string:
近くに希少な宝があるかもしれませんよ、
マスター
Translation:
There may be a rare treasure nearby,
Master

Source string: 近くに何かありそうですよ、よく確認を！
Translation: There seems to be something nearby, be sure to check it carefully!

Source string:
うん？　
この辺り――きっとなにかありますよ！？
Translation:
What?　
Around here - there must be something!

Source string: こいつは稀有な敵です、マスター！
Translation: This guy is a rare adversary, Master!

Source string:
この敵は討伐を！　
なかなか遭う敵ではありません！
Translation:
This enemy must be defeated!　
It is not something you will encounter often!

Source string: アイテム発見！　拾っておきます！
Translation: Item found!　I'll pick it up!

Source string:
マスター、
よろしければ戦術育成をお願いします！
Translation:
Master,
If you don't mind, I would appreciate tactical training!

Source string: おお、歓迎いたします！
Translation: Oh, welcome!

Source string: 数々の武勇伝、うかがっております！
Translation: We have heard numerous tales of bravery!

Source string: なるほど！
Translation: I see!

Source string: では、さっそく！
Translation: So, let's get started!

Source string: これで、ご安心を！
Translation: Now you can rest assured!

Source string: 見切った！
Translation: I saw through it!

Source string: 捉えられるか！？
Translation: Can you catch it?!

Source string: 炎で攻めましょう！
Translation: Attack with fire!

Source string: 氷で攻めましょう！
Translation: Attack with ice!

Source string: 雷で攻めましょう！
Translation: Attack with lightning!

Source string: 聖で攻めましょう！
Translation: Let's attack with holy power!

Source string: 闇で攻めましょう！
Translation: Let's attack with darkness!

Source string: よきものがあるといいですね！
Translation: I hope you have a good one!

Source string: さぁ、未知なる島の探索を！
Translation: Now, explore the unknown island!

Source string:
マスター！　今後一層のお役にたてるよう
今日は折り入ってお願いがあります
Translation:
Master!　I would like to make a request to you today,
so that we can be of even greater service to you in the future.

Source string:
ああ――感謝します、マスター！
手にした力で、今まで以上に
お役に立ってみせます！
Translation:
Oh--thank you, Master!
With the power in my hands, I will be more
useful to you than ever before!

Source string:
マスター、いますぐ冒険に出ましょう！
必ずお役に立ってみせます！
Translation:
Master, let's go on an adventure now!
I will surely be of help to you!

Source string: お役に立てるかどうか――
Translation: Whether I can be of assistance or not――

Source string: できたらお供を――
Translation: If possible, bring a companion...

Source string: ご、ご一緒できて感激です
Translation: I'm so grateful that we can be together.

Source string: 自分のような者で良ければ――
Translation: If it's okay with someone like myself--

Source string: うまくやれるかどうか――
Translation: I don't know if I can do it--

Source string: どうか、旅が成功しますように――
Translation: May your journey be successful —

Source string: あの――誰か、来たみたいです
Translation: Um... I think someone's here.

Source string: なんとかなりましたね
Translation: We managed to do that, didn't we?

Source string: こんな自分でも、やれた！
Translation: Even I could do it!

Source string: 運を味方にできました
Translation: I was able to get lucky.

Source string: 落ち込みます――
Translation: It's depressing--

Source string: 少しは強くなれたような気が――
Translation: I feel a little stronger.

Source string: やった！　これできっと――
Translation: I did it!　I'm sure this will--

Source string: 少し、自信が湧きました
Translation: I feel a little more confident.

Source string: 緊張しますね
Translation: I'm nervous.

Source string: どこまで行くんでしょう
Translation: How far will we go?

Source string: あっ、あそこに！
Translation: Oh, there!

Source string: 敵が、もう近くに
Translation: The enemy is already close by.

Source string: 敵です、もっと慎重に
Translation: Be careful, it's an enemy.

Source string: あ、あれと戦うなんて――
Translation: Oh, I can't believe I'm fighting that thing--

Source string: あの敵は――ま、まずいかも――
Translation: That enemy.. may be.. uh-oh..

Source string: た、助かりました
Translation: Thank you very much for your help!

Source string: 助けて！！
Translation: Help me!!

Source string: うわあっ、だ、誰かっ！
Translation: Oh no, s-someone is there!

Source string: ああ――力が、抜けていく――
Translation: Oh--the power is draining out of me...

Source string: もう、もうダメかも――
Translation: I think I'm losing it.

Source string: 行くしかない、ですか
Translation: We have to go, right?

Source string: 仕方ありません
Translation: it can't be helped

Source string: つ、疲れましたね
Translation: I'm tired.

Source string: ああ――緊張しましたぁ
Translation: Oh--I was so nervous!

Source string: ご無事で本当に良かったです
Translation: I am so glad you are safe.

Source string: 止（と）めました！　今のうちに！
Translation: I stopped it! Now is the time!

Source string: 何ともない、何ともない
Translation: Nothing to worry about. Nothing to worry about.

Source string: うう、不安です――
Translation: Ugh, I'm worried--

Source string: こ、このままでは――
Translation: If we don't do this--

Source string: もう、もうギリギリ――
Translation: I'm already on edge--

Source string: は、早く回復しないと！
Translation: If you don't recover soon!

Source string: え？　――か、覚者さま！？
Translation: Eh? - A-Arisen!?

Source string: 待って、もう少し――
Translation: Wait, I'm almost--

Source string: これで少しは
Translation: Here's a little more.

Source string: 目立ちたくないけど、ここは――！
Translation: I don't want to stand out, but here's the thing--

Source string: が、頑張って！
Translation: But good luck!

Source string: 危ない！
Translation: Caution!

Source string: このっ！
Translation: You!

Source string: いい加減に！
Translation: Enough is enough!

Source string: ああっ、もうっ！
Translation: Ah, geez!

Source string: 早く、今なら！
Translation: Quickly, now!

Source string: うん――
Translation: Yeah--

Source string: りょ、了解
Translation: Roger that.

Source string: えっ！？　そんな、無理――
Translation: What?　Oh, no, I can't--

Source string: 冒険の準備をされるんですか？
Translation: Are you getting ready for an adventure?

Source string: あの、お出かけですか？　良ければお供を――
Translation: Um, are you going out?　If you don't mind, I'll accompany you...

Source string: お疲れでしたら休まれた方が――
Translation: If you're tired, you should get some rest.

Source string: 覚者さまが休めると安心です
Translation: Lord Arisen can rest and be at ease

Source string: あ、お休みなさい、覚者さま
Translation: Ah, good night, Lord Arisen

Source string: 休養も大事ですよね
Translation: Rest is important, too.

Source string: 何だかお部屋の感じが変わりましたね
Translation: It kind of changed the feel of the room.

Source string: ふふ、模様替えって楽しいです
Translation: Redecorating is fun!

Source string: 覚者さま、ただいまエリア探索から戻りました
Translation: Arisen, I have returned from exploring the area

Source string: 今回のエリア探索、中々良い成果を上げられました！
Translation: We achieved very good results in this area exploration!

Source string: えっと――ん――、あ、そっか――
Translation: Um... Ah, I see...

Source string: 覚者さま、お庭に何かが――
Translation: Arisen, something has appeared in the garden...

Source string: うーん、美味しくできますように――
Translation: I hope it turns out delicious...

Source string:
わ、ありがとうございます！
あの、頑張ります――！
Translation:
Wow, thank you very much!
Um, I'll do my best--!

Source string: この装備に見合うような働きをしないと
Translation: We need to work to match this equipment.

Source string: このスキルなら、きっと――
Translation: With these skills, I'm sure--

Source string: 上手く扱えるといいんですけど
Translation: I hope I can handle it well.

Source string: たまには、こうしてゆっくりするのもいいですね
Translation: Sometimes it's nice to relax like this.

Source string: あ、もしかしてお出かけですか？
Translation: Oh, perhaps you are going out?

Source string: は、はい。なんでしょう？
Translation: Yes, what is it?

Source string: あのう、どうかしましたか？
Translation: Um, what's wrong?

Source string: もっと――もっと、覚者さまのお役に立ちたいです
Translation: I want to be more helpful to Lord Arisen-- much more than that.

Source string:
この前、他の覚者さまの元でクラフトのお手伝いをしました
うまく出来ていたらいいんですけど――
Translation:
The other day, I helped another Arisen with a craft
I hope it went well--

Source string:
この間、他の覚者さまのお供をしました。
緊張したけど、頑張ったつもりです
Translation:
The other day, I accompanied another Arisen.
I was nervous, but I tried my best.

Source string: あの、この前他の覚者さまがこの服装を褒めてくださいました
Translation: Well, the other day, another Arisen complimented me on this attire.

Source string: 覚者さま、今日は戦技のご提案をさせてください！
Translation: Arisen, please allow me to propose a battle technique today!

Source string: 覚者さまにお仕えしてきたおかげで、意思疎通力が上がりました！
Translation: Thanks to the Arisen who I have served, I have improved my communication skills!

Source string: 覚者さま、今日は髪型のご提案があります！
Translation: Dear Arisen, I have a hair style suggestion for you today!

Source string:
覚者さま、新しい家財を入手されたんですね！
これは快適になりそう――
Translation:
Dear Arisen, I see that you have acquired new household goods!
This is going to be comfortable--

Source string: 覚者さま、おかえりなさい
Translation: Arisen, welcome back

Source string: はぁ、ご無事で安心しました
Translation: Haha, I'm so relieved you're okay.

Source string: 長い間お戻りにならなかったから、ずっと心配でした――
Translation: I was worried because you didn't come back for a long time.

Source string:
良かった、
無事に家までお送りできた――
Translation: It's good. I was able to safely take you home.

Source string: やっぱりこの部屋に戻るとほっとしますね
Translation: I'm still relieved to be back in this room.

Source string: 覚者さま、一休みしていかれますか？
Translation: Would you like to take a break, Master?

Source string: ふぅ、ここは安心できます
Translation: Phew, I feel safe here.

Source string: 依頼や情報――いろいろと確認しましょう
Translation: Let's check out the various requests and information.

Source string: い、今行きますから！
Translation: I, I'm going now!

Source string: 大丈夫です、すぐに自分が――！
Translation: I'm fine, I'll be there in a second!

Source string: 覚者さま！だ、大丈夫ですか？
Translation: Lord Arisen! Are you, are you alright?

Source string: まだ、諦めないで――！
Translation: Don't give up just yet--!

Source string: お、怒ってるみたいです！　気を付けてください！
Translation: Oh, he seems angry!　Be careful!

Source string: 興奮状態です！　敵が暴れるかも知れません！
Translation: Excitement!　The enemy may be out of control!

Source string: あっ、敵に隙ができました！
Translation: Oh, an opportunity has arisen with the enemy!

Source string: ダ、ダウンしたみたいです！　いきましょう！
Translation: It seems, it seems down! Let's go!

Source string: 揺さぶりにいきます！
Translation: I'm going to shake things up!

Source string: 弱点を露出します――！　狙ってください！
Translation: Expose its weakness! Aim for it!

Source string: 弱点――コアを攻撃します！
Translation: Weaknesses--attack the core!

Source string: 支援しますから、反撃を！
Translation: We will support you, so you counterattack!

Source string: 敵の能力、下げてみせます！
Translation: Lowering the enemy's ability!

Source string: 属性を付与します！　攻めに出てください！
Translation: Increased attributes! Let's attack!

Source string: んん、力を溜めて――！
Translation: Hold on, gathering strength-!

Source string: この大技で――決めますッ！
Translation: I will decide this with a big move!

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》本当の力を、解放します！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》: Unleash your true power!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》覚者さま、ぜ、全力でいきます――</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》Lord Arisen, let's go with all our strength――</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《特技》流れを変えるなら――いまだ！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》If you want to turn the tide - now is the time!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《剛化》敵を倒すことに集中します！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Harden》Concentrate on defeating enemies!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《剛化》ありったけの力で――攻撃します！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Harden》This attack will be with all the force I can muster!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《重化》見ててください、敵を倒れさせます！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》Watch me, I will make the enemy fall!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《重化》て、敵の体勢を崩します！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》disrupts the enemy's position!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《癒活》癒しの力で、支えます！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Restoration》We will support you with the power of healing!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《癒活》だ、大丈夫です、立て直します！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Restoration》, I'm fine, I'll recover!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《柔化》弱体化させて敵の能力を下げます</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Weaken》the enemy's abilities</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《柔化》状態異常、頑張りますから！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Weaken》I'll do my best!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集中》あんなやつ、この魔力で！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》I'm going to use all my magic strength to destroy that thing!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集中》集中すれば、もっと早く――！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》If you focus, you'll be able to do it faster--!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》今ならどんな攻撃も、怖くない！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Fearless》I'm not afraid of any attack now!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》敵の攻撃、耐え抜いてみせます！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Fearless》I will endure the enemy's attack!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集視》ま、前に、出ます――！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》I'm going to go out in front--!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《集視》こ、こらー！　こっちだぞー！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Hey, over here! Come this way!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《守護》守りを固めました！　皆で攻撃を！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Protection》We strengthened our defense! Everyone, attack!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《守護》敵の攻撃、しばらく我慢できるはず！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Protection》, We should be able to withstand the enemy's attack for a while!</COL>

Source string: <COL B6FF01>《蘇生》自分がお助けします！　覚者さま――！</COL>
Translation: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》I will help you! Lord Arisenー!</COL>

Source string: 閃きました――新しい特技を――！
Translation: I had a flash of inspiration - a new special skill...!

Source string: な、仲間の使った特技――覚えました！
Translation: I... learned a special skill used by my friends――Arisen!

Source string: この辺りにジョブ修練敵がいるみたいです――
Translation: There seems to be a job-training enemy in this area--

Source string: あの、そこに修練敵が――
Translation: You know, there's a training enemy out there--

Source string: 覚者さま、修練が達成されましたよ
Translation: Arisen, your trial has been accomplished!

Source string: この近く――貴重な宝物がありそうです――
Translation: There seems to be a valuable treasure nearby.

Source string: 覚者さま、近くに希少な宝があるような――
Translation: Arisen, it seems there is a rare treasure nearby--

Source string: あの――この辺り、何だか気になります
Translation: Um - I'm kind of curious about this area.

Source string: んん、ここは、なにかありそうです――
Translation: Hmmm, there's something going on here--

Source string: あまり見ない敵がいます、どうしますか――？
Translation: There are enemies you don't see very often, what do you do--?

Source string: か、覚者さま、この敵は珍しいやつです
Translation: This enemy is a rare one.

Source string: これ、なんでしょうか――
Translation: What is this--?

Source string: 覚者さま、せ、戦術育成――どうですか――？
Translation: Arisen, h-how about tactical training?

Source string: ふふ――ゆっくりしていってくださいね
Translation: Well... please take your time.

Source string: あの、お会いできて光栄です
Translation: Um, it's an honor to meet you.

Source string: や、やってみます！
Translation: Ya, I'll try!

Source string: わかりました――
Translation: I understand--

Source string: 回復、します！
Translation: Recovery, yes!

Source string: うわぁっ
Translation: Wow!

Source string: 当たらないよ！
Translation: It won't hit!

Source string: 炎が効きそうです！
Translation: The flames seem to work!

Source string: 氷が効きそうです！
Translation: Ice seems to help!

Source string: 雷が効きそうです！
Translation: Lightning seems to work!

Source string: 聖が効きそうです！
Translation: Holy seems to work!

Source string: 闇が効きそうです！
Translation: Darkness seems to work!

Source string: 何があるんでしょう、ここ
Translation: What could be here?

Source string: 不気味だけど、覚者さまと一緒なら――
Translation: It's creepy, but if you're with an Arisen――

Source string:
か、覚者さま――もっとお役にたてるように
１つお願いがあるんです――
Translation:
I'd like to be of more help to you, Arisen.
I have one favor to ask--

Source string:
ありがとうございました――
身に付けた力で、もっと覚者さまに
頼っていただけるように、頑張ります――
Translation:
Thank you very much--
I will work hard so that you, Arisen, will be able to rely on me more with the power I have acquired.

Source string:
覚者さま、あの、冒険に行きませんか？
今まで以上に、お役に立ってみせますから――
Translation:
Dear Master, um, would you like to go on an adventure?
I will be more useful to you than ever before.

Source string: よろしくお願いします
Translation: Nice to meet you!

Source string: ともに参りましょう
