見たところセシリーは、無垢な心を持った
乙女という風情だが――
Translation:
From the looks of it, Cecily has the air of a
maiden with an innocent heart...

Source string:
いったい何故セシリーが狙われねば
ならんのだ
Translation: Why on earth is Cecily being targeted?

Source string:
騎士団と覚者が力を合わせて戦えば
勝てぬ相手などおらん――
Translation:
When the knight order and the Arisen join forces and fight together,
There is no opponent we cannot defeat.

Source string:
そう信じているのだが、戦ってばかりでは
事態の把握は不可能
やはり戦力の分割は避けられぬわ
Translation: I believe that if we keep fighting all the time, it will be impossible to grasp the situation. I still cannot avoid the division of forces.

Source string:
問題は幾つもあるが
せめて侵食魔だけでも排除できないものだろうか
そうなれば人員配置が楽になるのだが
Translation: There are a number of problems, but can we at least eliminate the Corruption demon? That would make manpower allocation a lot easier.

Source string: レオは何か言ってこないのか？
Translation: Leo didn't say anything?

Source string:
状況が変われば考え方を変える
その柔軟さが美点だったが――
それすらも変わってしまったのだろうか
Translation:
If the situation changes, change your way of thinking
That flexibility was a virtue, but-
Has that even changed too?

Source string:
侵食魔どもめ――
奴らのせいでじっくり考える事もできん
Translation:
Those invaders--
they're the reason I can't even think straight.

Source string:
機先を制するには腰を据えた思索が
不可欠だというのに――
Translation: In order to take the lead, it is crucial to engage in in-depth contemplation and reflection.

Source string:
そろそろ明るい兆しが見えても良いはずだが――
セシリーには焦るなと言ったものの
一番落ち着くべきなのはわたしかもしれんな
Translation:
There should be a silver lining by now--
Although I told Cecily not to rush
I'm probably the one who needs to calm down the most.

Source string:
首尾はどうだ？
朗報を待っているぞ
Translation:
How'd it go?
I'm waiting for good news.

Source string:
精神的な強い衝撃が人の記憶を奪うという
話は昔から知られている
Translation: The story of a strong psychological impact that robs people of their memory has been known since ancient times.

Source string: セシリーの場合はどのような事情なのだろうな
Translation: I wonder what the circumstances are in Cecily's case.

Source string:
ロイグの病気がわたしの知るものであれば
相当苦しいはずだ
早く助けてやりたいものだな
Translation:
If Loeg's illness is what I think it is
he must be in a lot of pain
I hope I can help him soon.

Source string:
いやはや――
まったく――
Translation:
Oh my goodness - 
Absolutely -

Source string:
ロイグとセシリーの記憶合わせが
不調に終わってから
嫌な予感しかしないのだ
Translation: After trying to jog Loeg's and Cecily's memories and failing, I can't help but feel a sense of unease.

Source string:
今は――
セシリーを疎ましく思ったことを恥じて
回復を祈るばかりだ
Translation: Now... I only feel ashamed for thinking of Cecily with such animosity, and I can only pray for her recovery.

Source string:
頼むぞ
レオとおまえの間にどんな絆が――
あるいは確執があるのかは知らんが
今はセシリーを助けることを最優先してくれ
Translation:
Please,
whatever bond you have with Leo--
or whatever feud you have with him--
your priority right now is to help Cecily.

Source string:
セシリーが一命を取り留めた
憂いがひとつ消えたというわけだ
再び、前へ進もうではないか
Translation:
Cecily survived
So that's one sorrow gone.
Let's move forward again!

Source string:
もし時間があるのなら
たまにでいいから、島の様子を見てくれよ
Translation:
If you have the time,
just check in with me once in a while to see what's going on on the island.

Source string: 異郷の姿、その目でしかと見届けよ
Translation: See with your own eyes what it is like to be in another land.

Source string:
こちらのことは何も心配するな
それから――
フィンダムの住民と接触する時は
威厳を忘れずにな
Translation: Don't worry about anything here. And then, when interacting with residents of Phindym, don't forget your dignity.

Source string:
さあ、早くフィンダムに行ってやれ
無事を信じているとはいえ、ガルドリンの安否も
気になるところだ
Translation:
Come on, hurry up and go to Phindym
While I believe in his safety, I'm also concerned about Gurdolin's well-being.

Source string:
フィンダムのことはフィンダムの民たちが
よく知っているだろう
Translation: Phindym's people must know about Phindym.

Source string:
解決の方法も、何かあるのかもしれない
うまく聞きだして、手助けしてやりなさい
Translation:
There might be a solution, or something that can be done
Listen carefully and provide assistance

Source string:
《原始の雫》の到着を座して待つのも
手持ちぶさただろう
さあ、フィンダムへ行って、手伝ってやりなさい
Translation:
It would be boring to just sit and wait for the arrival of 《Primeval Drops》.
Now, go to Phindym and lend a hand.

Source string:
奪われた《原始の雫》――
多少出過ぎた真似をしてもかまわんから
必ず取り戻すのだぞ
Translation:
The stolen 《Primeval Drops》--
I don't care if you go a little overboard,
you must get them back!

Source string:
セシリーにはよくしてやるのだぞ？
ぜひ、強い友情の絆を結んでくれ
少々の利害の対立などに負けぬ、強い絆を
Translation:
I will treat Cecily well, okay?
Please, form a strong bond of friendship
Do not lose to small conflicts or disputes, maintain a strong bond.

Source string:
セシリーは重い責任に押し潰されそうに
なってはいないか？
側にいて、支えてやるといい
Translation:
Cecily, do you feel like you're being crushed under the weight of heavy responsibilities?
Stay by her side and support her.

Source string:
白竜はフィンダムの精霊竜ウィルミアに
語りかけようとしているがうまくいかないようだ
Translation: The White Dragon is trying to communicate with the spirit dragon Willmia of Phindym, but it doesn't seem to be going well.

Source string:
おまえたちも忙しいだろうが
気にしてみてくれ
Translation: You guys must be busy too, but please try to care.

Source string:
時に、ロイグの行方はまだわからんのか
もしや救いを求めているということはないか？
Translation:
Sometimes, is it still unknown where Loeg is.
Is it possible that he is seeking salvation?

Source string: 今一度会い、真意を聞いてみたいものだ
Translation: I would like to see him again and hear his true intentions.

Source string:
ロイグのことは聞いた
なんとも無念ではあるが――
Translation:
I heard about Loeg
It is truly regrettable but - -

Source string:
フィンダムの汚れとともに
あの男の闇も浄化されるだろうよ
Translation:
Together with the earth of Phindym,
his darkness will also be purified.

Source string:
フィンダムの完全な復興には
まだまだ時間がかかるだろう
時々訪ねて、経過を報告しておくれ
Translation: The complete recovery of Phindym will still take a long time. Please check in occasionally and report on the progress.

Source string: これは吉兆だ――良きことが始まる――
Translation: This is a good omen - good things are beginning.

Source string:
自分に言い聞かせようとしているが
なかなか――な
Translation:
I'm trying to tell myself that
but it's not easy to--

Source string:
異郷の地にひとり残るとは
エリオットの評価を改めねばならんな
Translation:
To remain alone in a foreign land,
I'll have to revise my assessment of Elliott.

Source string: 指示や助言をしようにも情報が足りんわ
Translation: Even if I try to give instructions or advice, there is not enough information.

Source string:
しばらくは、おまえたちの判断で
臨機応変に対応してくれ
Translation: For a while, please handle things flexibly and adapt as you see fit.

Source string: メイロワ将軍とはうまくやれそうか？
Translation: Do you think you and General Meirova will get along well?

Source string:
まずは王子が戻らないことには
どうにも動きようがないな
Translation:
First of all, if the prince doesn't come back,
there's no way to make a move.

Source string:
聞こえてくる話から想像するに
ネド王子の性根は悪くなさそうだ
友好的な関係を築いてくれよ
Translation: From the stories I hear, it seems that Prince Nedo is not a bad person at heart. He has built friendly relationships.

Source string:
敵の砦に乗り込むと聞いている
くれぐれも気をつけてな
Translation:
I hear you're going to ride into an enemy stronghold.
Take care.

Source string:
当面の目的であったネド王子の救出は
思惑通りに終わったわけだが――
Translation: The rescue mission of Prince Nedo, which was the immediate objective, has ended as planned.

Source string: 次の動きが気になるところだな
Translation: I'm curious about the next move.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の討伐が解放軍の目的とすれば
次はいかなる道を進むのか――
Translation:
If the goal of the Liberation Army is to defeat the "evil dragon,"
what path will it take next?

Source string:
協力を惜しむ必要はないが
レスタニアの利を忘れるなよ
Translation:
There is no need to be stingy with collaboration,
but don't forget about the benefit of Lestania.

Source string:
解放軍が勢い付いたことで
アッカーシェランの混乱はますます
拡大するだろう
Translation: With the recent momentum gained by the People's Liberation Army, the chaos in Acre Selund is expected to further escalate.

Source string: 短期決戦と相成ればよいが
Translation: I hope it's a short war.

Source string: 敵の攻勢は予想通りだ
Translation: The enemy's offensive is predictable.

Source string:
メイロワ将軍も策を講じていることだろう
しのぎきれば未来は明るいぞ
Translation:
General Meirova is also likely taking measures
If we endure, the future will be bright

Source string:
“悪しき竜”め！
アッカーシェランの次はこのレスタニア――
Translation:
"Evil Dragon," beware!
After Acre Selund, is Lestania--

Source string:
それが狙いだというのなら
思い上がりも甚だしいわい
Translation:
If that's your intention,
it's extremely presumptuous.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の言葉を文字通りに信じても
良いのだろうか
Translation:
Can we take the words of the "Evil Dragon" literally?
I don't know if I believe it.

Source string: あぁ――疑念の沼は底なしだな
Translation: Ah--the swamp of doubt is bottomless.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の言葉を文字通りに信じても
良いのだろうか
Translation:
“悪しき竜”の言葉を文字通りに信じても
良いのだろうか

Source string: あぁ――疑念の沼は底なしだな
Translation: あぁ――疑念の沼は底なしだな

Source string:
言うまでもないことだろうが――
城の奪回はそう簡単なことではないだろう
Translation:
I guess it goes without saying--
Taking back the castle won't be so easy.

Source string:
危険は避けられないとしても
無謀な行動は慎むのだぞ
Translation:
Even though danger is inevitable,
you must refrain from reckless behavior.

Source string:
奪われた城を取り戻すという悲願の成就
解放軍の面々はさぞ喜んでいるだろう
Translation:
The fulfillment of the long-held dream of regaining the castle that was taken from us
I'm sure the liberation army is very happy to see you.

Source string: 想像するとわたしまで頬が緩むわ
Translation: I can't help but smile when I think about it.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”が絶望の大陸と呼んだ
アッカーシェランの状況は大いに変わった
Translation:
The "Evil Dragon" referred to as the Land of Despair.
The situation of Acre Selund has greatly changed.

Source string: こうなると奴の沈黙が不気味だな
Translation: When it comes to this, his silence is eerie.

Source string:
おまえたちも同じだろうが、わたしの頭の中は
黒い鎧の騎士でいっぱいだ
Translation:
You guys are the same, right? But inside my head,
it's filled with black-clad knights.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”といい黒い騎士といい
姿を見せずに我々を翻弄するとは――
なんと卑劣な者たちだ
Translation:
"Evil Dragon" and the black knight, for that matter,
To manipulate us without showing their true forms—
How despicable these individuals are.

Source string: 落ち着け――落ち着くのだ
Translation: Calm down――You need to calm down.

Source string:
ブラッドオーブは続々と集まっているが
効果は薄いと言わざるをえないのだ
Translation: Blood orbs are gathering one after another, but it must be said that their effectiveness is weak.

Source string:
レスタニアの未来は文字どおり
おまえたちの活躍にかかっている
Translation: The future of Lestania depends on your actions

Source string:
思えば、わたしの記憶の中の白竜は
いつも病み、苦しんでいた
しかし、これほど痛ましい状況は初めてだ
Translation:
Looking back, the White Dragon in my memories
was always sick and suffering
However, this is the first time I have witnessed such a painful situation.

Source string:
もう一刻の猶予も許されないのだろう
さあ、行ってくれ
Translation:
I guess there is no time left for another moment of delay.
Now, please go.

Source string:
ごくろうだったな
ゆっくりと休んでくれ
Translation:
You've worked hard.
Please take a rest.

Source string:
いや、もちろん、歌い、食べ、大いに語るのもよい
好きにしなさい
多少のことは多めに見よう
Translation:
No, of course, it's good to sing, eat, and talk a lot. 
Do as you like.
Let's consider even the small things a little more.

Source string:
リズから聞いたところによると
ネド王子が行方不明なのだとか
しかも自分の意志で城を出たらしい
Translation:
According to what Lise told me,
it seems that Prince Nedo is missing,
and furthermore, he seems to have left the castle on his own accord.

Source string: この期に及んでいったい何事だろうな
Translation: What on earth is going on at this point?

Source string:
こんなことを言うとまた嫌われるのだろうが
アッカーシェラン側が口裏を合わせて
我々を騙そうとしている可能性も
皆無ではない
Translation: I may be disliked again for saying this, but there is a possibility that Acre Selund is conspiring and trying to deceive us.

Source string:
ほら、そんな顔をするな
あくまでも可能性の話だ
Translation:
Don't make that face.
It's just a discussion of possibilities.

Source string:
この状況――
これまでの経緯を思えば王子に悪意が
あるとは思えない
Translation: Given the situation ―― considering the previous circumstances, it is hard to believe that the prince has any ill intentions.

Source string:
しかし――
もう少し仕える者たちを大切にせねば
国を治めるのは難しいだろうな
Translation:
However...
If we do not value and appreciate those who serve us a little more,
it will be difficult to govern the country.

Source string:
もちろん王子の安全をいち早く確保して
気持ちを尊重すべく話し合うことも重要だ
Translation: Of course, it is important to promptly ensure the prince's safety and have respectful discussions.

Source string:
しかしそろそろおまえたちだけでも
気持ちを竜退治に切り替えた方が
良いのかもしれんぞ
Translation: However, perhaps it would be better for just you guys to start shifting your feelings towards defeating the dragon.

Source string:
ふん――
重大な事はいくらでもあるというのに
エリオットのことばかり考えてしまう
Translation:
Hmm――
Even though there are countless important things to consider,
I can't help but think only about Elliot.

Source string:
竜と竜力、そして大地の恵みが不可分で
ある以上、竜のいない大陸は
考えられない
Translation: Dragon and Dragon Force, along with the blessings of the earth, are inseparable. Therefore, a continent without dragons is unimaginable.

Source string:
とすれば竜力の継承抜きに竜の討伐は
考えられないとは思わんか？
Translation: Don't you think it's impossible to defeat a dragon without inheriting the power of Dragon Force Augmentation?

Source string:
いやはや――
この事件を記録に残さねばならないが
Translation:
Well, well...
I must record this incident.

Source string:
やはりわたしも一度はアッカーシェランを
訪ねる必要があるようだ
Translation: It seems that I also need to visit Acre Selund at least once.

Source string:
ほう、《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を持ってきたのか
これはまた貴重な物を手に入れたものだ
Translation:
Oh, you brought the 《LV.80 Orb of Growth》
This is quite a valuable item that you've obtained.

Source string:
これを使えば、今のジョブをLV.80に上げ
スキルやアビリティに関しても、特殊なもの以外
上限まで引き上げることができる
――もちろん、ジョブポイントも上限まで貯まる
Translation:
With this, you can raise your current job to level 80.
You can also raise the limit for skills and abilities, except for special ones.
And of course, job points can be accumulated up to the new limit.

Source string:
これを持ってきたということは、今のジョブで
《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を使うのか？
Translation:
If you brought this, does that mean you will use
《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 with your current job?

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
そうか
貴重な物だからな
じっくり考えて使うといい
Translation:
I see.
It's valuable, so be sure to think carefully and use it.

Source string:
――これはすまぬ
そのジョブには《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》は
効果が無いのだ
別のジョブで考え直してみてくれ
Translation:
--Sorry about this
The 《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 has no
effect on that job.
Think again with a different job.

Source string:
それでは宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
Translation:
Now let us release the power of the Orb
--Quiet your mind and close your eyes.

Source string:
無事LV.80になったようだぞ
さて、次はスキルだな
――もう一度目を閉じるがよい
Translation:
It seems like I've safely reached level 80.
Now, it's time for skills.
―― Close your eyes once again.

Source string:
スキルの確認は落ち着いてからにしなさい
よし、最後はアビリティか
――目を閉じて集中するのだ
Translation:
Check your skills only after you've calmed down.
Okay, the last thing you need is abilities.
--Close your eyes and concentrate.

Source string:
これでこのジョブのアビリティも
特殊なもの以外は全ておまえのものとなったぞ
Translation:
Now all the abilities of this job
are yours, except for the special ones!

Source string:
どのように成長したかは
見た目ではわからないからな
アーチボルトのところへ行って
確認してみることをすすめるよ
Translation: How you have grown is not apparent from your appearance, so I recommend going to Archibald's place and checking to confirm.

Source string:
宝珠の力を解放するには少し時間がかかる
パーティーは一度解散してきた方がよかろう
パーティーメンバーを無暗に
待たせてしまうかもしれん
Translation:
It may take a little time to unleash the power of the treasure.
It would be better for the party to disband once and come back.
You may end up keeping the party members waiting unnecessarily.

Source string:
――気付いているだろうが
このジョブはすでにLV.80に達しているな
レベルアップの効果が無駄になってしまうが
それでも宝珠を使うのか？
Translation:
I guess you've noticed,
but this job has already reached level 80.
The effects of leveling up would be wasted,
but are you still going to use the treasure?

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
ふむ――このジョブで《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を
使っても、上げられるスキルが無いようだ
スキルに関する効果が無駄になってしまうが
宝珠を使ってもよいのか？
Translation:
Hmm―― It seems that there are no skills that can be raised even if you use the 《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 on this job.
Although the effects related to skills will be wasted, is it okay to use the orb?

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
これは――このまま《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を
使っても、効果のあるアビリティは無いようだぞ
今のジョブで宝珠を使うのか？
Translation:
This... even if you use the 《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 at this level, it seems there are no abilities to be raised.
Are you going to use the orb with your current job?

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
そうか
おまえが納得しているのなら
わたしからこれ以上言うことはない
Translation: I see. If you're satisfied, I have nothing more to say.

Source string:
それでは、宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
Translation: Now, let us release the power of the Orb. Quiet your mind and close your eyes.

Source string:
これは強い竜力が篭められた宝珠だな
この宝珠の力を解放して白竜に捧げれば
おまえの《竜力の継承》は完全なものとなるだろう
Translation:
This is a jewel imbued with strong Dragon Force.
If you offer it to the White Dragon, your 《Dragon Force Augmentation》 will become complete.

Source string:
ここに持ってきたということは
今、この宝珠の竜力を解放してもよいのか？
Translation: Does bringing it here mean that I am now allowed to unleash the Dragon Force contained within this jewel?

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
ほう――
すでにすべての《竜力の継承》を
終えているのだな
Translation:
Hmm...
You have already completed the "Dragon Force Augmentation" inheritance, haven't you?

Source string:
この宝珠は自らの力で腕を磨いたおまえには
不要なものだったようだ
まさに覚者の鑑よ
Translation: It seems that this orb was unnecessary for you, who has polished your skills on your own. Truly, you are an Arisen.

Source string:
《竜力の継承》には何の影響もないが
前途を祝して、宝珠の力を解放しておくか
力は大地を巡り、またいつの日か
おまえの元へ戻ろう
Translation:
While there is no effect on 《Dragon Force Augmentation》,
In celebration of the future, should we release the power of the jewel?
The power will revolve around the land and one day,
it will return to you.

Source string:
すべての《竜力の継承》が終わったぞ
どのような力を得たのか、確認してみなさい
Translation: All the 《Dragon Force Augmentation》 have been completed. Confirm what kind of power you have obtained!

Source string:
おまえが持ってきたこの宝珠
篭められた力を解放することで
より冒険がしやすくなるというものだ
Translation: The Orb that you brought with you is said to make it easier to embark on adventures by unleashing its hidden power.

Source string:
たとえば、各エリアランクが上昇したり
リム転移先とできる礎が解放されるといった
働きだな
Translation:
For example, it works by increasing the rank of each area or
releasing Portcrystals that can be used as a Rift Teleport destination.

Source string: ――さて、この宝珠の力を解放するか？
Translation: Now then, should we unleash the power of this orb?

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
そういえば、おまえはすでに
かなりの礎に触れ、エリアに貢献して
きたのではないか？
Translation:
Come to think of it, you've already touched
quite a few Portcrystals and contributed
to the area, haven't you?

Source string:
この宝珠の力を解放したところで
さしたる効果は得られないかもしれぬ
それでも、この宝珠の力を解放してもよいか？
Translation:
Even if the power of this Orb is released,
there may not be any significant effect obtained.
Nevertheless, may I release the power of this Orb?

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
宝珠の力を解放することで
各地とおまえの結び付きは
より強固なものとなるだろう
Translation:
By releasing the power of the Orb,
your ties to the regions will
grow stronger.

Source string:
宝珠の力を解放したぞ
本来の効果は得られずとも
解放した力は大地を巡り
またいつの日かおまえの元へ戻るだろう
Translation:
I have unleashed the power of the Orb.
Even if the original effect cannot be obtained,
The unleashed power will traverse the land,
And one day, it will surely return to you.

Source string:
ほう、
《<VAL>》
を持ってきたのか
これはまた貴重な物を手に入れたものだ
Translation:
Wow,
You brought 《<VAL>》!

This is another valuable thing you've got.

Source string:
これを使えば、今のジョブを上げ
スキルやアビリティに関しても、特殊なもの以外
上限まで引き上げることができる
Translation:
With this, you can raise your current job
and your skills and abilities to the
maximum, except for special ones.

Source string:
《<VAL>》
この宝珠の力を解放するか？
Translation:
《<VAL>》
Will you release the power of this treasure?

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
宝珠の力を解放するには少し時間がかかる
パーティーは一度解散してきた方がよかろう
パーティーメンバーを無暗に
待たせてしまうかもしれん
Translation:
宝珠の力を解放するには少し時間がかかる
パーティーは一度解散してきた方がよかろう
パーティーメンバーを無暗に
待たせてしまうかもしれん

Source string:
ふむ――このジョブでは
《<VAL>》
を使っても
レベルアップの効果が無駄になってしまうが
それでも宝珠を使うのか？
Translation: Hmm... In this job, even if you use《<VAL>》, the effects of leveling up will be wasted. Are you still going to use the treasure orb?

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
ふむ――このジョブで
《<VAL>》
を使っても、解放するスキルが無いようだ
スキルに関する効果が無駄になってしまうが
宝珠を使ってもよいのか？
Translation: Hmm―― It seems that there are no skills to release by using 《<VAL>》 in this job. Although the effects related to skills will be wasted, is it okay to use the orb?

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
これは――このまま
《<VAL>》
を使っても、開放するアビリティは無いようだぞ
それでも、今のジョブで宝珠を使うのか？
Translation: This... even if you use the《<VAL>》as is, it seems there are no usable abilities. Are you going to use the orb with your current job?

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
そうか
おまえが納得しているのなら
わたしからこれ以上言うことはない
Translation:
そうか
おまえが納得しているのなら
わたしからこれ以上言うことはない

Source string:
――よろしい
無事、レベルがあがったようだぞ
Translation:
-- Good.
Looks like you're safe and leveled up.

Source string:
――よろしい
無事、スキルが解放されたようだぞ
Translation:
――Alright.
It appears that the skill has been unlocked successfully.

Source string:
――これで
アビリティは無事、解放されたようだぞ
Translation: ――It seems that the abilities have been successfully unlocked.

Source string:
さあ、行け覚者よ
白竜様の加護があらんことを――
Translation:
Now, go forth, Arisen
May you be blessed by the White Dragon's grace.

Source string:
それでは宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
Translation:
それでは宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい

Source string:
そうか
貴重な物だからな
じっくり考えて使うといい
Translation:
そうか
貴重な物だからな
じっくり考えて使うといい

Source string:
ほう、これは
《<VAL>》
だな
Translation:
Well, this is
《<VAL>》

Source string:
これを使えば、今のジョブの
スキルやアビリティを
解放することができる
Translation: By using this, you will be able to unlock the skills and abilities of your current job.

Source string:
《<VAL>》
この宝珠の力を解放するか？
Translation:
《<VAL>》
この宝珠の力を解放するか？

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
ほう――
すでにすべての《竜力の継承》を
終えているようだぞ
Translation:
Hmm...
You have already completed the "Dragon Force Augmentation" inheritance, haven't you?

Source string:
おまえはすでに多くのエリアに貢献している
この宝珠の力を解放したところで
さしたる効果は得られないかもしれぬ
それでも、この宝珠の力を解放してもよいか？
Translation:
You have already contributed to many areas.
Even if the power of this Orb is released,
there may not be any significant effect obtained.
Nevertheless, may I release the power of this Orb?

Source string: はい
Translation: はい

Source string: いいえ
Translation: いいえ

Source string:
この宝珠の力を解放したところで
転移の礎に何の影響もないが
それでも、この宝珠の力を解放してもよいか？
Translation:
Even if the power of this Orb is released,
it will have no effect on the Portcrystals.
Nevertheless, may I release the power of this Orb?

Source string:
すべての《竜力の継承》が終わったぞ
どのような力を得たのか、確認してみなさい
Translation:
すべての《竜力の継承》が終わったぞ
どのような力を得たのか、確認してみなさい

Source string:
――うむ
これで各地のエリアとおまえの結び付きは
より強固なものとなるだろう
Translation: This will strengthen the connection between each area and yourself

Source string:
――これで
転移の礎は無事、解放されたようだ
Translation: ――With this, it seems that the Portcrystals have been successfully unlocked.

Source string: どうした、深刻な顔だな
Translation: What's wrong? You look serious.

Source string:
覚者であることには慣れたか？
道は――見えたか？
Translation:
Have you become accustomed to being an Arisen?
Did the path become visible?

Source string: 体は常に鍛えておけよ
Translation: You've got to keep your body in shape.

Source string:
悪いな
茶飲み話なら、後にしてくれ
Translation:
Sorry
If it's just casual conversation, please save it for later.

Source string:
覚者として生きるということは
白竜と世界の行く末を見届ける――ということだ
Translation: To live as an Arisen means to witness the fate of The White Dragon and the world.

Source string: やるべきことをやろう――お互いにな
Translation: Let's do what we have to do--for each other.

Source string:
気を抜くなよ
絶対に安全な場所なんてのは無いからな
Translation:
Don't let your guard down.
There is no such thing as an absolutely safe place.

Source string:
腕試しに一戦やるか？
おっと、そんな顔するな――冗談さ
Translation:
You want to try your hand at a fight?
Oops, don't give me that look--I'm kidding.

Source string:
おまえは感じたことはないか？
自分の真ん中を貫く、熱いモノ――
それが揺らぎ、壊れてしまう不安を
Translation:
Have you ever felt it?
The intense thing that pierces through your core -
The uncertainty that wavers and breaks.

Source string:
忘れるな
俺たちは覚者――使命に生き、使命に死す者だ
Translation:
Do not forget
We are the Arisen - those who live and die for the mission.

Source string: どうした。俺には遠慮は無用だ
Translation: What's wrong? No need to hesitate with me.

Source string: 覚者ひまなし――いつものことだ
Translation: There is no free time for an arisen――as always.

Source string:
言っておくが、俺が面倒を見てやれるのは
おまえが行くべき場所――
戦うべき相手の指示だけだ
Translation:
Let me make it clear, the only thing I can do for you is
to give you directions on where you should go -
only instructions on who you should engage in battle with.

Source string:
衣食の面倒までは見切れないから
自分でなんとかしてくれ
Translation:
I can't take care of your food and clothing, so
you're on your own.

Source string:
時間を作って、なるべく歩きまわれ
神殿をくまなく見て回るのもいいし
遠出してみるのもいいだろう
Translation:
Make time to walk around as much as possible.
You can look all over the temple or
go far away!

Source string:
探究心を忘れず、常に新しいものに触れろ
覚者の人生は長い
退屈すると――つらいぞ
Translation:
Explore without forgetting your heart and always touch something new.
The life of an Arisen is long.
It is painful to be bored.

Source string: アークの話は知っているか？
Translation: Do you know the story of the Ark?

Source string:
派遣した調査団が調べているのだろうが
早く正体を知りたいものだな
Translation:
I wonder what the dispatched investigation team is examining.
I really want to know their true identity soon.

Source string: メイリーフがなついているようだな
Translation: Looks like you've got a soft spot for Mayleaf.

Source string:
よし、今後、あの子のことは
おまえに任せるとしよう
Translation:
All right,
I'll leave her in your hands from now on.

Source string:
ご苦労だったな
とりあえず今は何もない
Translation:
You went through a lot of trouble.
For now, there is nothing.

Source string: 休むか遊ぶか――好きにしてくれ
Translation: Rest or play――do as you please.

Source string:
イリスの件で動いてくれたそうだな
俺からも礼をいう
世話になった
Translation:
I've heard that you took action regarding the matter concerning Iris.
I also want to say thank you.
I appreciate your assistance.

Source string:
いいのか――
俺たち覚者はこのままでいいのだろうか――
Translation:
Is this okay――
Are we, the Arisen, fine as we are――

Source string:
白竜の力――
少しでも多く継承できれば――
Translation: The power of the White Dragon - If even a little can be inherited -

Source string:
多少無理をしてでもメイリーフを
連れ戻して欲しかったが――
まあ、今はそのキースヒルトを信じるしか
ないようだな
Translation:
No matter how unreasonable it may be, I wanted you to bring Mayleaf back...
Well, it seems like now I have no choice but to believe in Kieshildt.

Source string:
メイリーフも普通の娘ではないから
そう簡単に敵の手に落ちたりはしないだろう
Translation: Mayleaf is not an ordinary girl, so she wouldn't easily fall into the hands of enemies.

Source string:
彼女の信頼を裏切るような者がいれば
話は別だが――
Translation: If there is someone who betrays her trust, it's a different story...

Source string:
イリスのことは俺にまかせてくれ
長い付き合いだ
Translation:
I'll take care of Iris.
We've known each other a long time.

Source string:
話せば――わかるさ
ああ――きっとわかる
Translation:
Talk to him--you'll understand.
Yeah--you'll understand.

Source string:
敵の会話に登場したエルフとは
間違いなくキースヒルトのことだ
狙われているとあれば放ってはおけない
Translation: Whoever the elf mentioned in the enemy's conversation is, it's definitely Kieshildt. If they're being targeted, I can't just leave them alone.

Source string:
腐れモゴックめ――
ただですむと思うなよ
Translation:
Mogok, you rotten scoundrel――
Don't think you'll get off easy.

Source string: キースヒルトの死はけして無駄ではない
Translation: The death of Kieshildt is by no means in vain.

Source string:
白竜に命が捧げられる限り――
誰の命も無駄にはならない
Translation:
As long as a life is dedicated to the White Dragon--
No one's life will be wasted.

Source string: ディアマンテス――
Translation: Diamantes--

Source string:
その男がアークを送り込み――
ズールを使ってオークを取りまとめ――
イリスの正気とキースヒルトの命を奪った――
Translation:
The man sent the Ark--
using Zuhl to gather the Orcs--
and took away Iris's sanity and Kieshildt's life--

Source string:
何者だ、ディアマンテス――
いや、聞いたことはある
レスタニアを繁栄の世界から戦場に変えた
張本人――
Translation:
Who are you, Diamantes--
No, I've heard of you before.
You're the one who turned Lestania from a prosperous world into a battlefield,
The mastermind--

Source string: どこにいる――今すぐにでも倒してやる！
Translation: Where are they - I'll take them down right now!

Source string:
ジョゼフが最善を尽くそうとしていることは
わかっているが――さすがに焦れるな
Translation: I understand that Joseph is doing his best, but- understandably- he gets impatient.

Source string:
覚者として生きることに
見返りを求めたことはなかったが
Translation: As an Arisen, I have never sought anything in return for living this way.

Source string: この仕打ちは――なんだ――
Translation: What is this strike- what is it?

Source string:
何？
わたしの顔に、何かついてる？
Translation:
What?
Do I have something on my face?

Source string: 難しい顔しちゃって――悩みでもあるの？
Translation: You look so concerned - what's troubling you?

Source string:
楽しい時間って、限られてるから
価値あるんだよね
Translation: Fun times are limited, so it's worth it.

Source string:
わたしには力がある
だから、それを使うのは当然――うん、当然
Translation:
I have the power
So, it's only natural to use it - yes, naturally!

Source string:
わからないんだよね
何が正しくて、何が間違ってるのか――
Translation:
I don't know, you know.
What is right and what is wrong -

Source string:
敵を倒して、魔物を狩って――
もっと強くなれば別の生き方が見えるのかな
Translation:
Defeat the enemies and hunt the monsters――
If I become stronger, will I be able to see a different way of living?

Source string:
さあ、どうするの？
覚者なら、迷いなんてないでしょ？
Translation:
Well, what are you going to do?
If you are Arisen, you shouldn't have any doubts, right?

Source string: ――あんた目付き、レオに似てきたね
Translation: You have a similar expression to Leo, huh.

Source string:
自信持っていいんじゃない？
あんたなら、できそうな気がする
Translation:
You should have confidence.
I think you can do it.

Source string:
結局さ、どうなるかわかんないよね
世界なんてさ
Translation:
In the end, you never know what will happen, you know?
The world and all that.

Source string: なに？　なになに？
Translation: What?　What, what, what?

Source string:
あんたなかなかやるよね
これでわたし、楽できるかも？
Translation:
You're quite good, aren't you?
Maybe this will make things easier for me.

Source string: そういえば、ファビオって覚者とは会った？
Translation: By the way, have you met Fabio, the Arisen?

Source string:
いい奴だから、覚えておきなよ
ファビオね、ファビオ
Translation:
He's a good guy, so remember him.
Fabio, right, Fabio.

Source string:
ああ、忙しい――
誰かさんの人使いが荒いのか
わたしの要領が悪いのか――
Translation:
Oh, I'm so busy--
Either someone's not being very helpful...
Or maybe I'm just not very good at what I do.

Source string:
手伝ってあげられなくてごめんよ
わたしはわたしで忙しくてさ
Translation:
I'm sorry I can't help you.
I'm busy with my own things.

Source string:
さっそくご活躍だね！
うん、いいよぉ
Translation:
You're doing great already! 
Yeah, sure!

Source string:
あんたが頑張ってくれるとわたしがちょっと
楽になるからね！
Translation:
If you work hard, I'll be a little
relieved!

Source string: わくわくするね
Translation: I'm excited, aren't you?

Source string:
重要な話か？
違うなら後にしてくれ
Translation:
Is it an important conversation?
If not, please postpone it.

Source string: ふん――ひまそうだな
Translation: Hmm, it looks like you have some free time, huh?

Source string:
時間があるのなら
外の魔物でも倒してきたらどうだ
Translation: If you have time, why don't you go and defeat some monsters outside?

Source string:
規律なくして人は動かぬ
例外は――ない
Translation:
Without discipline, people will not work.
There are no exceptions.

Source string:
覚者とは、常に責務を負う者
白竜に、地に、人に――
すべてに仕える者だということを忘れるな
Translation:
The Arisen is someone who always bears responsibility.
To the White Dragon, to the land, to the people—
never forget that they serve everyone.

Source string:
くれぐれも己の力に溺れるなよ
どんな戦士も、過信という泥沼には
簡単に足を取られる
Translation: Please do not indulge in your own power. Any warrior can easily get trapped in the quagmire of overconfidence.

Source string:
覚者は勝手な連中が多いが――
貴殿は悪習に染まるなよ
Translation:
Arisen often tend to be a bunch of troublemakers, but...
Don't let yourself be tainted by bad habits.

Source string:
死を覚悟し、同時に生を諦めないこと
それが戦場で生きのびる秘訣だ
Translation:
Be prepared to die and not give up on life at the same time.
That's the secret to survival on the battlefield. To face death and at the same time not give up on life,
That is the secret to surviving on the battlefield.

Source string:
人智を超えた敵であろうと、我らは戦わねばならない
それが騎士というものだ
Translation:
We must fight even against enemies beyond human understanding.
That's what knighthood is all about!

Source string:
覚者といえども軍規には従ってもらう
仲間の命を守るためだ
Translation: Even though they are awakened, they must obey military regulations. It is to protect the lives of their comrades.

Source string: ほう？　我々騎士団に何用だ
Translation: What?　What do you want with us Knights?

Source string:
礼節を忘れるな
この《謁見の間》では特にな
Translation:
Do not forget the etiquette
In this 《Audience Chamber》, especially

Source string:
グリッテン砦のヴァネッサ殿が
来ているようだが――
騎士団は蚊帳の外か？
Translation:
It seems that Lady Vanessa of Fort Gritten is
coming--
Is the knights order out of the loop?

Source string:
騎士団の犠牲は竜の力となることで
報われる――ああ、そうとも
Translation: The sacrifice of the knights will be rewarded with the power of the dragon - oh, indeed.
